name: Eye Tint Long-Lasting Liquid Eyeshadow
about: What it is:u00a0A long-lasting, crease-proof liquid eyeshadow in multiple finishes with up to 16 hours of buildable color and a lightweight feel...What Else You Need to Know: This liquid eyeshadow features pure color pigments in a water-infused formula for buildable, high-impact color that glides on smoothly and blends easily. The multipurpose applicator allows for a variety of bold eyeshadow, eyeliner, and smoky eye looksu2014no primer required...Clinical Results: In a study conducted in 2013 with a panel of 65 women ages 20u201350, for a one-week duration in France:.- 86.7% of women agree the product does not smudge after 16 hours of wear.- 92.3% of women agree the product has luminous color.- 98.5% of women agree the product does not smudge
ingredients: Isododecane , Synthetic Fluorphlogopite , Silica , Talc , Calcium Sodium Borosilicate , Cera Alba / Beeswax / Cire Dabeille , Ci 77891 / Titanium Dioxide , Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides , Ci 77499 / Iron Oxides , Lauroyl Lysine , Disteardimonium Hectorite , Mica , Ethylene/Va Copolymer , Propanediol , Paraffin , Propylene Carbonate , Phenoxyethanol , Ethylhexylglycerin , Tin Oxide , Ci 77266 / Black 2 , Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate , Tocopherol
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-For a natural makeup look, apply one layer of any liquid eyeshadow shade to the lids, using the applicator or your fingers for a soft wash of color..-For more intense color payoff and bolder eye makeup looks, blend and layer multiple shades and finishes. Add depth by applying deeper shades to the outer-corner of the eye or the crease. Add additional dimension by using light, reflective shades on the inner corner of the eye or on the brow bone..-Use the applicator tip and apply to the lash line for the perfect eyeliner look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fellow hooded eyelid girlie, here! ud83dude4bud83cudffbu200du2640ufe0f I wore this for the first time today to my familyu2019s Christmas party, which is a VERY risky move on my part, as I tend to shy away from cream or liquid eyeshows/bases, because Iu2019m pretty sure I have the oiliest eyelids on planet earth. Not even a liquid, pencil or gel eyeliner will last more than maybe 2 hours without beginning to transfer and smudge, and thatu2019s even with setting it as well as priming underneath. Strange, because the rest of my face is extremely dry lol. Anyways, this liquid eyeshadow lasted on me for the entire 8 hour excursion with ZERO creasing. I was shocked. The colour is stunning - itu2019s your standard u201cbronzer shade.u201d Application literally takes 2 minutes tops, including blending time. Maybe 3 if you want it to look super buffed out and smooth. I did not even set it with anything, I simply blended it out with a clean MAC blending brush. I did, however, prime with the NARS eyeshadow primer. I will attach a pictured of my makeup post event :) 10/10 recommend if you decide to splurge on something for yourself this holiday season!

reviews.review_title: Fair Girlies, This Wasnu2019t Made For Us
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review is strictly about the 18M shade and that shade only. I love the formulau2014it looks weightless on the eyes. I am extremely fair. So fair that Iu2019m translucent. You can see so many of my veins on and around my eyelids. I have yet to find an eye primer or cream shadow that conceals those issues and matches my skintone.   My closest match is the Mac Paint Pot in Painterly. But that product is so heavy looking and still a touch too deep and mauvy. So when I saw this new shade, I had to try it. I really thought this might replace my paint pot. You can tell itu2019s pigmented, but I anticipated a really soft and light neutral brown shade.   So, you can imagine my disappointment when my order arrived, I tried it on, and I saw an orange. It looks like a dark peachy orange on me. Itu2019s substantially darker than what I usually use. I know you might be thinking I should keep it and use it as a base for other shadowsu2014I already have that. I donu2019t need a burden of a product. Iu2019ll 100% be returning. I love the 22m & 67s shade but 18 simply not for me, and likely not for any fair skinned customers. If youu2019re a light or medium skin tone, this will likely be a perfect eye base color. I bet it would be a great highlighting color for deeper complexions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have owned the eye tints across the shade range and in varying formulations. I have to sayu2014this new shimmer shade 67S is the best one I've tried. I previously owned 12S and I found that one to have more of a chunky glitter. This shade has a beautifully milled shimmer that has impact but remains smoothing to the eyelid.   If you were to ask me if you need it, I would ask what your makeup concerns are, if youu2019re someone that owns a lot of makeup and whether or not you enjoy single shadows. I think for the average person, like someone that can count on both hands how many makeup items they have, this is a definite recommendation for a special occasion. I would also recommend the matte formula for someone concerned about their eyeshadow looking too heavy or drying once itu2019s on the eyes. But if you buy a lot of luxury or indie makeup, and youu2019re not into one & done eyeshadows, and you don't have to travel a lot, I would say skip it.   It reminds me a lot of shadows you would find in Pat McGrathu2019s old mothership palettes or the Ethereal Eyes palette (rip) by Makeup by Mario. Itu2019s not as finely milled as the latter though. Its certainly not the same as the UD moondust shadows but it looks equally u201cwet.u201d You could wear it every day, but I personally think this level of glitter should be worn on special occasions. Nothing looks as good as glitter does in low-light environments.

reviews.review_text: I am completely in love with this very subtle and elegant liquid shadow of the best quality. I could see that the glitter doesn't fall off or spread. It's very easy to blend, I put it on with my fingers. And the color is also super natural. It doesn't transfer at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you love sparkle, GET THIS!! Itu2019s perfect for those elevated holiday looks. I didnu2019t notice any fallout while placing the shadow/glitter and didnu2019t have any throughout the day (just be sure to press and not rub it on). Very long lasting!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this FREE product I received in exchange for a test and review! I will certainly be buying it after I run out because I am OBSESSED with it! I received shade 70M-Sakura, and itu2019s perfect for my green eyes! Not only does it not crease like most other liquid shadows Iu2019ve tried, but it also works amazing for layering shadows! Iu2019ve used it as a base instead of eye primer, and bold colors just POP on top of it. Iu2019m glad this product wonu2019t end up in the bottom of my makeup bag, because it has become a STAPLE in my makeup routine! The versatility this product provides makes it worth every penny and I will continue to use and buy this product in the future!

reviews.review_title: There you are, I've been looking for you!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Sometimes when you receive an item to try in exchange for a review (by the way, I received 70M Sakura - light matte pink in exchange for a review!), you try the product and then it ends up spending eternity at the bottom of your makeup bag... Not this one though! This is exactly the product I have been looking for!!! As someone with dry, sensitive skin, finding an eyeshadow that 1) lasts and 2)doesn't dry my eyelids is a struggle, especially as I get older. This is smooth, goes on easy and STAYS on! A bonus feature of this shade in particular is that it also doubles as an excellent primer! I love using this all over and then layering over it with other colours in parts! The price point is a bit of a splurge but I definitely have my eye on purchasing some of the other colour choices and would definitely recommend this to a friend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was given a free sample of this product in the shade 67S to try and review. The shade I received (67S) was very pretty, sparkly and glittery. However, once I blended it out with my fingers, most of the pigment vanishes.  The pros: Long-lasting, no glitter fallout, pretty shade and comfortable wear without creasing  The cons: Not very pigmented (at least my shade), more of a wash of color.  I will continue using this as a nice topper over more pigmented eyeshadows, unless I'm wearing a more natural look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like how this held up on my eyes and did not smudge or wear off throughout the day. I would say the opacity is a little less than I would like and came off as more of a topper rather than an all over shade. This was defiantly on the sparkly/glitter side which it states but it doesn't transfer all over your face which I appreciate. I would love to try some of the other finishes to get a more natural look as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this product. Itu2019s a beautiful pinky nude with lots of shimmer. Iu2019ve used it alone and on top of other products. It blends like a dream and is quite buildable with its creamy consistency. I use it almost everytime I do my makeup now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in love with this Armani Beauty Eye Tint Long-Lasting Liquid Eyeshadow Color: 70M Sakura - light matte pink It really highlights my eyes. It's easy to apply. It's blendable. This is my new must have eyeshadow.

reviews.review_title: Skip this one, your wallet will thank you
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can tell immediately the formula is awful. you have about 17 seconds to blend it in, and then it becomes patchy and wipes off. it might be long lasting, but I will never know since I'll be returning this. so expensive, get something else! I usually love Armani too. but I prepped my eyes with concealer and also tried bare on my hand, and wither way it will pill and become a mess. if you are older than 30 like me, it also emphasizes any texture on your eyelids. and this color barely shows up on me (bronze) and I'm Casper's color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A quick thank-you to BzzAgent, who were kind enough to send me this beautiful liquid eyeshadow, complimentary, to try out in exchange for my honest opinion. I received the shade 67S-Sparkle, which is described as a bright champagne shimmer, and I agree with that description of the color. The consistency is fairly thin, and you have roughly under a minute before it dries down completely. Once dry, it is pretty much budge proof, however I did find that the shimmer particles could still transfer around- but only if rubbed or disturbed. One of the things I like about this, and many other liquid shadows is that they are really good for achieving those one-and-done looks and are perfect for people who want something quick and easy. Effortless. These shadows come in a few different finishes, and as mentioned above, this shade is a sparkle finish-no glitter chunks, just beautiful, ethereal, shimmering sparkles. I appreciate that the formula doesn't make my eyelids feel tight or look textured while wearing it. You can wear this alone or mix with other shadows-wear it sheered out or opaquer. It would be beautiful for a wedding day, or for just your average, everyday makeup. I want to end by saying that there are other products like this on the market if the price point does not suit you, but if you can afford it, and you're looking for a good liquid eyeshadow, these are an excellent choice. I would absolutely purchase this again and want to try some of the other colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super nice product! It goes on very smooth and is buildable. It has the right amount of shimmer and the color is very flattering

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. I think that 68S Tobacco is a gorgeous color. The shimmer is exceptional, and I donu2019t say that about a lot of products. It looks great on my eyes. Having said that, I would not say it is very long lasting. I easily washed it off with no scrubbing or anything. It is also easy to smudge. I still like it though. I added a photo of it swatched on my hand for reference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really gorgeous color and a lot of shimmer and sparkle. I did notice fall out - at least for me - as soon as I applied it so I'd recommend using an eyeshadow primer first. (I forgot to do that the first time.) It was very easy to apply and very light and comfortable to wear - you don't even notice it other than the shimmer.  I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve purchased multiple shades and have used them for since launch. The shade 68s goes on smooth, buildable color, use day or night, easy application, does dry quickly, long lasting, and convenient for travel and one color application.  application.

reviews.review_title: A must have for my makeup routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Long lasting liquid eyeshadow. Vibrant color and easy to apply. Long-lasting without creasing or fading, even after hours of wear. Can go smoothly with other eye makeup

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to apply - I only used the applicator and my fingers and really liked how it turned out. The color is very akin to a smokey eye with a bit of glitter. I used brown liner with it and black mascara and it had a very sultry effect. The only thing I didn't like was the creasing that other reviews have mentioned, but I also didn't use an eyeshadow base so maybe that would have helped. Very pretty! If they weren't nearly $40, I'd get the lighter champagne color as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product multiple times I am absolutely in love with how beautiful this shade is! This is by far the best liquid eyeshadow I have ever used. Itu2019s so easy to apply, glides right on the lid, buildable, doesnu2019t flake, long lasting, and has a long lasting beautiful shimmer to it. Itu2019s perfect for everyday wear anywhere you go. I will be purchasing in other shades!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best eyeshadow there, hands down.  But I just realized it contains TALC! C'mon Armani, you can do better than this.... There's enough data out there to make us steer away from talc especially it is often contaminated with asbestos.  Unfortunately I can't keep using this near by eyes, which sucks because it really is a perfect formulation in every other way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eye tint is amazing! It goes on smoothly with the applicator and lasts long. The color is perfect and very brightening.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This liquid eyeshadow is easy to apply and blend with the applicator. It dries quickly and does not have a tacky feel to it. The color is long lasting. I would be interested in purchasing the more neutral shades of this product for everyday wear. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this a free sample in exchange for a review A nice subtle shade of pink. This is my first time using an eye shadow like this but I will continue to use this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great pigmented eyeshadow!  It covers well and has great staying power.  I also love the shade I got, itu2019s not too dark for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: If youu2019re over 40 you NEED THIS

I will be buying every color. It is so smooth and pigmented. Itu2019s also so billable!! It doesnu2019t look cakey or flaky no matter how much you layer it. Amazing product. Probably my favorite product that Armani makes at the moment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Must have for your make up collection!

reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve purchased several of these in various shades. The matte shadows donu2019t irritate my eyes or cake up. They remain crease proof for most of the day, and also create a perfect base for powder shadows.

reviews.review_title: Perfect to add a little pop to your every day!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the sparkle this brings out in my eyes.  Love how is looks alone on my darker skin.  It does last if you set it.  For an every day look this is perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Armani Beauty Eye Tint Long Lasting Liquid Eyeshadow and overall, I was quite impressed. The pigmentation is rich and the formula is smooth, making it easy to apply and blend. It truly lives up to its name with long-lasting wear, staying vibrant throughout the day without creasing or fading. The range of colors is also fantastic, offering both bold and neutral shades to suit any look. My only minor critique is that it can feel a bit heavy if layered too much. Nonetheless, it's a solid product and I would definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow comes with an applicator for easy use. It's lightweight, isn't cakey on the eye and goes on smooth with a wonderful color! I've used this as a base since it is a liquid and used a powder overtop, but it is just as good on its own! This is one to try at least once. I can guarantee you you'd use it again and again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After trying this particular shade for a couple of weeks, Iu2019ve got to say this product is amazing! Itu2019s easy to blend and the longevity is great! The shade is also really pigmented and smooth. I definitely recommend the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very pretty! Shade 70M is marked as matte but reflects light subtly (typical to Armani) and doesnu2019t feel flat. Itu2019s a brightening soft pink on fair skin and could be used alone or as a base for other colors. It lasted well during the day. Thanks Armani for letting me try this shade!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have this little beauty in the shade Tobacco - a striking bronzy brown with a cool tone.   This formula is wonderful; it applies so silky on the eyelids and blends quickly and easily. Whether youu2019re a pro at makeup or youu2019ve never put on makeup before, you would  be able to blend this and have a beautiful finish.   It is pretty expensive so itu2019s more of a splurge, however if you can and want to, you would love it! I certainly do.   And I think this is a shade that I would be flattering on anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful shade and  long lasting! For deeper skin tones I would go a more golden so that I can use it on the cheeks too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is very nice, velvety and long lasting. i was able to blend it well and it lasted a long time. it did cready a little but not anything major. The only downside was the shade I dont think its a shade for me. But overall is a great product.

reviews.review_title: This Eyeshadow is The Good Stuffud83dude0d

reviews.review_text: Iu2019ll be ud83dudcaf real: Iu2019m not an eyeshadow person, but I couldnu2019t resist trying this beautiful shade(68s, tobacco), and itu2019s Armani, so it was a no-brainer. Wellu2026Iu2019m a covert! Give me all the eyeshadows, in all the shades! reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The GA BEAUTY Eye Tint Shade Extension in u201cSafe 67su201d from Sephora is absolutely amazing! This eye tint delivers a stunning shimmer that lasts all day without creasing or fading. The rich color payoff is perfect for both a bold eye look or something more subtle for daytime wear.  What I love most is how versatile it is. Not only does it work beautifully as an eye shadow, but it also doubles as a highlighter! A quick dab on my cheekbones gives the perfect glow without being overpowering. It blends effortlessly into the skin and feels super lightweightu2014no sticky residue, just a smooth, seamless finish.  This product truly stands out for its long-lasting wear and multipurpose use, making it an essential part of my beauty routine. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review, and I canu2019t recommend it enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this eyeshadow, it can be built up, or smoothed out flawlessly. There's quite a bit of metallic shimmer, that's a plus. You have a bit of time to work with it before it dries too. I create content and will be using it as a foliage fill color with graphic leafs ud83cudf42

reviews.review_title: Best Liquid Eyeshadow I Have Tried
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Armani Beauty Eye Tint Long Lasting Liquid Eyeshadow in shade 70m. It is a beautiful baby pink matte color. It is very pigmented and goes on smoothly. The doe foot applicator is the perfect size and makes application quick and easy. I find it hard to work with liquid eyeshadow, so I appreciate that this formula doesn't dry right away, so I have time to blend it. I did a beautiful pink eyeshadow look, with this color on my lid, and received many compliments. This color could work with other shades of pink, purple, blue, brown, or even black. It really is versatile. The Armani liquid eyeshadow is the only formula I have really liked so far, and I have tried a lot! I totally recommend to anyone looking for a quality liquid eyeshadow. You get what you pay for in this case!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the way this product went on my eyelid but I did have to use a primer for it to show up on my skin tone. I was able to apply it very easily and it lasted all day. The color was lighter than I liked so I will play with other ones to see what shows up more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 68s looks really pretty on my med-dark skin tone. The shimmer did transfer easily even with primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty shade to easily wear day or night! Love the consistency

Or you can apply it after your eyeshadow to give your night a little sparkles. The packaging looks clean, elegant and expensive.

reviews.review_title: 70M is a great matte base for Eye Shadow!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 70M is a beautiful matte base before eyeshadow and really brightens your eyes. You can wear it alone or layered.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received the shade 68S in exchange for an honest review. I love this shade u2014 itu2019s a cool-toned brown with multicolor sparkle. The applicator is a pointed doe foot and picks up the perfect amount of product for application to the eyelid. The texture is a bit thin and liquidy u2014 deducted one star because the product came with a bit of the learning curve. You get decent play time before the product dries down. I recommend using your fingers to blend this out. I tried both finger and brush, and due to the thin consistency of the product, it was difficult to get precise blending with a brush. After the product sets, it has excellent staying power. I have very oily eyelids and I had no issues with transfer, creasing, or fading.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very pretty color. I really like the shimmer in it and the champagne shade looks good on my medium skin tone. It is very pigmented and it does last a good while for makeup looks. I would definitely recommend this product and I would like to try out more shades as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have been loving this eye tint! I prefer doing simple makeup for day to day and adding a little bit of this eye tint gives my eyes a beautiful shimmer. I like that I can use my finger to make it subtle or really intense for whatever Iu2019m going for that day. Smooth application with no creasing and lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: A cute new addition to my routine

reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow has excellent stay power! This color was beautiful! I did struggle a little with blending this product smoothly but that could be just from my own skill level/tools.

reviews.review_title: A staple in my daily makeup routine! So pretty
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually donu2019t write reviews and donu2019t spend so much on something like a liquid eyeshadow but these are so beautiful and make my everyday makeup so pretty. I was using the shade 22S on my entire lid and a little more on the crease but decided to get the 9S to use on my middle crease. I was looking at the Ilia ones for a bit but this color really did it for me. Like WOW it brings out my brown eyes and skin color so nicely giving it a little halo eye. Itu2019s sooo beautiful and definitely worth the extra money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've finally found the perfect eye shimmer for sensitive eyes! As someone who often struggles with irritation from eye makeup, Shade 67s Eye Shimmer has been a total game-changer. It's hypoallergenic and doesn't cause any discomfort or watery eyes, which is a huge relief.  Application & Blendability: Shade 67s spreads effortlessly, whether applied with a brush for a polished look or with fingers for those quick touch-ups. The applicator is versatile, enabling full lid coverage or precise application as an eyeliner. What impresses me most is how the glitter adds sparkle without disrupting the underlying color, maintaining a subtle elegance in every look.  Versatility & Durability: This shimmer is not just easy to apply but also incredibly versatile. It transitions seamlessly from a daytime to a nighttime look. Most notably, it held up impressively during a roller derby matchu2014even without primeru2014without any fading or creasing.  Suitability for Skin Tones: As someone with a fair complexion and green eyes, I find that Shade 67s complements my features beautifully, enhancing the green in my eyes and giving a natural yet striking appearance. This makes it an excellent choice for anyone with similar tones looking for makeup that enhances without overwhelming.  Overall Impression: Shade 67s has replaced all other eye products in my makeup bag. Its blend of simplicity for daily wear and potential for more glamorous looks makes it invaluable. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable, non-irritating eye shimmer that really performs. It is great for the clean girl aesthetic, or pair it up with other products to go for a more glam look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used it for about 2 weeks for my work. it stays for 6-8 hours and has good pigment. would definitely repurchase other shade!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Pretty color, light shimmer. I am fairly fair with blue eyes so it helped bring out my eyes. Soft formula, didn't crease. Overall satisfied.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Armani Beauty's Eye Tint Long-Lasting Liquid Eyeshadow is a standout product in the world of liquid eyeshadows. The formula is lightweight and smooth, making application effortless. It blends beautifully and dries down quickly without feeling heavy or sticky. The pigmentation is impressive, delivering vibrant color with a single swipe, while the range of shades offers something for every look, from subtle to bold. Its long-lasting wear truly lives up to the name, maintaining its intensity throughout the day without creasing or fading. Overall, itu2019s a fantastic option for anyone looking for high-quality, versatile eyeshadow that stands the test of time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the quality of this! It is very light so I decided to do a smoky eye and add this to the lid and it stayed on all day! Very vibrant and love that it lasts all day long.

reviews.review_title: Nice, glitter smears, color does not smear.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I do really like the shimmer this provides, but I am fairly light skinned and when it's on my eyelids you can't tell anything is there other than the shimmer. I could use this as a highlighter if I wanted too as well. It washes off very easy, has no smell, but the glittery shimmer does smear while the color does not smear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for a couple weeks I am in love with this lip gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin

It gives pigment well and evenly lays down on the skin.

reviews.review_title: Not my favorite but daughter LOVES
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited for this to come. When it came, it was a no makeup day. But I couldn't wait to try it. So I put it on as a one shade look just to try it. I was kind of careless how high it went because I usually use my finger or something to lower it and straighten it out. That's what I planned to do with this. But it dried so fast and got kind of tacky that I could not get it off. I even tried rubbing it off. I'm fair skinned so this very light pink very high on my eyes made me look like MIMI from Drew Carey. Eventually my eyes got sore so I waited to get it off. I unfortunately did not like it. But my daughter loves it. I think it  I may have just not liked this color. I just can't afford to find out since these are quite expensive. I've never messed with wet eyeshadow so I'm sure that doesn't help either. I'd say try it because you may love it. I'm giving 4 stars because it stays on very well, the applicator is good, and because my daughter loves it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What a fun new liquid eyeshadow from Armani Beauty! The color is sparkly, long-lasting, and very easy to apply. Iu2019m not usually one for colorful eyeshadows, but the light matte pink color (shade 70M) blends out beautifully into a soft, complimentary color that would be beautiful and brightening on a variety of skin tones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the pleasure of trying this eyeshadow, and I can unequivocally say it has transformed my makeup game. From the moment I applied it, I was struck by its incredible quality and performance. This eyeshadow truly lasts for hours without flaking, which is a remarkable feat for any product. The shimmering finish is absolutely eye-catching and adds a radiant touch to any look. The formula glides on smoothly and blends effortlessly, making it a joy to work with. Overall, this eyeshadow has proven itself to be a must-have in my makeup collection. With its long-lasting wear and dazzling shimmer, it's truly a game changer. If you're in the market for a new eyeshadow that checks all the boxes u2013 durability, pigmentation, and a stunning finish u2013 look no further. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Great color pay off, but formula isn't my favorite
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try the Giorgio Armani Liquid Eyeshadow in shade 70M that I was gifted to try, and I have to say, the color and opacity did not disappoint. The shade is beautifully pigmented, offering a rich and vibrant payoff However, the formula itself left me with mixed feelings. While it applies smoothly, I found it difficult to blend out, especially for more intricate looks. It doesn't layer well with other textures like glitter, powder eyeshadow, or cream products. This made it challenging to create a multidimensional effect or mix with other products for more complex looks. Additionally, the formula tended to set quickly, leaving little room for blending.  That said, it would work well for someone who prefers a more simple, one-and-done eyeshadow application. If you're going for a quick, bold wash of color, this could be a great option. Just don't expect it to be very versatile when it comes to layering or blending.

However, the staying power leaves a bit to be desired. Despite the need for touch-ups, I still enjoy using this eyeshadow because the texture and blendability are top-notch. reviews.review_text: There is nothing I love more than a little sparkle on the lid. I have never been a fan of liquid or cream metallic eyeshadows and I despise when glitter is in ANY eyeshadow. I gave it 4 stars because it canu2019t really be built up for more intensity without getting a little cakey and exaggerating the wrinkles on my lid (probably not a problem for someone with less lines on their lids) I wouldnu2019t normally wear it that way, I prefer a more u201cnaturalu201d youthful glow so itu2019s not a big deal for me. I also love that itu2019s so versatile. I can throw it on my lids in 30 seconds and just tap out the edges with my finger for a hint of color and glow for work or I can use it as the perfect finish to a smokey eye to add shine for a night out!

reviews.review_title: Optimal Formula in a Liquid Eyeshadow!

reviews.review_text: My favorite liquid eyeshadows have added new shades & I couldn't be happier! Dior definitely has an optimally performing formula in their Eye Tints and the new Dior Eye Tint Shimmer Longwear Luminous Liquid Eyeshadow in 68S Tobacco is no exception! It applies with ease and looks just as stunning as their predecessors. I love how this liquid eyeshadow enhances the eyelid even if you have less than smooth texture on the lids thanks to the smoothing effect it lends after application. Although this formula is a best friend to mature skin, these eye tints look incredible on all ages & skin types! These liquid eyeshadows apply with ease and give you time to blend & perfect before dry down. They never get dry or flakey throughout the day and the wear time is exceptional! This new shade, Tobacco, is lovely while lending a shimmering effect in a neutral tone somewhere between a brown & bronze color scheme. It's unique in that I can't quite put my finger on the exact color, but I can attest to the gorgeous effect it provides. In my opinion, these are liquid eyeshadows at their best for quality & performance while elevating any eye look! I can't wait to get my hands on more of the new shades!  Please Note: I did receive this complimentary product in exchange for my review.

reviews.review_text: 5-Star Review for Shade 67s Liquid Eyeshadow  I recently tried the Shade 67s liquid eyeshadow that I received for free, and Iu2019m beyond impressed! The application is incredibly smooth, and the lightweight, water-infused formula glides on effortlessly.   What sets this product apart is its lasting poweru2014after wearing it for over 16 hours, I can confirm it doesnu2019t smudge at all. The color is vibrant and luminous, and I love that it can be built up for a more dramatic look. The multipurpose applicator makes it easy to create everything from a simple look to a smoky eye, and no primer is needed!  I would definitely buy this product again and recommend it to friends and family. If youu2019re looking for a liquid eyeshadow that delivers on color and longevity, the Shade 67s is a must-try! #MuchLuv

reviews.review_title: Must Have on the Go Shade!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect shade for all skin tones and just in time for the holiday season! I was really impressed with the longevity of this shade and it being smudge free. Itu2019s the right size to fit in your purse if a touch up is needed. The only thing I would say is needed is a blending shade to avoid a harsh lines with no contrast.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loooooove this eyeshadow. Iu2019ve tried the Stila liquid, and itu2019s gorgeous but I like this even better! The shimmer is very fine and beautiful, and the color is the perfect shade for hazel eyes.

reviews.review_title: Good formula, not my color though
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like this formula but didn't love the color. It was very light and because of that the shimmer wasn't super noticeable. There was minimal fallout though!

reviews.review_title: A must have it in you make up
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it ud83dude0d this is a real long lasting liquid Eyeshadow!! I got so many nice compliments!! I literally have on my eyes the whole day and it stayed in.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall, I like this product, it was easy to apply and didnu2019t feel greasy or cakey on my eyelids. I did notice some increasing after several hours of where but overall itu2019s a really good option.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Stunning product, always a match with the rest of my makeup shades... Easy to use and store.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm really liked this. I found that it was subtle enough for when I wanted just a pop of something but not necessarily a heavy eye makeup look. It wasn't tacky or sticky, so I didnt feel like I had a film on my eyelids that some liquid eyeshadows do. I can see this becoming a staple for my makeup routine. Especially for work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was able to achieve several beautiful eye looks with this eye tint (photos below). It has the perfect amount of shimmer/sparkle thatu2019s eye catching but not too much, it stays put all day and night, super lightweight, very bendable, and also very buildable depending on how much color you want. It has a sort of gel-like texture that feels nice on the eye and dries down  without feeling sticky.   I need to get more of these, because they make eye shadow so easy! I love that you can wear it alone for an easy daytime look or you can use it with other colors to get more dimensional/smokey looks for night time. Very happy I got this and want to try the viral black shade next!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really beautiful even without a base. Lasts all day even on my greasy eye lids I really love it. Versatility is great you can do just a little bit and looks great or do a lot. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very easy to use and the best part is it is non creasing on the eyelids and it stays for very long time the shade s are amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this liquid eyeshadow off and on for weeks and Iu2019ve really been enjoying it. I can apply it with a brush for a more sheer finish or use my finger for a more opaque finish, I like the diversity. The color compliments my green eyes as itu2019s a bronze tone. It has good lasting power but by the end of the day I do have slight creasing, hence the 4 star review. I feel at this price point this stuff should wear like armor with no creasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been loving this Armani eye tint! I love how easy it is to apply and I can just have this on my eyes and itu2019ll make my look. I like that the shimmer is subtle and not overbearing where I can wear it to work daily!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this eyeshadow. This was my first using this brand. It's a very shimmery and pretty color and looks great brown skin tone women. It was long lasting and I didn't have to reapply it through out the day. It is very pigmented. I did not have to use a eyeshadow primer before usage. I can't wait to try other shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Looks like a brown eye shadow with a glitter topper but with out the extra steps. I would recommend for anyone on the go who wants a one stop eye look with one product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this liquid eyeshadow so much! The longevity and smokiness or the color is amazing for a night out. I will be reaching for this very often!

The color is a stunning blend of soft mauve with subtle shimmer, perfect for both everyday wear and special occasions. The formula is lightweight and creamy, allowing for easy application and blending. What I love most is its long-lasting finish; it stayed vibrant throughout the day without creasing or fading.  Additionally, the applicator makes it convenient for on-the-go touch-ups. Overall, Shade 67s is a versatile and beautiful addition to any makeup collection. I highly recommend it for anyone looking to enhance their eye looks effortlessly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Armani eye tints are generally really great. They're perfect for one and done eyeshadow looks and they just look very elegant and sophisticated on the eyes. This particular shade, however, didn't quite live up to the standard that I have come to expect from the Armani line. The matte pink shade really doesn't blend as seamlessly as one would hope and it ends up looking a little patchy. I also think that the color itself is going to be a little hit or miss with people as it may look ashy on deeper skin tones. While I would recommend the eye tints in general, I wouldn't recommend this particular shade.  * I am a Sephora Community Ambassador and this is my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best liquid eyeshadows I've ever tried. The formula is lightweight and buildable. I have hooded eyes and it lasted all day without creasing. I can't wait to try the other shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omg ! This is the perfect shimmer for a bride ! Iu2019m obsessed with how sparkle it looks and how long lasting it is ! No other words! Stunning itu2019s subtle and elegant !

reviews.review_title: Perfect eyeshadow for day to night and events!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: #GiftedbyBzzAgent. Thank you for providing this eyeshadow for me to try and review.  I am a huge makeup fan have always really loved trying new shades and colors. As I'm getting older, I've been gearing more towards neutral colors, with also having some flair to my style. I really love Georgio Armani's quality as a brand and especially love the long lasting nature of their foundation, so I was thrilled to try the eyeshadow. I've wore this shimmer recently for a full day wedding where the eyeshadow did not budge at all for the whole day! Best of all, the shadow was buildable, so I could do a smoky eye with it, or even wear it on its own. It has a very nice creamy consistency, which makes it easy to apply with the soft brush applicator included or with one of my other brushes. I'm excited to try other shades in the range and am really excited to add this to my collection. The best parts of the eyeshadow are longevity of the cream and the lovely hint of color. I've already told several of my friends about it and they've already rushed out to buy them and have raved about it too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: *I received this free in exchange for my honest review * I'm really not a big fan of liquid eyeshadow usually. I find that they don't have the staying power of regular eyeshadow. Well that changes now!! I love this stuff! It goes on very nice and doesn't take a long time to dry, which is great because you don't have to wait to blink without it getting everywhere. The color is fantastic too, very pigmented. I personally like this shade because it's perfect for a night out or if you want a day without a lot of makeup. Either way, it's going to be perfect. Just enough of a sparkle too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for a review.   This goes on super smooth and lasts a long time. It feels silky smooth. It is a very light shade, so perfect for subtle makeup looks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Armani Beauty's Eye Tint Long-Lasting Liquid Eyeshadow in 67S Sparkle - bright champagne shimmer is such a gorgeous shade. It is very sparkly and looks great with a day look or a night look. The eyeshadow goes on smoothly, is easy to blend and build, and feels so nice on my eyelids. When it dries, my eyelids don't feel tight like they have when using other liquid eyeshadow. This one is the best I have ever used. I am so in love with this eyeshadow and have used it almost every day!

reviews.review_title: It is a must to do in my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yes this product is the best I try ever and long lasting and you know is a good brand

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Goes on smooth! Really easy to blend, pigment is amazing. Lasts all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dark skin and I took a couple of applications for the eye tint to show up on my skin. The product is easy too apply and doesn't take too long to dry unlike other liquid eyeshadows I've used in the past. I don't think the shade I used necessarily suits my skin tone when I used it alone, instead I layered it over a brown eyeshadow and I love the final look. It's possible that another shade would have looked better on me but overall, I think I'll just continue layering it over different eyeshadows for a shimmering look.

reviews.review_title: A new staple in my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this eyeshadow every day for the last week, and I absolutely love it! I prefer liquid eyeshadows over powder due to the convenience and ease of application, and I have tried many brands. This one is by far my favorite! It gives the most elegant shimmer, stays put, doesn't crease, and lasts all day! Plus, the color is perfection. I highly recommend and will be buying other shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shade is gorgeous! Looks lovely with cat eyeliner looks to add pop to my eyelids. I was afraid it would be too glittery when it arrived but it has a nice shimmer. I received this product for free in exchange for review.

reviews.review_title: soft look/ bold look depend on the layers applied
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Giorgio Armani Eye Tint in Shimmer Shade 67S, and Iu2019m in love! The texture is super smooth, making it so easy to apply, and the subtle shimmer gives my eyes a radiant glow without being too flashy. It blends perfectly for a soft or bold look, depending on how you layer it. Best part? It lasts all day without creasing or fading. This versatile shade is great for both everyday wear and special occasions, whether on its own or paired with other shadows. Itu2019s definitely a new staple in my makeup routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Armani Beauty Eye Tint Long Lasting Eyeshadow is a versatile, high-performing product that delivers both pigment and longevity. This liquid eyeshadow provides a smooth, crease-free finish, and is perfect for a range of looksu2014from subtle daytime wear to dramatic evening glam.  Pros:   1. Blendable Formula: The liquid formula is easy to blend with either fingers or a brush, allowing for a smooth and even application. It can also be layered for more intensity without becoming cakey.  2. Pigmented Shades: The color payoff is impressive. A single swipe gives you a vibrant, bold shade, but itu2019s also easy to sheer out for a more natural look.  3. Long-Lasting: True to its name, this eyeshadow stays put for hours. Once it dries down, itu2019s smudge-proof, crease-proof, and resistant to fading, making it ideal for long days or special occasions.  4. Multi-functional: It can be used not only as eyeshadow but also as an eyeliner or even a base to build on powder shadows for more dimension.  5. Lightweight Feel: Despite the strong pigmentation, it feels light and comfortable on the eyelids, never heavy or sticky.  Cons:   1. Dry Time: You need to work quickly when blending, as it sets fast. If you donu2019t blend it out in time, it can be harder to soften edges.  2. Price Point: Like most high-end products, it comes with a luxury price tag. While the performance justifies the cost, it may be a splurge for some.  3. Limited Applicator Precision: The doe-foot applicator is great for sweeping across the lid, but for more detailed or precise work, youu2019ll need a separate brush.  Overall, the Armani Beauty Eye Tint is an outstanding liquid eyeshadow for those seeking long wear and high impact. Itu2019s perfect for creating everything from effortless, everyday looks to more artistic and bold eye designs. If youu2019re willing to invest in quality, this product delivers.  Feel free to let me know if youu2019d like any specific details or tweaks added!

reviews.review_title: Long-lasting and super easy to use!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this Armani Eye Tint for a few weeks now, and Iu2019m really impressed! The cool brown shimmer in the Tobacco shade adds just the right touch of sparkle without being too much. It stays put all day without creasing, even with my oily eyelids. Application is super easy with the doe-foot applicator, and it blends effortlessly. This liquid eyeshadow has definitely become a must-have in my daily routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This liquid shadow applies very quickly, and dries down fast as well. I appreciate that, because I hate fanning my eyes waiting on a liquid shadow to dry so I don't get creases. This shade is a very pretty, neutral tone with shimmer. It's a shear color, so works great if you like a natural look with just a bit of shimmer to it. I've been wearing it to work, and it holds up all day without creasing until around 10-11 hours of wear. That's great wearability. I'd definitely recommend,  and I plan to buy additional shades because of how great this liquid shadow is. Liquids aren't typically a favorite for me, because it's so hard finding one's that hold up all day. This one lasted beyond my work day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I typically wear earthy shades and this was perfect! It applied with two swipes and dried down quickly, so I didnu2019t have any transfer. Really nice for a quick makeup routine. The shimmer almost made it look two toned - lighter on the middle part of the lid, and darker around the crease, making it look naturally blended. I would love to get more colors of these.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am completely and absolutely over the moon about my new eyeshadow! The color is stunning and it is made of excellent quality ingredients that are grntle with my skin. It is extremely versatile because it can be used during the day and night, regardless of the occasion. Itu2019s easy to apply and to remove, and it doesnu2019t crease at all. It is a must have for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This Armani Beauty Eye Tint Long-Lasting Liquid Eyeshadow is superb! I have never EVER tried such a beautiful liquid eyeshadow. Most liquid eyeshadows I have tried are sticky and swear or leave a weird crease in your eye. This stuff goes on like a liquid but once applied it literally becomes like a powder completely buildable and dries like a regular eyeshadow. I also have never tried any Armani Beauty products and now I really would like to try more, and especially try these different shades of eye tint. It's so beautiful. The packaging is even so luxurious and beautiful. 10 out of 10. Thanks to Buzzagent for sending me this product in exchange for my honest thoughtful opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this is a great product! It goes on so smooth, It blends easily. It does not feel heavy on my eyes . It also did not crease on my eyes .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly I think this is a great product! It goes on so smoothly. It blends out easily. It does not feel heavy on my eyes at all. It also did not crease on my eyes at all which is a problem I typically have. However I will say this particular shade is not for me. It would definitely work well as a base for other eye shadows but for me it doesnu2019t look good by itself. Like I said it blends easily but you lose a lot of the color when you do, I think this has more to do with the shade of the product than the product itself. Overall this is a really good product and I would recommend it in a different shade to add to your daily makeup routine because itu2019s so easy to use and performs really well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for almost a month, I love the results. It definitely is lightweight, long lasting, and very, very buildable. This is an eyeshadow product, but I also use it as highlighter and itu2019s so pretty. But be careful because it does dry quick ufffcufffcufffcufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this liquid eyeshadow! I haven't had great luck with liquid eyeshadows in the past as they are sometimes streaky, don't last long, and don't have a lot of pigment, but this one was a completely different story. I wore it all day- for almost 16 hours- and it was still there at the end of the night. The sparkle is absolutely incredible and shows upon first swipe onto your lids. You don't need to use a lot of it either which is great. I have a mini sample of another color and would consider purchasing this product in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought the application was easy. 67S is definitely a shimmer and not completely what I expected. However, if you are looking for a lighter eye shadow appearance, this is it.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product was exceptional! You only need a small dab that you can work with your finger over your eyelids. This lasted ALL night and I canu2019t wait to wear this for the holiday season!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thick + creamy. Excellent pigmentation, perfect shimmer. Could be used as a highlighter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the concept but I feel like the color vibrancy didnu2019t hold.  I love the eyeshadow as a base but not alone. It takes a few layers to get the true color and for the price, I expected a little more vibrancy. It is long lasting and it prolongs my other shadows when combined. I donu2019t love the smell but overall, itu2019s a nice product. May try other colors

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m really impressed with how this liquid eyeshadow holds up! It stays put for hours without creasing or smudging, and the color is super buildable, allowing me to go from subtle to bold easily. It feels lightweight, and the shimmer lasts all day, no primer needed. Perfect for anyone looking for a reliable, luminous shadow that actually lasts!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice color payoff thatu2019s not too much but gives a good shimmery pop of color. Itu2019s buildable and not chunky. Itu2019s easy to apply and super convenient for when Iu2019m rushing out the door.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like Armani Beautyu2019s makeup products. The Eye Tint Shimmer. It works really well. I got the 67S Sparkle- bright champagne color. The color is beautiful. Itu2019s easy to apply and long lasting. Also, love the packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This bright champagne shimmer is stunning. No chunks of glitter but a refined shimmer. It works beautifully as a topper or even alone. I love the twinkle it gives my lids. Plus it stays on and no fall out. This shade is truly special, you gotta swatch it to believe me.

reviews.review_title: Long lasting and blends very well
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very buildable. it dries fast but you can still fix it if you make a mistake. I was able to blend a regular eyeshadow with it and it blended very nicely. with my brown eyes it really did help me make a very low key smokey eye. a lot goes a long way and you can blend with a brush, or your finger quite easily. It is long lasting which is great cause it is still very hot in the desert and that eyeshadow hung on for dear life. I plan to get other shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product. It last long, the pigmentation it's amazing and I really loved it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve received this product a few weeks back and I love it! It goes on so smooth and feels light and silky. Application is easy with the shaped applicator tip it glides over your lid perfectly. The color is absolutely beautiful- it looks a lot darker than it actually is.  I was afraid it would be too dark but itu2019s quite light so you can apply a few coats to get your perfect shade. At the end of the day there was no buildup in my creases and no smudges!! I will definitely purchase this color again and Iu2019m excited to try a couple others too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wore the GA eye tint (shade 70M) two different night outs. Both times it was hot and impressed that my eye shadow stayed in place. It did not run down my fave and easy to apply with the applicator or slender makeup brush on face. Also to top it off, I double used it as my lipstick. Barely moved!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first time I have ever used liquid eyeshadow. Itu2019s amazing product. I brought this on my vacation and it didnu2019t leave any winkle on my eyes and last all day long. The color is perfect for everday using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Giorgio Armani Eye Tint Long-Lasting Liquid Eyeshadow in shade 68s is a game-changer, especially for someone with an olive skin tone like mine. The formula glides on effortlessly, and what I love most is how it complements my complexion, adding just the right touch of shimmer without overpowering my natural glow. The color is a rich, elegant hue that stays vibrant all day, making it perfect for both daytime and evening looks. It dries down to a smooth finish and feels weightless, yet it delivers a bold pop that enhances my eyes beautifully. This shade strikes the right balance between subtle and striking, perfect for anyone wanting to elevate their look with minimal effort. Plus, its long-lasting power means no need for constant touch-upsu2014a win in my book!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After trying this liquid eyeshadow during a night out. I really got to see how long-lasting it was. First off, the color is so gorgeous and natural. I like the shape of the applicator and how easy it makes applying the liquid eyeshadow. I was able to blend the eyeshadow easily with my fingers and it didn't feel to wet or clumpy. The shimmer from the eyeshadow looked so natural and didn't look chunky. I wore this eyeshadow all night with primer underneath and it didn't budge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Eye Tint Long-lasting Liquid Eyeshadow from Armani Beauty is gorgeous! It is so easy to apply and blend out that I can create a beautiful eye look in just a few minutes. I like that it doesnu2019t crease and it last long without smudging or fading away. This liquid eyeshadow is so pigmented and shinny. It is very lightweight and it doesnu2019t dry out the eyelid skin. I like that it is water resistant too so I can be outdoors and sweat without worrying about my eyeshadow. This is definitely a great addition to my makeup bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited about this liquid eyeshadow! It lasts all day and it's easy to blend. I usually wear pink eyeshadow, but I was not a fan of this shade on my light skin tone. I do plan to try different shades though! Great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love playing with makeup and rarely go a day without wearing it. I typically use powder shadow but was intrigued by the liquid variety. This Armani Beauty version blew my powder out of the water. The beautiful pale pink color brightened my look and stayed all day without creasing. It applied nicely and is super high quality. I am very happy with the soft padded applicator and the size of the tube. I am definitely a convert!

reviews.review_title: All-Day Pretty in Pink: No Smudge, No Fudge!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If there was an eyeshadow Olympics, Armani Beautyu2019s Eye Tint in Sakura would take home gold! This light matte pink is the perfect blend of elegance and durabilityu2014think of it as the marathon runner of eyeshadows. After a full 16 hours, I expected creases or at least a hint of smudging, but nope, this stayed put like it was glued to my eyelids (in the best way possible, of course).  The color is luminous, giving just enough pop without overpowering, and it's buildableu2014so you can go from subtle to statement in no time. And the multipurpose applicator? Genius. It can do everything from a classic eyeshadow look to a killer smoky eye, no primer needed. Armani, you've officially made me a fan of no-fuss, high-impact glam!  Seriously, I wore this through work, errands, and a Netflix binge, and it was like, No smudge? No problem!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This color was so beatiful and glided on with out any problem so easy to apply he color had a great shimmer you can blend it out for just shimmer or let it be bold

reviews.review_title: Not my color, but a great product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my review.  First of all this was definitely not my first choice of shade for this product.  I am not usually a pink girl or matte for that matter.  However, it is a very nice subtle color of pink if that's a color you are opting to wear.  I was impressed by it's longevity and that my eyeliner applied on top of it very nicely. I may consider a different color option in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this daily since receiving it and loving it. Itu2019s an easy, smooth application and can be as sheer as you like. Very easy to apply a light shimmer or a deeper, golden color. Itu2019s easy to remove but doesnu2019t budge during the day. Very suitable for a professional environment but layered a bit thicker and itu2019s jazzy enough for an evening look too. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I recently tried Giorgio Armani's Eye Show Tint, and I must say it exceeded my expectations. The formula is incredibly lightweight and glides on smoothly, providing an easy application that doesn't tug at the delicate skin around the eyes. One of the standout features is its pigmentation. A little goes a long way, and the colors are vibrant and true to what you see in the packaging. I was particularly impressed with how well it blends; it allows for seamless transitions between shades, making it perfect for both bold looks and subtle enhancements. The longevity is another huge plus. I've worn it for hours without any creasing or fading, which is a common issue with many tints. It holds up beautifully, even through a long day or night out, which is exactly what I look for in an eye product. As for the finish, it gives a lovely radiant look without being overly shimmery or glittery, striking the right balance for both daytime and evening wear. Overall, I highly recommend Giorgio Armani Eye Show Tint to anyone looking to elevate their eye makeup game. Whether you're a beginner or a pro, it offers versatility, quality, and that luxurious feel you'd expect from the brand.

reviews.review_text: I've loved Armani's Eye Tints since the first time I've tried them, and Shade 67 is my absolute favorite. It's a shimmery copper shade that really makes my eyes stand out! The applicator is easy to use and allows for precise application.  If you're looking for a high-quality eyeshadow that looks great and lasts long, I  recommend Armani's Eye Tint in Shade 67. reviews.review_text: I usually love everything from Armani, and their cosmetics are always amazing, but this cream eyeshadow was a bit too heavy for my taste. While I appreciate a bold look, the color came off too dark right from the start. I prefer building layers to gradually intensify the shade, but with this, it was already quite intense upon application. That being said, it did last a long time, which is a huge plus , it didnu2019t crease . The packaging is sleek and compact, which I love, making it easy to carry around. Overall, itu2019s a good product if you're looking for bold, long-lasting color, but it might not be ideal if you prefer more control over intensity.

reviews.review_title: It was good but not spectacular or anything.

reviews.review_title: Review for 67S, a shade not listed
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: While Armani Beauty is renowned for its luxurious products, the Eye Tint in 67S unfortunately falls short. Despite its high price point, this liquid eyeshadow offers a less-than-stellar experience.  One of the main drawbacks is its patchy application. Even with careful blending, the product tends to leave behind uneven patches of color. This can be particularly frustrating when trying to achieve a polished, professional look. Additionally, the color payoff is somewhat disappointing, especially considering the price. It requires multiple coats to achieve a noticeable intensity, which can be time-consuming and lead to a cakey appearance.  Furthermore, the longevity of the Eye Tint is questionable. While it claims to be long-wearing, it can crease and fade throughout the day, especially in warmer weather or with oily eyelids. This posed a major issue for me because I live in the desert, and I want my makeup to stay in place for extended periods.

reviews.review_text: I really love this eye tint, it lasts all day on me and itu2019s easy to apply. When you put it on it stays wet for a tiny bit so itu2019s easy to blend out without it drying on you. The colors are gorgeous & itu2019s great to use as a one and done look. reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Giorgio Armani Eye Tint Shimmer in shade 68 S, and I am impressed with its performance. The formula is lightweight and glides on smoothly, delivering a beautiful, shimmery finish thatu2019s both subtle and buildable. I love how versatile this product isu2014whether Iu2019m going for a natural look or something more dramatic, it works perfectly.  The pigmentation is stunning, with a soft glow that enhances the eyes without feeling too heavy or glittery. It also has great staying power, lasting throughout the day without creasing or fading, even without a primer.  Overall, this eye tint is a perfect addition to my makeup routine, combining luxury with ease of use. I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a high-quality, long-lasting eye product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The finish is metallic. The color is gorgeous with different types of lustre for a feel that is somewhere between satin and lustrous. This it the kind of thing you'd apply if you want to add some shine to the lid. Or, you could do what I did and wear it alone - the shine makes it so that the outer corners appear darker and the inner corners appear brighter simply because of how the light rays bounce off the shape of the eye. - Starts out sheer but is buildable. This is a good thing if you're using it to add some shine to your lid, as you'll still be able to see some of the baseline background color (if there is one). It blends quite sheer as well, but after a few strategically-placed coats, it should be pretty opaque. It's important to dab instead of swipe as much as you can. - The doe foot applicator with its fine tip really helps with precision - The sparkle/lustre is understated, classy, and elegant, making it a great product both for every day and a nice dinner out. If you want the bling bling this isn't the product for you. Note that it looks somewhat less sparkly after drying. - The formula contracts a little after it dries, leading to a tiny bit of wrinkling/bumping that is not super noticeable. However, given that the skin has lines and grooves and pores, this is par for the course with a lustrous, metallic finish. - This is a perfect option for my lazier days when I don't want to put on a ton of makeup but still want to look put together. Just swipe a bit of this on, maybe add a bit of mascara, and you have a really nice eye look. - Love the smooth, creamy texture that is not crumbly, clumpy, or sticky.

I picked the coolest shade I could find - cool beige matte - and it still looked like orange on my eyes. I'm guessing if you're anyone with yellow-toned skin, these colors will be a winner. But for us fair, rosy, blue-toned gals - not so much. PLEASE, Armani, and every other eye shadow person out there: There are a few of us left on the planet who are not golden. Back to the drawing board, please.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I saw a few beauty influencers on TT talking about this and so far itu2019s been a coin toss on influencer recommendations. But this product will definitely stay in my rotation. I bought gold ashes and cashew so I had a shimmer and matte to try. Iu2019ve used them separately and together and so far I am really happy with them both. The colors are subtle but beautiful and stay on for hours without creasing. Iu2019m currently going on hour 8 with gold ashes right now and it hasnu2019t budged. Cashew was the same. Plus they are so easy to put on and blend, I usually just use my fingers. I have ocular rosacea and oily-combo skin and havenu2019t had a problem. I also use the milk matte setting spray, which probably helps with the staying power. I put concealer and a light setting powder on my eyelids before I used these. I know it might seem like too many details, but I find extra details help me with a product Iu2019m on the fence about or have had issues with. Happy purchasing, beauties!

reviews.review_title: Patchy but Beautiful in a Sheer Application
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is beautiful if used as a sheer layer and with little manipulation. However, whenever I would try to blend, the eyeshadow would pick up on itself and look patchy. For example, I tried to blend the eyeshadow swatch pictured on my hand, but it started getting patchy. The shade Senso doesnu2019t show up much in a sheer layer on my skin tone, so not being able to build this up kind of made this a pass in my book. As far as color, Senso looks like a slightly metallic taupe upon first glance. But I noticed that this shade can look differently depending on opacity and lighting, which makes it an unexpectedly dynamic shade. The subtle sheen that this shade gives is also honestly lovely. Overall, I feel that if I had a deeper shade that I could wear in thinner layers, I may have liked this a lot better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Giorgio Armani eye tint shimmer in the Mahagony color (56S) from BzzAgent to try for free for my opinion. This is a long west luminous liquid eyeshadow. The 56S color is basically like a shimmery plum color (very beautiful hue of purple. Because it is a liquid he shadow it can be easy to apply a little too much eye shadow on. What I did when applying this is to take the brush (which is a triangle shaped brush, thin and angled slightly slanted if you look at it from the side), I removed excess eye shadow from the brush by rubbing it on the outer part of the bottle before taking it out. Then I applied it on the bottom part of my eye lid (closest to the lashes). If you are going for your entire eye lid to be this color, I would apply it uniformly on the entire bottom lid and then take a brush to blend it out nicely (I added a base of a freakish color looking powder eye shadow to give it a base before applying). I also tried doing like a duo shade u2014 I applied a layer of a nude powder shadow first, then I applied a base layer on the lower part of my eye lid of a light shimmery lilac colored shadow.
