I blended out this shadow and then I applied the Giorgio Armani eye tint to the outer corner part of my eye lid in like a sideway triangle shape. I then took my brush and blended and it gave me a very nice effect. I would recommend this product as the product doesnu2019t come off even if you rub your eye. It is truly long lasting and leaves a nice shimmery look. I would say the this is a high end product more to the luxury side which is why it costs $36 for the 0.13 Fl Oz bottle. However, I will say that the price does match what it states about being long lasting. The packaging of the bottle is also nice and elegant, fitting of the brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The beauty eye tint from Giorgio Armani applies to eye lids like a dream  I'm in love with the pigmentation and texture of the product so beautiful on my eyes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best liquid eyeshadow I have ever tried. It's smooth, stays put, doesn't crease and it's easy to blend. I've struggled with blending others I've tried and it either ended up looking patchy, non-existent or it just wouldn't blend at all. This one blends evenly and smoothly even as a matte color. The taupe color leans is a cooler neutral, so it doesn't look the least bit muddy like some. I love everything about it, plus it's such a time saver when I'm in a hurry!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from BzzAgent to try out and give my honest opinion on.  The packaging was very cute. The actual container that the product came in was sleek and VERY classy. It was easy to apply,  and with just the right amount of product on applicator. The color was very neutral and matte. I love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was perfect for everyday used you can add a shimmer over it if youu2019re going out and it will last

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: All liquid eyeshadow formulas are NOT created equal. This one is flawless. It lasts all day, doesnu2019t crease in my fine lines, and is perfectly buildable. It gives this ethereal shimmer with just a sheer coat on my lids, but can be built up to a blinding silver shade with another thin layer or two. It looks incredible as an inner corner highlight, and I have also gotten compliments wearing a little on my cheekbones as highlighter. I have a LOT of makeup and still reach for this all the time, so I would definitely recommend it to everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Shade camel is a perfect everyday, glide on and walk out the door eye shadow. Been using it for a few days and have been really enjoying it and loving the color. Application is easy and dries down quickly. Lasts a good amount too. I received this product for free for review purposes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so blown away with how much I love this liquid eyeshadow! It has a very creamy texture that glides on smoothly, and only a small amount is needed to get the job done. It's very pigmented, gives great coverage, and blends easily! It definitely lives up to it claims of being long-lasting and crease proof. I love the unique applicator it has, all the different looks I can create, and how natural it feels. It's perfect for a day at the office or a night out on the town. I will definitely purchase different shades and continue to recommend to everyone I know!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this eyeshadow cream. Itu2019s long lasting and super pigmented. Itu2019s my new go-to eyeshadow. I plan on buying other colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow has a very smooth texture and it melts really well with my makeup. It is easy to apply. This shade is very neutral. Like it.

reviews.review_title: The best multi-use liquid eyeshadow Iu2019ve ever used
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried many brands of liquid eyeshadow, but none have been pigmented enough to double as a liner. I love this pigment and the color of this, and I will definitely be buying more colors. Iu2019ve gotten so many compliments when I wear this liquid eyeshadow, Iu2019ve told everyone who has asked exactly what it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow goes on smoothly and is gorgeous. I received so many compliments!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow goes on so smooth and blends well! You can blend it out to be super sheer or leave it and layer it to be a more opaque eyeshadow. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eye tint is beautiful. Very pigmented, easy to blend, has a nice shimmer, and a little goes along way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the gorgeous deep red wine color of the Georgia Armani Eye Tint Night Viper. So pretty and didnu2019t smudge through the day.itu2019s darker than I was expecting, but a very beautiful color for a deep wine smokey eye.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s a very pretty color honestly. In my skin tone itu2019s very beautiful and natural looking. I applied two layers to give it a pop. The bottle is so pretty as well. Looks great on my makeup counter

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely long lasting and I only saw minimal creasing in my eyelid. I didnu2019t really like the applicator so still used a brush to spread.

reviews.review_title: Similar to Eye Paint but Better!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best liquid eyeshadow I have encounter. I was really worried that it would be like every other eye paint that Iu2019ve tried it where you put it on and it dries fairly quickly and then creases. This glides on making it easy to blend out with a fluffy brush. Itu2019s long lasting and doesnu2019t dry out and crease. You can use the wand to create winged looks easily. I love this shade as you as do a wide variety of things but I typically use it as an eyeliner on my lid. Iu2019m very impressed overall with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the formula! The one thing I noticed is it kinda drys fast in my opinion but other then that itu2019s great the color pay out is great for I really enjoy it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like how easy this eyeshadow is to apply. I can add it to my everyday look and the color matches my skin tone very well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the feel and ease of application. The eye shadow color I received was too dark for my skin color but worked great as a eye liner. Would definitely buy this product but in another color

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Application of this eye tint is easy to use even though it looks a bit clunky at first glance. Just apply and use your finger to blend in. The bottle opens easy and there's enough product in there to last a while. It goes a long way. I'm interested to try other colors.

reviews.review_title: Not bad but not a new favorite
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the staying power, and it's very pigmented(love!!!), but it is a little thick for my preference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am all about ease without sacrificing quality and this FIT the bill. I love the doe foot application and the product itself goes on so smooth. The taupe color is the perfect neutral for everyday wear. Just enough color to make your eyes pop, but not too dark. I put a base color on my lids and pop this sucker on and it really makes a difference! I do have really dark eyes, and I was in love with this color. The one critique or suggestion I would say is that it can be a little hard to blend out if you let it sit too long, so once you apply, it's good to try and soften the edges asap. No complaints here, i need more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color that I received to test is 18M, kind of like a deep, pinkish-nude. Itu2019s described as a u201clongwear luminous liquid eyeshadowu201d. I absolutely agree that it is longwear - it dries down really quickly and doesnu2019t seem to smear or smudge. I do kind of disagree with luminous as a descriptor, though. The liquid eyeshadow dries down to a matte finish, and then has some small sparkles throughout, when I think luminous it evokes a though of a dewy glow. That aside, the color is beautiful and the lasting wear is phenominal.  One small detail that I really love is the angle and shape of the applicator. The shape is perfect for easily applying to your eyelid, and itu2019s slightly angled to help with precision!  Once applied, itu2019s super light and feels velvety to the touch. It is not scented, which I love! Because of how long lasting it is, I would absolutely love to try some of the other colors. I think this nude color works great as a base to build off of as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The color is beautiful but the eyeshadow dried very quickly, leaving no time to blend out the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how fast this eye shadow is to apply. It saves me so much time getting ready. I would love to try other shades. This one adds a tiny hint of glimmer and color to my lids but I am so pale this doesnu2019t show up well enough. I think this would look much better on someone with dark skin. One coat is too light but two makes it tend to look caked on. The hole in the center of the applicator can leave streaks so Iu2019m thinking blending this while itu2019s still wet with a makeup brush may work better but I didnu2019t have one at the moment to try it that way. This lasts all day without reading which is excellent for my aging hooded eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The application was smooth when putting on and dried down nicely.  It actually lasted all day and itu2019s nice itu2019s buildable.  The color I received was light enough I used it as an eye primer too.  It felt like I wasnu2019t wearing anything at all.  It wasnu2019t sticky at all either.  Itu2019s expensive for what it is and I donu2019t see myself buying it for the future when there are cheaper alternatives out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really like the color of this shadow. It's subtle and perfect for everyday use. I will say that it does rub off easily but that's not a deal breaker given that as long as you don't rub your eyes throughout the day, this shadow will last.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This eye tint is beautiful, silky eye color that glides on flawlessly with a little bit of shimmer. I like to wear it when I do a Smokey eye. It definitely makes a statement.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good product. It's easy to apply and you only need a small amount. I think this shade was a little dark for me, but I made it work. I will say that while I like the product and it lasts all day, it's too pricey for me to use all the time. I can get a whole palette for the same price as one of these shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in love with the pigmentation and texture of the product. It glides on smoothly and blends easily. It doesn't crease throughout the day and delivers a beautiful wash of color to the lids. Perfect for everyday, the office, and night out. I've tried so many liquid shadows and I come back to these. Now I have quite a few eye tints in my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this eye tint. The color was very pretty. It's not overly dark. It gives a good coverage, you do not have to use a lot. Just make sure it dries properly before applying more. It didn't smudge throughout the day. I like the applicator, very convenient. Overall it's a good product & I would use it again. It is a bit pricey though, so have taken a star away for that.

reviews.review_title: Nice but not worth the splurge
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Giorgio Armani Beauty Eye Tint in the color light nude. The application was smooth but your can only do one eye at a time before it dries. I love the lightweight feel and how it was buildable. It lasted all day and I was impressed itu2019s staying power. The color I received was pretty but barely noticeable.  As much as I liked it, I donu2019t think it is worn the splurge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have recently become a fan of this type of eye shadow. I started with the about face and decided to try this. I love how you can concentrate the color in some areas so easily and then blend out others. The shade leather made a great base for a brown Smokey eye. I definitely want to try other shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shade is actually stunning! It gives me the perfect pop to my eye looks and looks amazing lighting tapped on as a highlighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in the color Camel to try and the stock photo was beautiful and in person it is beautiful as well I just didn't realize how close it was to my skin color. I've been using this as a base color and it goes on smooth and is silky. Blends great with other brand and shadows. Great for neutral and no makeup looks but I'll probabaly buy this in a brighter color for an easy one and done look. Camel is definitely a matte shade and if you have a lighter skin tone I'd say get a more fun color unless you want a nude. This is that perfect foundation beige you want to see in every palette but it's not the one you ever use on its own for a full look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Compared to the eyeshadow I use, this is absolutely top tier! The color is everything. The benefits for me of having this is that it goes with all my looks. Definitely looking to purchase more shades. I've already told my friends about this & everyone who asked about my look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the quality of the eyeshadow. I wish the applicator were a bit longer though. I also wish it had higher pigmentation, or was less sheer. I didn't try to layer it, but I was not sure how that would've worked with it going on as a cream and then turning to powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love itu2019s my favorite I got Giorgio Armani Beauty Eye Tint 18M- Light Nude for free

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! The beauty eye tint from Giorgio Armani applies to eye lids like a dream. One thing to note is that it dries fast so you have to work fast. I got shade Gold Ashes. It's a beautiful pale pink/gold shimmer. I used it on my eyelids alone and also on another day as a topper to my eyeshadow look. It lasted all day and did NOT crease! I usually have an issue with other brands creasing but that is not the case with the eye tints by G.A.!  It's a very thin product and could be used even as a cheek bone highlight!! It's absolutely beautiful. I highly recommend and will be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So good! Beautiful shimmer and shade, blends and drys well, even mixes great with other shadows, exactly what I need, love it and want every color please.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this color and how easily it applied to the eye. You can pat it out with your finger for a few seconds then it dries down. I didn't notice any smudging and it lasted a long time, but still came off easily. I wish the wand was a little bit longer and the applicator just a bit smaller.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s fantastic!! The color, dry time, the applicator, everything!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the blend, and the smoothness - looks natural and brings my eyes pop when applied to my regular makeup routine vs when not. I like it quite a lot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this is buildable. You can sweep it over your eyes for a quick day look or build it up for a sexy night out makeup look. It lasts and doesnu2019t affect my sensitive eyes. I donu2019t particularly like this shade of silver. But would love to try others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Giorgio Armani Beauty Eye Tint free from BzzAgent and Giorgio Armani Beauty in exchange for my honest opinion.  The eye tint went on like cream, but turned to powder.   The color is beautiful  and works great by itself or with other colors.  Its very lightweight and gives a barely there feeling. It lasts all day without smearing and is almost waterproof.  Definitely something I will continue using!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very beautiful pigment and this stays on my eyelids better than a powder eyeshadow. Vibrant not not too gaudy since you can have it sheer with a small amount. My only qualm is I wish the ingredients were better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you have blue eyes just buy this color right now. This is the perfect rose gold/bronzey eye look! The formula glides on perfectly, does not crease, and does not budge. I have never found that in any other liquid eyeshadow. I will definitely be buying more colors because this is the most perfect on the go glam!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff works great! Lasts all night long with no creasing at all.  I did apply with a brush to get a more precise application, but it goes on butter smooth and stays put.  I cannot wait to get more colors!

reviews.review_title: Easy to apply, doesn't crease or smudge!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow is really long lasting, it didn't smudge or crease, and had a nice color. You can either blend it with a brush for a more natural look, or layer for a bolder look. I liked the neutral color for every day wear, but I would also be interested in a super bold blue or purple color so I hope they keep expanding their selection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color variety and easy to blend. Lasts all day and can be worn by itself.really enjoyed using this product.

reviews.review_title: Definitely a must have for nights out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely recommend it! It makes for a great edgy look among many others. Goes on easy and doesnu2019t snugged easily either. Itu2019s amazing, I want other colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This new Giorgio Armani Beauty Eye Tint is just superb! It goes on smooth with an easy to apply applicator. The color is so rich. You can go with just one layer or add more for a deeper color. It really stays put! Iu2019ve used as an eyeshadow, smudge and a liner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this eye tint! It goes on smooth and is shimmery but not too dramatic! It doesnu2019t cake up like others Iu2019ve tried in the past. I definitely would recommend this for anyone looking for a smooth, shimmery eye pop that isnu2019t super dramatic but still very pretty and noticeable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical of this shade at first, and even the idea of using a matte shade. This formula is absolutely incredible, so smooth and it doesn't crease at all, even after hours and hours of wear. The Deep Nude shade is beautiful and matches my natural skin tone perfectly. This has replaced all neural eye shades in my collection, I absolutely love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the opportunity to try a complimentary sample of the Giorgio Armani Beauty Eye Tint in 27S - Sunset in exchange for my honest review. This was my first time trying out an Armani eye tint and was so impressed with the quality and longevity of the product. Sunset is a gorgeous and unique pink-red color that can be easily shaded out or built up on the eye depending on how much color you are comfortable with. For me, I loved applying a small amount of the eye tint that was just enough to sheer out and compliment my green eyes in an easy, daytime look. The tint itself goes on so smoothly with no caking or creasing. What was extra fabulous is that the color lasted all day without the need to reapply. I seriously love this product and canu2019t wait to try other shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical because I find that most cream eye shadows are too much. However, this was perfect for me! It wasn't heavy or sticky. It glides right on and you can build up the color. I am now wearing this every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Shade: It's a nice nude shade for me. It matches my lid perfectly, so I can acheive a no makeup makeup look.   Formula: it glides on easily and is buildable. It also plays well with powder shadows enough for a smoked out look. It doesn't patch up or flake off either.   I also like it because it is pigmented enough to be used in my brows or as a quick contour shade.   Packaging: The packaging is small enough to throw it in your bag and go. The applicator allows you to apply all over or in precise areas if you want to use it along the waterline or as a liner.  Overall, it's a good liquid shadow, but it's not anything new.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this product. The color is amazing, very pigmented. It was not sticky at all and dried nicely on my skin. The wand was easy to use and I thought it was well designed. The amount of shimmer in this product was perfect. I paired this color with a dark grey shadow for a beautiful u201cnight outu201d look. It is very pretty by itself and looks very seductive! I can't way to try other colors!

reviews.review_title: I love the long lasting finish
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just received my Giorgio Armani Beauty Eye Tint in shade 27S- SUNSET. I absolutely love the shimmery color. It is buildable, you can add a little for a subtle look or more for a more dramatic effect. It goes on smoothly and doesnu2019t crease on my eyes. I highly recommend it and will be purchasing other shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product was really pigmented, and it took the smallest amount. The color was really pretty, and it lasted on the eye a very long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the highly pigmented and smooth application! Not a shade Iu2019d normally choose but I had fun using it. I did have some trouble blending it and I think you have to do that when itu2019s still wet. Loved the applicator and it worked really well. Iu2019d love to try more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tend to do a full smoky-ish eye for most occasions, even just shopping. But sometimes I need something quick and easy to just run in somewhere, and this eye tint is perfect for that! Just a couple of swipes with the handy doe foot applicator and my lids have a wonderful sparkle and pop of color! It blends well, and lasts all day! I can't wait to grab some other colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eye tint from Giorgio Armani - the color 30M Taupe is perfect for me as I love neutral eye looks. Packaging is luxe and I love being able to apply the product directly to my lids with the brush. Definitely want to try out more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok honestly I dont normally use liquid eyeshadows because I've tried one brand in the past and it felt very uncomfortable, almost like a sticky heavy feeling on my lids but after using this one it has completely changed my mind, I love how it glides on so smoothly and blends out seamlessly. It last all day long without any creasing or fading and it's so lightweight that I forget that I'm even wearing anything. I absolutely love that I can do a neutral everyday look, a smokey eye or build up the pigment for a more glamorous look. The applicator makes it so easy to apply and the best part is I can use this anywhere without any brushes/tools. I ran to the internet to check the price of these because I definitely want to try different colors and the shimmers, it's a bit pricey $30 but in all honesty it's worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i was really excited about this eyeshadow but unfortunately it didnu2019t work for me. it dries way too quickly not allowing me to diffuse it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eye tint is so nice! After using this product now for a few weeks, I am so satisfied. It applies so smoothly. The wand allows for a fine precision application or a more blended look. It is also buildable for a deeper tint. Compared to other eye tints I've used, this is better. It doesn't bleed into the fine lines/wrinkles around my eyes. It doesn't crease. It lasts me all day long. The shimmer is so pretty and not overly sparkly. I also used it under regular eye shadow as a primer and it works great! The packaging is attractive and easy to use. I highly recommend this eye tint!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eyeshadow, the color is beautiful, the tool is so nice, the texture 100 points. Super easy to apply. The texture is light, perfect for daily use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so pretty. It is very sheer and is perfect if you just need a simple, beautiful look. The product is easy to use and work with. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the applicator! And the color is gorgeous and really makes my eyes pop!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been a lovely addition to my make up routine for special occasions. The shimmer is eye catching, long lasting and easy to apply. I tend to put it over my eye shadow thatu2019s already in place but you can also use it on its own for my more subtle sparkle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Giorgio Armani Beauty Eye Tint in Gold Ashes. It's a beautiful shade and the shimmer is noticeable but not overpowering. Gold ashes is surprisingly a little more silvery than gold. It spreads onto the eyelid well compared to other products. However, it is a little hard to build because it sticks to the eyelid and clumps with more than one application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Giorgio Armani Beauty Eye Tint 36M- LEATHER is one of the darkest liquid eyeshadows colors I've tried before, but it also stayed on my eyelids without fading or shifting. When compared to other liquid eyeshadows I've tested, it adheres quite well and is difficult to remove! Giorgio Armani is a luxury brand with a track record for offering high-quality goods, including cosmetics! I'm quite eager to buy more eye tint colors from Giorgio Armani. I advise others to check out the eye tint by Giorgio Armani, as it is very easy to apply with the attached wand and the color will stay on your eyelid throughout the day without lifting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried Giorgio Armani Eye Tint Long-Lasting Liquid Eyeshadow in shade 18M. Itu2019s a nude, light beige color with a matte finish. I was concerned it would look kind of like concealer with the color, but itu2019s very nice on your eyelids - subtle and natural but you can tell thereu2019s something there. The wand was easy to use to apply, it was bendable, and, most impressively, it lasted all day with no creases or smudges whatsoever. Iu2019m a fan and highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been a fun product to play around with. I tend to lean more towards natural looks with maybe some pop of color here and there. I was able to add this to my eye makeup for that pop of color that is still subtle but fun.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After 2 weeks of wearing the eye tint in shade Silver 1s I am extremely happy with my results. It is a beautiful silver that shimmers and makes my green eyes pop. It glides on smoothly and lasts all work day! I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The applicator provides smooth & full coverage. It felt luxurious as I was applying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this product. The color is amazing, very pigmented. It was not sticky at all and dried nicely on my skin. The wand was easy to use and I thought it was well designed. The amount of shimmer in this product was perfect. I paired this color with a dark grey shadow for a beautiful u201cnight outu201d look and I paired with a light shimmery pink for a fun day look. I also thought it was pretty by itself. I love how easy this was to apply and how quickly it dried.   I received a free sample of this item and my review is based on my experience with the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Giorgio Armani Beauty Eye Tin is perfect.  You can be as dramatic with it or more subtle.  It goes on flawlessly and give you a dramatic eye tint.  If you want a more subdued look, just dab a bit with a tissue and it's great for a nice daytime look.  I got mine in Sunset and it is perfect with my skin tone and foundation.   After wearing all day it does not crease or flake.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in my mid-40s with medium tone skin and wanted something that would be good for an every day glow. I love this product on my eyelids under my nude shadows. It's perfect for what I was looking for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was dissatisfied with the actual application.  It was clumpy and didnu2019t apply smoothly.  I did manage to use it as an eyeliner and I liked that.  Iu2019d of course give the brand another try knowing it could just be the quality of the product I used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: #eyetint in the color 36M #leather I'm obsessed and can't wait to do a full look with this shadow. Color is very pigmented and can seriously get away with using this as a liner or even brows!! Creamy formula that lasts ALL DAY!! Can't wait to try the other colors.

reviews.review_title: Liquid eyeshadow, long lasting I love it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lately I can say Iu2019m a liquid eyeshadow fanu2019s. Easy to use, great colors and long lasting. This product is amazing! And the color is totally different than other colors I have tried before, I wanted to take the risk and try something different. Iu2019m happy! Iu2019m thinking to get other colors. Recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually go for a very natural look when I decide to wear makeup. Wearing eye makeup usually is not on the menu when I do a natural look but this is now a staple. It looks so good against my skin tone & it is easy to apply.  I used one layer and it was pigmented enough for the look I was trying to achieve. I think I'll stick with the leather color for now and branch out to the other ones later.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: very easy to use matte yet not drying last all day long without creasing. the color was very similar to my eye lod shade but applies great with powder eye shadows. the applicator is slightly slanted with a point that glides on perfectly to ur eye lid. it's easy to smudge out and wear alone or to build up with other eye shadows.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the packaging-itu2019s very classy. The creamy shadow applies easily and blends beautifully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the Giorgio Armani Beauty Eye Tint in color 20M- CAMEL. It is a true camel color and very pretty-a great neutral, especially for my greenish/blue eyes. I have sensitive skin and it did not irritate my eyes/skin at all. So thankful for that! The formula was super creamy and easy to blend. I loved the doe foot applicator, it was easy to use. My only complaint was that it creased. I will try an eye primer next time. Overall, very pease!

reviews.review_title: A new staple item for my makeup collection!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shadow glides on smooth and doesnu2019t crease like most cream or liquid shadows. The color is super pigmented. Itu2019s easy to blend and you can easily build up the color to your preference so itu2019s great for a day or night look. The first day I wore it I got three different compliments on my eyeshadow. The next time I wore it, I received more compliments. This will be a shadow that I use at least three times a week moving forward.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Giorgio Armani Beauty Eye Tin  is a fabulous fast-setting liquid eyeshadow.   The color Leather is a gorgeous, deep neutral brown. Itu2019s simple at first glance but becomes more nuanced as you appreciate it, not unlike itu2019s namesake.  The eye tint is  a thin matte formula that doesnu2019t go patchy, nor does it cake on itself when layered. The applicator is the same hollow diamond doefoot as the Armani liquid lip colors.   Leather is definitely a capital L Look color, but, paired with a thin brush, itu2019s also the best eyeliner Iu2019ve ever used. Highly recommended for this alone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this eyeshadow. The color is absolutely gorgeous. It is so easy to apply with the applicator. One swipe is enough for daytime but can also build it up for night time. The eyeshadow stayed on all day without fading or creasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product in the shade night viper. It was easy to apply and top quality. It lasted surprisingly long and looked amazing. It really rook my makeup to the next glamourous level!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The tint is a thin liquid eyeshadow. It feels light on the skin. It has fantastic pigmentation. It doesn't crease and easy to blend out. The sunlight makes it shimmer so beautifully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous product! The color is beautiful and the application is effortless. I can apply it with a finger or a brush, both with ease. Great for a one-shadow look or in use with other shadows.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eye tint is packaged beautifully. The applicator makes it easy to deposit the product exactly where you want it. I tried the color, Sunset, which is a rosy taupe with a lot of shimmer. It's slightly iridescent. I like to dab a little directly to the center of my lid and blend it with the pad of my ring finger. Once it dries, I blend it with a brush to make sure I don't leave any harsh lines. The color payoff is good with one coat but you can add more. It washes off easily (only water) but stays on for hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Giorgio Armani Beauty Eye Tint free from BzzAgent and Giorgio Armani Beauty in exchange for my honest opinion. The eye tint has a thin cream texture that dries fast but is easy to work with as a base or foundation for other products.  It has good pigmentation without feeling heavy. It lasts all day, does not crease,  and works well with other products layered on top rather than being blended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest opinion. Totally recommend easy to use eye tint. I loved that it stayed on all day. After a 12 hour shift, It did not crease. It was so easy to put on no need to reapply or touch up throughout my day.  Gonna have to try the shimmer color next.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the Armani Luminous Silk foundation and concealer. I now also love this eyeshadow. I have many taupe eyeshadows from high-end to drugstore brands. Taupe is my go-to color as it is unique and looks great on green/blue eyes. The Armani Eye Tint is a great shade, and it is nice to have a matte version as so many eyeshadows are sparkly. I love to wear this to work to look put together. This eyeshadows stays put and does not crease, which is hard for creamy formulas to get right. I can't wait to try other shades in the line!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Giorgio Armani Beauty Eye Tint free from BzzAgent and Giorgio Armani Beauty in exchange for my honest opinion. The eye tint has a thin cream texture that dries fast, but is easy to work with. So smooth, not pasty or clumpy.  It has good pigmentation and works great for a wash of color or can be built up without feeling heavy. It lasts all day, did not crease,  and works well with other products. Yes! I am definitely getting more of these.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a soft, creamy liquid eyeshadow. Itu2019s sheer but easy to build up. Highly recommend a primer; I had some creasing without it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this shadow is pigmented and very easy to blend looks amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this was easy to use. You can also apply light or heavy. It has a decent wear time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice eyeshadow. Doesn't crease or smudge and washes off very easily. Color is beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Long lasting silver shimmer that lasts all day. Only negative is that you cannot use a brush after .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Giorgio Armani Beauty Eye Tint complimentary from Bzzagent in exchange for my honest review. Wow, what an amazing product! I was skeptical because I have never used liquid eye shadow before. But I absolutely love this! It goes on smooth with the applicator. Itu2019s a great color that matches my skin tone perfectly. It lasts all day. Works well with my makeup routine. Iu2019m very much impressed. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think these are great! Goes on creamy . Easy to blend out. Long lasting . Easy to work with. I definitely love these!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing!! The color is beautiful and the fixation on the skin is another positive point, it lasts a long time!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first time I have a chance to try out Giorgio Armani liquid eye shadow. In my opinion, the liquid form is easy to apply but itu2019s very hard to blend if compare with the powder eye shadow. I also donu2019t like the color.  The only thing I like is this shadow stays pretty long. I tried to wash it out with water and it definitely didnt come off so I had to use makeup remover.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loooove the formula, but I am not a fan of the brush or the color (1S - Silver). The brush doesnu2019t pick up a lot of color and is harsh on the eyes. It did not offer good color payout. Things went more smoothly applying with my fingers in a dabbing motion. First coat is really sheer, which is nice for just subtle shimmer. After waiting a few seconds, I applied a second coat which made the color more vibrant. I donu2019t think silver is a good color for me as an overall color, but I think this would be great for an accent or highlight color! Overall, I like this shadow but would like a better applicator.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried just about every liquid eye shadow on the market. I love a good monochromatic look. Itu2019s quick and easy to do. This Giorgio Armani eye tint makes it so easy to get a beautiful eye look in seconds. The formula is smooth and dries down to last all day. It looks exactly the same as freshly applied at the end of the day. No creasing for flaking. Itu2019s perfect! You can build up the color for more intensity or sheer it out for a subtle shine. It even spreads nicely over powder shadow to use as a topper if you like. Itu2019s so versatile and easy to use. The shade I received 27 Sunset is a pretty pink/purple shimmer. Totally gorgeous! Definitely getting other colors. Worth every penny. Donu2019t waste your money on any other product like this. This wonu2019t disappoint. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really pretty formula. Wish I would have gotten a different color, because this one is very close to my skintone, but it makes for a good crease shade.

reviews.review_title: Giorgio Armani Beauty Eye Tint 12S- GOLD ASHES
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: wow, what a beautiful color, very subtle and with that touch of shine, nothing exaggerated, it looks very elegant, I feel elegant wearing it, I honestly fell in love with this color, it's perfect and of course I want to have it for the rest of my life, it's just what I've been looking for for years. really beautiful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Goes on easily but dries and sets quickly, so make sure you apply it and blend fast. Sheer color, almost not evident. . Lasting power is top-notch, so make sure you are using a super makeup removal process. I'm interested in the darker colors and how the transparency works with those.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was a truly beautiful color and felt smooth to the touch at first. As I applied and it set and dried it looked a little too cakey for my taste.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised by Giorgio Armani Beauty Eye Tint 27S- SUNSET. I have mocha skin so many eyeshadow tints, no matter the color, look like a slight shimmer to the eye with no pigment. That was not the case for this. Sunset has a beautiful pink color that made my eyes pop. The application is easy to put on and dries quickly. Overall, I really like it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this is light weight on my eye lids! The color is natural as I wanted it to blend with whatever makeup I wear for the day. I was not aware it is matte. It has buildable coverage if you want more color

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Aside from the bright color on my complexion, I love how easy this was able to glide on when applying. Application was easy and the color payoff was very bright. It maintained its sheen and shine. Very blendable and buildable. Would absolutely recommend and would purchase in another shade closer to my liking, something with gold

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this formula, so easy to blend out and a beautiful color. Great everyday shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This applies smoothly and can be very pigmented when layered. If you want a soft look apply and small amount and blend but if you want a deep burgundy look apply another layer. It blends out great and stays on all day without fading. I absolutely love it! Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually avoid liquid eye products because I find that they crease easily. This product did not do that at all. Application was easy and the color payoff was bright. It maintained its sheen and shine. Very blendable and buildable. Would absolutely recommend and would purchase in another shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the way it shimmers on my skin tone, easy to apply and feels like nothing is on once it's been applied, truly feels luxious

reviews.review_title: Great for day and night looks
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This liquid eyeshadow is just bold enough on my fair skin to be noticeable. It's a great daytime shadow to just swipe on and go, but it's also awesome as a base for adding other products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I found this matte version to be patchy, hard to remove and it stained my eyes a weird greenish brown color. I'd try the shimmers but this was a no go for me. Also the taupe had a weird greenish yellow tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved this one, the color is truly metallic (more like a champagne than an orange gold). I sometimes use it as a highlighter instead of eyeshadow and it works great. One point to note is that you need to use your fingers to spread it, if you use a hard brush you will see the strokes but if you use a soft brush or your fingers it works amazingly. The pigment is very potent, honestly no shimmer eyeshadow I have ever tried compares to this. Definetely a keeper for bold eyeshadow, light shimmer, inner corner to bright up the area or highlighter

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am now addicted to this eye tint. I love that it is very lightweight, but you can build the color up if needed. I work full-time at home now, but I still like to have a little make up on, and this is perfect. I want to get more shades now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A beautiful warm color. It glides on smooth and blends great. It can also be used with powder eyeshadows.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I actually was very surprised by this. I usually go for a more glittery eye look, so when I tried this, it made me realize that I should do matte more! It applied easily, very creamy and pigmented. Although, I did set it with an eyeshadow just because I wasn't sure if it was going to crease, but it held up really well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from bzzagent in exchange for an honest review. I have never used liquid eyeshadow and was interested in how this would work. This went on very smooth and a small amount went a really long way. I was able to blend this beautifully and got a very rich, full coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the camel color of this product and it is a satin/matte flesh tone on me. From the applicator, the product applies with decent coverage, but goes sheer when blended. I tried applying a second layer and it slid off. I most likely will use this as a shadow base for other colors instead

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried this liquid eyeshadow and I really like the formula. The product applies evenly without streaking or creasing. Its buildable for extra pigment and works well with my powder eyeshadows.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, this liquid eyeshadow is AMAZING! I tried the color 36M u201cleatheru201d. It works so well as a natural tint using a small amount and blending it out or applying a couple layers to make a more Smokey night time eye. It applies so smoothly and dried in a beautiful matte color without creasing or rubbing off. The application brush is stunning! So easy to apply and the little wand is amazing for a small cat eye! Iu2019m in LOVE with this liquid eyeshadow and going to immediately buy more colors!! Donu2019t sleep on this purchase! Armani did it RIGHT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this color for the crease maybe, but itu2019s difficult to blend out. I wouldnu2019t use it as an all over lid color, the color reminds me of foundation. It dries quickly and has good staying power. Iu2019d definitely give some of the other colors a try before I completely rule this product out. The applicator seems a little flimsy for Armani.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a full size Armani Matte Eye Tint in the shade 30 Taupe for free from BzzAgent in exchange for my honest review. This liquid eyeshadow is described as: Long-Wearing, Blendable, Mistake-Proof, Vibrant Color, Creamy, Lightweight, Easy to Use and Crease-Proof! After using it for a while, I can definitely say that this liquid eyeshadow is: long-wearing, lightweight, blendable, easy to use and crease-proof! Howeveru2026 I did have problems with the vibrancy of the color. It was a little patchy and a little greasy going on even though it dried down nice it wasnu2019t as opaque and creamy like I wouldu2019ve wanted. However, with a little layering and blending, it comes out nice! Itu2019s just not a u201cone swipeu201d type of product for me. Good job, Giorgio!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a must have for sure! I was a little skeptical of the color because itu2019s definitely nude.. but it just polished my whole eye look. Cleaned everything up and made it look flawless.  Besides the color being great, it is so smooth and light. It really feels great on! The liquidness of it keeps it from leaving little sprinkles all over your face like other eyeshadows. Itu2019s just a great product over all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is a very thin and translucent eye makeup. I prefer an eye makeup that is more bold and noticeable. When applying this you could barely tell there was anything on my eyelid. Maybe I need to try and layer the product. But probably not something I would purchase. I have oily eyelids so maybe that's the problem. This product rubs off easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very natural and pretty for everyday. Wears well on the lid too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has converted in my favorite eye shadow hands down. First of all is very long lasting I have wear it a couple of times and even after sweating and dancing it stayed perfect. It also blends beautifully on the skin and it doesnu2019t crease at all. The color is beautifully pigmented and non sticky. I already ordered more colors

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: First and foremost, I'd like to mention that this eye tint is very pigmented. It is also very buildable, which gives the option to wear the color lightly, or very boldly. It also did not have any weird, off putting scent to it. The only con would be that it is a bit difficult to wash off- however, that may be a plus for some people!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blends BEAUTIFULLY. One application is all I use, I blend it and then on top of that I use Urben Decay Moondust in the shade Space Cowboy and it is perfect, looks so beautifully done. Even when it's by itself it looks fantastic, this eye cream blends so well you'll never want to use another eye cream again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So I love the shade of this, I can easily wear it on its own for a little sparkle. I do think itu2019s just a tad bit difficult to apply, but perhaps Iu2019m just not used to liquid eyeshadow. It seemed a bit difficult to get enough on the applicator (cold weather on delivery may also have been the issue). Iu2019m looking forward to continue using it just on its own, as well as as a base layer of neutral sparkle.

reviews.review_title: Great on the go eye tint!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a great on the go product from Giorgio Armani. The shade 30m taupe does lean more on the brown side but overall this is a great neutral eye tint that everyone can rock.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very pretty color, but depending on your complexion it may blend in with your skin tone. It is very easy to apply and does last all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is super pretty! It is not a very intense sparkly payoff but great for every day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a must have made by a stellar brand. The components of this product are sleek, stylish and practical! The applicator is just the right angle and softness for even results. Long wear- multi-purpose and I definitely recommend giving this brand a chance if you havenu2019t already!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very nice eyeshadow. I love the package and the applicator. Itu2019s goes on so pretty and blends out like a dream. It can be layered for a more dramatic look. It looks pretty all by itself. Itu2019s the perfect one and done shadow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this shadow. It stays put perfectly with a primer. Itu2019s buildable and has the perfect amount of shimmer. I was concerned the u201croseu201d color would be too pink/warm for me but itu2019s not. I will absolutely buy more shades of this fabulous cream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant to try this as I've tried something similar and was very hard to blend out. This stuff was very easy to blend and very buildable. This can go from a soft subtle look to a dramatic look instantly with just a little primer under and a glitter shade. This stuff blends like a dream and it so pretty and looks very pretty on it own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love it.. It suits me pretty.. And to apply is very easy.. Definitely buy again and recommend to everyone  Thank you so much bzzagent for introducing such an amazing product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful product. It goes on flawlessly, it doesnu2019t dry down to fast and easy to blend. Love the color as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a bit hesitant to try the Giorgio Armani Eye Tint because Iu2019ve never worked with a liquid eyeshadow, that hesitation quickly went away when I saw how easy it was to apply and how long it lasted through the day. Iu2019m not a huge fan of the color but since itu2019s buildable it creates a perfect base & itu2019s a great color that goes well with so many shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was so much better than I had expected! The color is gorgeous and ethereal and it layers beautifully on top of an eyeshadow primer. It lasts- you definitely donu2019t need to apply any powder on top of it to set it- in fact I wouldnu2019t do that with this formula because I wouldnu2019t want to take away from itu2019s gorgeous shimmer. I love it- only thing I would change is the size of the applicator- too large- had to use another brush to be more precise with the placement. Still would absolutely recommend if you can afford it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely going to be a staple product in my makeup back. It goes with every look! The shimmer is absolutely stunning. The product is buildable so you can use it for basic and bold looks. And it does not crease! Once it's dry, it stays put. It also dries super quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Giorgio Armani Beauty Eye Tint for free from Bzzagent and ARMANI beauty in exchange for my honest review. This long-lasting liquid eyeshadow in shade 36M- LEATHER has matte finish and gorgeous deep brown color. Super easy to blend from bold color to 0 to create soft & smoky eyeshadow look. I use it even for contouring my cheeks and nose. It has a lightweight feel. Essy to wash it off, doesn't leave a stain on skin like others eye tints I used before. No primer or skills needed. Definitely like it. I think I would buy a few more and recommend it to my friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a gorgeous dark burgundy shade. Blends out beautifully and very pigmented. I wanna get every color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this color but man was it hard to blend. Don't even think about applying directly to the eye either. You need to apply it to your hand first and then the eye or you will be left with circle marks of color.

reviews.review_title: I'm living for Armani beauty lately!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i received this for free in exchange for my honest review. This eyeshadow is absolutely stunning! I've been wearing mauve/pink looks so much since I received it because it is just gorgeous! It does remind me of the pinks in a sunset so it's a perfect shade name. Goes on so so smooth, blends like a dream, and stays all day as long as you use primer. I'm in love and want try more shades. Every product I try from Armani seems to impress me more and more. I really hadn't use them until about 1 year ago and now they have my favorite concealer and a lovely liquid eyeshadow.  I'm definitely intrigued.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Where to even start? I pretty much dislike everything about this eye shadow.  First, I received cedar, a neutral taupe color. I didnu2019t like it. Itu2019s just so u201cblahu201d and too dark, in my opinion. In a shimmer it would probably be pretty, but this is a matte and so it is dull and boring.   I also absolutely hate the applicator. I am used to eyeshadow sticks that glide on. This is a wand, which makes it both difficult to actually apply AND difficult to get the right amount for. You always wind up with way too much and are wasting product.   While I didnu2019t notice any creasing and it stayed all day, I hated the color so much I wish it hadnu2019t. It was also tough to remove at the end of the day when washing my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first ever time using a cream eyeshadow and I was honestly skeptical, but I actually LOVE IT.  It glides on super smoothly, doesnu2019t cake, doesnu2019t accentuate natural eye wrinkles, and doesnu2019t ball up at all.  The color itself (I have 30M, Cedar) is really pretty with a nice shine that isnu2019t overpowering at all. I either use a very small amount all over the lid for a quick look or I use it on the outer corner of my eye as a smoky eye look.   Itu2019s very light, and non drying as well.   The packaging itself is nice and sleek. I really like the soft applicator.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'll be honest, I'm lazy when it comes to my makeup. If it takes more than a few minutes, I'm out. I love that you can literally put this on with your finger and it stays all day. I added a little highlight with some white shadow along my brow bone and bam, complete look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect neutral color that works well with my skin tone! It is very long lasting and doesnu2019t have any scent. You definitely build it up if you want to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Giorgio Armani Beauty Eye Tint 12S- Gold Ashes is perfect to give a shimmery tint to your lids and I love the fact that you can also build on the intensity of this. The shade Gold Ashes is just so beautiful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best liquid eyeshadow I have tried to date. The applicator made it so easy to apply and blended effortlessly with just my finger. I of course want more shades to add to this one. I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such beautiful eye shadow! Its applicator is so nice and easy to apply! It can create a soft pink look as well as Smokey dark pink look! I love this eyemakeup when I am in hurry itu2019s very handy for a quick eyeshadow look! I absolutely love it.

reviews.review_title: Perfect Eye Shadow For Novice Users
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a complimentary product from Armani Beauty. This eye shadow is perfect for all experience levels of eye shadow users. Perfect for blending. Itu2019s better to use your finger to apply and blend but I used a brush as well right before it dried and it worked perfectly fine as well. I like how you can add layers it to make a less translucent or a richer look.  I like to use the nude matt as an eye shadow base color. I love how itu2019s very difficult to transfer and it lasts all day compared to other products Iu2019ve tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very interesting eyeshadow, and a product unlike anything I've tried before.  It's not something I would purchase multiple colors of, but the one I did receive to test is a nice neutral nude shade that can be placed all over the lid and blended out beautifully.  One thing I do want to mention about the formula is that it dries EXTREMELY quickly.  You need to work fast.  I found that using a blending brush spritzed with some setting spray moved the product around better than a dry brush.   The applicator has a unique shape, and blunt edges which makes it easy to create bold lines.  I imagine this would be very useful had I received a more bold color to test.  I think something like this may be wonderful.  It's 100% crease-proof and simple to use and layer with other products, even powder formulas.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so grateful to have been sent the Giorgio Armani Beauty Eye Tint in the shade 30M for free in exchange for my review. This is absolutely beautiful. It's a matte brown shade, also called Cedar. It looks lovely on the eyes and I would call it a neutral medium taupe brown with a cool undertone. It's great for a simple monochromatic smokey eye.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really liked this product.  The formula is thin enough for a single coat, but is also easily buildable for a more dramatic look.  Long wearing, did not crease.  Looking forward to trying other colors in the collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the applicator, it makes putting this liquid eyeshadow on so much easier. I love that it is blend-able. Doesnu2019t leave a sticky feel on the eyes. Beautiful colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product to have. Applies so easy, dries quick and stays put for hours. Great little applicator with fancy packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This liquid eye shadow is so pretty. Application brush is angled and it's really easy to apply. It's easily buildable and glides smoothly without feeling sticky like some liquid eye shadows can be. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the shade of gold I received. It was subtle enough to wear without feeling overbearing but made Me feel a little more dressed up. Great shade for holidays and dinner parties. It applies easily and is long lasting. There was no scent to it and it dried quickly. No worries about transfer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so impressed with how this eyeshadow does not budge once on! I absolutely love it. I also enjoy how you can layer it. I think I would prefer a different color in the future, though, as the light nude was just that...pretty light!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First. the formula is superb in that itu2019s easy to apply (almost foolproof) and extremely long wearing. It will last until you take it off and doesnu2019t smudge or run. If you try to layer other shadows it will act as a primer but it does make it slightly harder to blend out.  Second, the color Rose Ashes is very beautiful, itu2019s a shimmery rose gold hue but more interesting than the average rose gold. The shimmer is very fine and not chunky and the color brings out the green in my eyes. Very pretty and versatile!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a professional makeup artist I enjoyed trying the Giorgio Armani eye tint in 20m- Camel. It is a nice soft color then add a little touch of color for anyone who is on the go. It is very easy to use and I was able to blend it onto my lids easily. It is a nice color to have in your makeup bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This formula is excellent! Long lasting, pigmented, true to shade, does NOT crease, stays put, lightweight, easy to apply. Everything you want from a cream to solid eyeshadow formula. I wish I had more colors I wouldn't even bother with other powder shadows anymore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this eyeshadow! It glides on so nicely the color is beautiful. It wears great. Lasted all night, I did have a few creases before I took it off at the end of the night(but it had been all day). I did prime my eyelids before applying and I also added some similar eyeshadow on top to set it in better. I canu2019t wait to try more colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ok I am officially obsessed with Armani Beauty! This is the 3rd product Iu2019ve tried from them and the quality is sooooooo wonderful! Definitely feels like a luxury crafted liquid eyeshadow. Iu2019ve been using it as topper to give sparkle to my eyeshadow, as a highlighter and as lip topper. Itu2019s so versatile and blends like butter. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This color is so natural and pretty for my day to day make up look. I love how itu2019s just a pop of color with my skin tone. Went on so smooth and lasted all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This color is so natural and pretty for my day to day make up look. I love how itu2019s just a pop of color with my skin tone. Went on so smooth and lasted all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so happy to share my thoughts and experience using Giorgio Armani Beauty Eye Tint in the shade Rose Ashes.   I have tried hundreds of eyeshadow palettes over my time, and my favorite shade in all of them has always been the final shimmer or glittery hue to make the eyes pop! Unfortunately, even when using a shadow primer, I'm always left with fallout on my cheeks. At 41, this isn't a good look on me!   This is where my new Holy Grail Giorgio Armani Beauty Eye Tint in Rose Ashes came to the rescue! The packaging is so luxurious, and I love the applicator. The texture is so easy to blend on your eyelid that you don't even need to use a brush!   This shade absolutely topped off all neutrals and pinks for me. I highly recommend this formula and I would love to try other shades in the future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received shade 36M Leather to try, and it's so beautiful! It's a true, deep, rich brown. It's a perfect color because I can use it alone all over my lid, or in the crease to blend out with lighter shades. The applicator makes it really easy to apply, and I blended it out with a fluffy eyeshadow brush. It didn't crease on me, which I really appreciated. I want to get more colors to see how they all blend together!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Sometimes liquid shadows are tricky because they easily blend away and cake up. The shade I got was sunset and I was blown away at how sparkly it is. And it didn't give me a hard time with application. A little goes a long way and it would look great on any complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was quite disappointed in this product. While it glides on smoothly, it applies very uneven and causes issues by constantly smearing therefore ruining it from having an even application. I initially applied it over my foundation and found it was smearing the foundation badly. So I removed my foundation on my eyelids completely. It still applied unevenly. It smears on itself. Upon drying, it looks cracked and dry... a cool effect if you want a hard rocker, cracked, reflective look I suppose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: best liquid eyeshadow I've ever used. stayed all day and looked great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was a really great liquid eyeshadow alone, very subtle and 20Camel is a nice warm tone. It works great as a transition/base. Itu2019s very smooth and on the thinner side, but buildable. If used as a base, powder shadows stick and blend very well. I personally really enjoyed this as a base!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Giorgio Armani Beauty Eye Tint liquid eyeshadow via Bzzagent in exchange for my review. I absolutely love it! The color NUDE I received is beautiful, it looks bold from the first sight, but when applying it, it actually turned out to be natural and beautiful. It is easy to apply, and lasts really long. It is very buildable, and blends well with other eyeshadow colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this creamy long-wear formula! Wears so nicely and completely creaseless. Nice everyday shade for medium skin tones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It was long lasting and very easy to apply! I really liked the shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this gorgeous eye tint. I usually use eye shadow palettes and was skeptical about the amount of color Iu2019d get with a liquid but this blew me away. The application was smooth, it stayed all night and the color was gorgeous!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing liquid eyeshadow. I love how it is smudge proof, long wear and not to mention very easy to apply! The bold shade is stunning and with one coat I was ready to go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved the color gold ashes and the applicator was the best for keeping the tint on just the eye lid. The color did need a bit of building to get a really level of color on the eyelid. I liked this product that I have already gone out and purchased a similar color with a bit of pink shimmer in it from Armani.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: even though the color is quite bold being silver, the application is smooth, and sticks, and is not so glittery that it looks tacky. the only thing i would recommend is having a more precise brush to apply it with - the one now is pretty generically shaped and doesnt add much shape or contour when applying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: PROS blends well goes on smoothly stays on all day doesnu2019t crease great pigmentation nice applicator/wand  CONS none!
