I wasnu2019t sure about this eye tint/liquid eye shadow but after using it for a couple weeks Iu2019m very impressed! The color payoff is amazing and it doesnu2019t crease or look patchy. It works well under powder eye shadows as well.  I have the color 18 Light Nude and itu2019s perfect nude/skin shade for no makeup days when I need to just have something on my lids to make me look like I tried.  Worth the money and I definitely will look into trying the other shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eyeshadow. I only need a tiny amount to use for my eyes. The color is nice and natural yet buildable to be more intense. I like to take it when I travel because the packaging and applicator it comes with are very convenient for me. I would buy this product in different colors. I would recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t usually use liquid eye tints but This is so pigmented, it also goes on so smooth and blends like a dream. I got the color Night Viper and itu2019s the perfect shade for a Smokey sultry look. It also has such good staying power, it stayed all night and I had to spend a few minutes taking it off which I donu2019t mind because I really like my make up to stay all day/night long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I attempted to work with this eyeshadow a few times. Itu2019s buildable up to a certain point as a topper then it would wipe away the eyeshadow underneath. Perfect for a Smokey eye

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like the idea of these. The color I sampled was the same shade as my skin so it basically worked as a primer for me. Once it dried down, it did not crease which is impressive for me since most things crease on my greasy eyelids.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first Armani product and I was actually blown away by this shadow. It goes on like a cream and can be blended with a finger or brush. It blends easily and then dries like a powder. It stayed all day, no flaking or crumbling. I got the shade taupe which came out a gorgeous matte brown shade with grey undertones on me. Honestly super happy with this shadow. It's so easy to do an all over the lid color for a quick eye look. Or add some drama to a glam look! Definitely recommend... 10/10!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This goes on so easily and blends in great. It doesnu2019t get creasy or fade either. I would love to try a different shade and see how they blend together. Iu2019d definitely recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous  pigmented eyeshadow. The pay off is absolutely stunning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is easy to apply and goes on silky. This is not a good color for fair skinned people. It is the same color as my skin so it looks like I'm not wearing anything at all - shimmer is not noticeable. I'd love to try a different color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this eye tint! I grabbed it in the shade Rose Ashes. It has a nice subtle rose gold color with just the right amount of shimmer. Can be worn with a light layer or two for a more bold look. Blends well. Goes on creamy and smooth. Very long-lasting and no creasing throughout the day. Excellent product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Shinny, glowy, without fallout. Excellent eyeshadow. So elegant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary in exchange for a review in the color 27S Sunset and it is stunning! The color goes on smooth and if wanting to blend the edges out the formula is extremely blend-able. If you want ti blend make sure to do so before the color dries down. Can be worn alone or as a metallic shimmer lid shade to make your eye makeup pop! I would love to try the other colors and I highly recommend this product to anyone! Easy to use for makeup beginners as well as long time makeup professionals! Love the color and formula!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like this eye shadow. It was more pink on skin than it appears in the bottle. Goes on easy. Stays on all day. Nice shimmer. Does not crease

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eye tint. It is very easy to put on and smudge out. You can build the color or just leave it light and it looks stunning. There is just a tiny hint of sparkle but something you can still wear during the day. This is by far the best eye tint I have ever used. Can't wait to get more colors!

reviews.review_title: Loved the formula but not the color
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed the formula of this. I found it to be creamy but not too creamy that it creases. I sampled the color 18m light nude and was not a fan of this particular color. It reminded me of a concealer or foundation shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Went on so smooth and so easy to blend. It looked so beautiful on my eyes. Loved the shade !  Makes a nice base shade ,as well ! I absolutely loved it and now I wanna order more shades.  ( I received this product complimentary for reviewing purposes)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is a very nice shadow with a thin texture and high pigmentation. It blends very easily and stays on the eyelid all the time, it does not crease.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: An absolute stunner!! Itu2019s the easiest and most gorgeous eye look Iu2019ve ever achieved with one product! And it stays on throughout the day. Iu2019m obsessed!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i have never tried a liquid eyeshadow before and i was really excited to try this! i really like the taupe color, good neutral and it is in a matte finish. i enjoyed the applicator and it does apply easily. you definitely need to blend it out with a brush or a sponge. this is a good base to add on or you can wear it by yourself. i only gave 4 stars because of the color but i know if i got more of a metallic i would love it!.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Taupe is a nice color but I feel as if it looks a bit too neutral for me, I have more medium skinned tone. But the wands tip that is used to place the eye shadow is fantastic. It is curved in such a way that it goes on perfectly and beautiful. I will look for a color more suited for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do not wear just one color so this was perfect as a base coat in my eyes. Then I added some shimmer with power eyeshadow. I loved that this was not thick and the applicator is a perfect angle to keep things easy! Great product. I want more colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very easy to apply initially, but there was a ton of creasing by the end of the day. It doesnu2019t wear well as a base due to the creasing issue either. The color is very vibrant and true to the color you see in the tube. It removes fairly easily as well.  I didnu2019t find it to be drying at all, which I liked. Itu2019s just unfortunate that it creases so badly.  The camel color is very pretty, but I do find it pulls orange on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the u201crose to ashesu201d color. Itu2019s the perfect hint of pink and also looks natural.  One layer to give a light natural glow. The liquid is smooth and last all day with out any clumps or creasing.  Canu2019t wait to try more colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice eyeshadow tint. I love the color deep nude. it looks beautiful against my skin tone. the application is smooth and long lasting. The only issue is the creasing. after wearing,it definitely creases.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this color camel, the color payoff is great application is smooth easy to apply and blend. Love how creamy the texture is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love Giorgio Armani products and excited to try their Eye Tint liquid eyeshadow in Deep Nude. This product is easy to apply on the eyes and blends with a finger or a brush. Long lasting and the color is pretty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful chocolatey brown for a good statement smokey eye! I love the richness of this brown and it dies down without being crunchy. Its more liquidy than moussey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the glide & how easy it was to apply, however by the end of the day it was crinkled up on my eye lid. I reccomend if reapplying but not wearing straight for a full day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an absolutely beautiful shade if you are looking for a neutral everyday color . I wouldnu2019t really call it fully matte because itu2019s got very fine micro shimmer which makes it more of a satin finish . It blends really easily with just a finger which I love as well .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am really into cream eyeshadow right now and this color is so beautiful. Itu2019s really easy to apply and it drys very quickly. Itu2019s beautiful to wear day or night and mixed with other colors. Iu2019ve worn it alone with eyeliner or just mascara during the day. In love!

reviews.review_title: Versatile matte, but has room for improvement
reviews.review_text: I received this liquid eyeshadow in the color taupe complimentary in exchange for honest review. This is a classic neutral taupe color, very thin formula, pigmented, rapidly drying but blendable with a finger or a stiffer brush for the first 8-10  seconds after application.  That means you need to do one eye at a time. Don't be tempted to apply bilaterally before blending. That will be a disaster. You need to apply on one eye and immediately blend the edges, then do the second eye. Once the eyeshadow is set it's not going to budge. On the swatches you can see the eyeshadow blended next to the full opacity swipe.  I own a few shades from the Armani line, but they're shimmery, which I love. I use them as bases for my eyeshadow looks and sometimes as one and done eyeshadows. This one would be great for a smokey eye, I just wish it had a little bit of shimmer or was more of a satin finish, that would be prettier than just a plain matte. I also noticed that it can settle into fine lines if not blended well, in fact, you can see that on my hand swatch. It might be because the finish is very matte. Hence the star off. The applicator is lovely, it gives you exactly the necessary amount of color on one swipe without leaving goopy droplets on the bottle's rim. Excellent packaging and esthetic of this product is a plus. Price is high for one eyeshadow though.
This eyeshadow is georgeous!!  The color is beautiful and so silky when applied to my face.  I even put it on my lips and cheeks!  Buy it, you won't be sorry you did.

I received the Giorgio Armani Eye Tint Matte from bzzagent in exchange for my honest review. I really like it! I received the beige and the color gives me such a natural matte look, didn't crease or cake up, glides on beautifully and lasted most of the day. It blends really well too which is nice. I love the packaging too. I would love to try other colors of this longwear luminous liquid eyeshadow.

One of the best colors that last longer then most  and doesnu2019t crease. For someone who has hooded eyes, I donu2019t have to worry about it creasing within a few hours of application. The color last all day and doesnu2019t wear off. Highly recommended.

After using this product on myself (and my daughter's) it's definitely not what I expected.  It went on effortlessly and dried pretty quick. There wasn't a sticky feeling. And it lasted for quite a while! Definitely an amazing product

Since the first time I sued it I loved it itu2019s so pigmented it little lasted all day without smudging or fading, one thing I had noticed with a similar products itu2019s that some looks dry or separate through the day but this one was as perfect as when I applied it, I will try more shades I love it

reviews.review_title: This is wonderful, you've got to try it!
reviews.review_text: I recieved the Giorgio Armani Beauty Eye Tint commentary for my honest review. This eye tint goes on like silk. It's creamy and not heavy. It has amazing shimmer and great, pigmented color. It wears really well, and is buildable.

The consistency of this eyeshadow is so creamy and goes on so easily!! The color I received 56S goes on rather dark (it is a dark burgundy after all) but you can smudge it out to fade a little. The color really is long lasting!!! I would recommend to a friend for sure.

I like this more than I thought I would. It is great for a day when you want to have something on your eyes but not spend a lot of time blending it out. Swatches quite sheer but looks very pretty on the eyes. Lightweight and easy to work with. I want to buy all the other shades!!

I love this product. I will always love this brand. The color was beautiful, even though it was neutral and light. The texture was gorgeous. The application was easy, and it was long lasting. * The color they sent me was 20 M camel, and I did not have the ability to select that color here

I really love this eyeshadow tint cause it is easy to blend, light weight and very pigminted! I just need tiny drops of this to make natural eyelook and wow i impress. I do not even use eye primer and it is really pigmented. I would love to recommend this to my family & friend

reviews.review_title: Amazing Eye Tint!! Try it, you will love it too!
reviews.review_text: I LOVE the Giorgio Armani Beauty Eye Tint!! It lasted all day and night, no creases, no smudges, no primer needed! I love the variety of shades available, I got shade 18M. The applicator is amazing!! I really can't go back to my regular eyeshadow after using this amazing eye tint!! From beginners to masters, I recommend this awesome product to everyone! It provides buildable, lasting coverage in a neutral shade I fell in love with! Try it, I can assure you that you will love it too!

I received the Giorgio Armani Beauty Eye Tint  liquid eyeshadow via Bzzagent in exchange for my review. I absolutely love it! The color Sunset I received is beautiful, it looks bold from the first sight, but when applying it, it actually turned out to be natural and beautiful. It is easy to apply, and lasts really long. It is very buildable, and blends well with other eyeshadow colors.
i love it i looks really good natural and beautiful.

reviews.review_title: Loving this eyeshadow! Easy & long lasting!
reviews.review_text: This color is absolutely beautiful. My favorite quality about this product is how buildable it is. You can make your shadow as soft or bold as you want. The product also goes on super smooth and doesnu2019t leave a dry/wrinkly finish like some matte liquid eyeshadows do. Iu2019ve been wearing it to work and it lasts a full work day. Loving this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used up my first purchase of this lovely eyeshadow and ordered the wrong color to replace it; the less-rose other one was okay, but I wanted exactly this color.  A Sephora-brand near duplicate was worth a shot when my store didn't stock this item, but I ended up ordering this exact color again for the ease of application and the subtle color. It's my daily shadow; I now skip Laura Mercier's primer, which I used to use. (I should see whether adding it makes a difference.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color is beautiful. Getting a smooth application swipe on the inside of a wrist is easy. Getting a smooth application on an eyelid is impossible. Unfortunately that makes it not worth buying again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow is exactly what I have been looking for! Most liquid eyeshadows are WAY too glittery or seem to highlight the creases in my eyes, but this one glides on, looking more like a sheer highlighter and giving my eyes a subtle shimmer that was almost liquid in appearance without being at all sticky. Iu2019m in love. I also really love the applicator, which allows you to get to the tear duct neatly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely LOVE the color and payoff, not too pigmented but still can build up. On the down side, after just a few hours it creased SO BAD omg, I never had an liquid shadow do that, AND I noticed huge bald spots on my lids and crease, such a shame, im sure you can get a better formula because its not worth it at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of my best eye tint ever. I bough Gold ashes many times and some of other colours. This is an amazing product: just a perfect light on eyes. The best product but the worst jar Iu2019ve ever tried (the short one, the previous was not that bad). My last one: 50% of the product stay at the bottom and was impossible to take out. Only for that reason, I wonu2019t buy it again, unfortunately! 3 stars: for the amazing product but also no more because of the horrible jar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Fantastic product and the best part is that it stays put all day.  I have these in so many colours and cannot recommend them enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love this but consider this a meh product. The color is beautiful but it isn't pigmented. Even after putting on several layers, it only looked like a sheer wash of color. Was expecting more out of this. Definitely a fail for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The eyeshadow just does not apply well at all, I've tried everything, the applicator, brush, and my finger. It's just not a pretty picture at all.  What a disappointment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely elegant shimmery color! Goes on very smooth and is blendable with a brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this eye tint. Itu2019s so nice and pigmented. It looks so good weather you are wearing a no makeup makeup look or a full glam. Trust me this will be your new go to eye tint. You can use it as a eyeliner and eyeshadow. Two in one which is nice.

reviews.review_title: Nice Color but hard to blend
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Armani Beauty products and was really looking forward to this eye tint, but I just have not been able to get a good blend. Iu2019ve used my fingers and a brush and the brush does give better results, but it still feels a bit dry and looks patchy to me. Nice color though it is quite orange.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m in love with this eyeshadow!! It has beautiful packaging thatu2019s easy to open/close and hasnu2019t gotten messy with use! Itu2019s easy to apply and blends smoothly on your eyes. Lasting power is great and it doesnu2019t create in me. Itu2019s a beautiful eyeshadow color and I definitely want to pick up a few more colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can't even emphasize how much I adore this product. My entire vibe over the last couple of years has been cream and liquid eyeshadows any chance that I can get. I love the applicator on this product because it doesn't pick up too much product when you end up wasting a ton and struggle to blend it out. The formula is gloriousy shimmery without becoming a chunky glitter. This pairs so well with other cream products, but also works well with powder shadows too when I'm building out some dimension. I would 100% buy this in another shade based on how obsessively I've been reaching for the shade I have now.

reviews.review_title: Pretty but not as pigmented as Iu2019d like
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample in exchange for my honest review. I want to start by saying that I love Armani Beauty products so I expected to love this. Unfortunately, this did not have the pay off I hoped for when compared to some other liquid shimmery/glittery eye shadows that I love. Now donu2019t get me wrong, this gold is subtle but pretty and I will definitely keep using it. However, if youu2019re hoping for a pop of gold for a night out, I think this is too subtle. I tried layering it with my finger and with the brush but it just didnu2019t build well. Because of this, itu2019s not something I would recommend especially at its price point unless subtle is what youu2019re going for but at least for me, subtle isnu2019t what Iu2019d buy a product like this for.

reviews.review_title: no color pay off fades off
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 0/10 would not recommend the matte shades. Theyu2019re wet but not in a liquid shadow wet. Like if you were to wet lotion and rub it on your eye. That being said the color isnu2019t pigmented and doesnu2019t stay in place. Crumbles off and feels like a wet paste on the lids. Too Faced Liquid shadows are far superior petty they stopped making them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ooh - wasnu2019t expecting this lightweight formula to be such a good one tbh. It stays on my oily lids (I use a primer first) all day. I use this shadow as an all-over color, and then I put a powder shadow in the crease. So, in other words, the cream formula meshes with powder well. I love the color Senso too - looks good with my fair skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing liquid Shadow! This shadow is incredibly easy to apply and looks fantastic. The shadow also blends easily with powder. It does not have a scent and glides on easily with the brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: liked it Very pretty .I used it mostly a eyeshadow topper that an stand alone eyeshadow cause I like more of a pop than using this by it self ..but it was easy to apply and easy to blend as just a regular eyeshadow

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved using this. I had no creasing issues the finish was beautiful and it had a great shine. It lasted all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this liquid eye shadow. The color is beautiful very blendanle and a soft satin finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got to try Armani Beauty Eye Tint Liquid Eye Shadow in 12-Gold Ashes which is a beautiful gold champagne shade. It is a buildable eyeshadow so you can customize as to how you bold you want it to be. It has some shimmer to it as well and catches nicely in the light.  It has a minimalist feel to it but is elegant. Since it is buildable a single swipe is more sheer and minimal and added layers are bolder. It does have staying power and lasted all day for me without creasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The finish of this eyeshadow is so smooth and shows up beautifully on my tan skin tone. Not too shimmery. Spreads evenly on the eyes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a pretty shadow concept that can be used as a topper or on its own. I like the shade gold ashes that I received. However, mine seemed a little dried out like it was older or something. I will continue to try to use it, but I wouldnu2019t recommend or repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is really pretty blended out, although sheer. Itu2019s really anything but long lasting. This creased badly on my within a few hours despite applying my favorite eyeshadow primer. Not worth the hefty price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful shade that works well on itu2019s on or as a base for a more dramatic look. The formula applies very nicely but you do want to work quickly to blend out but once it locks in it STAYS PUT! Does have a hint of shimmer so skip if thatu2019s not your thing but itu2019s definitely a very wearable glow thatu2019s multidimensional. Such a quick and simple way to elevate your daily makeup look. Already want more colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eyeshadow! It applies smoothly, doesnu2019t crease or clump, looks stunning and is buildable! This is perfect for everyday use or even a night out!

reviews.review_title: beautiful & easy to use but glittery
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eyeshadow! I donu2019t take the time for my eyeshadow the way I used to, so itu2019s really awesome to have a simple product I can use that is quick and also pulls my look together. This is beautiful, lasts a long time, and is easy to use and blend. It is very glittery, so maybe not suited for more conservative looks. It does pair well with other shadows for a multidimensional look. Rose gold is a warm, orangey tone on my fair skin, but the warmth is flattering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample from BzzAgent, and boy does it make an impact! So beautiful on any skin color, I am in love with this eyeshadow!

reviews.review_title: Incredible Liquid Eye Shadow Buildable Formula!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shade looks great with my hazel/green eyes. It is easy to apply as the applicator is so precise and easy to apply. It did not tug at my eye when applying and I wore it all day with absolutely no creasing! I love how it is blendible, yet buildable as I did not have to do any retouching.  It honestly did not feel like I was wearing eye shadow. It did not come off! It is easy to blend and it stays put all day. This can also be used as an eyeliner or even highlighter! I genuinely recommend this product! I have had family and friends who have purchased other colors. I, myself, will be purchasing another of the 24 gorgeous colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow is different from anything Iu2019ve tried before! Its so hydrating and easy to apply.  I got the shade-12 Gold Ashes- gold champagne and its gorgeous!  The glitter doesnu2019t have any fallout which is rare and I really appreciated it. Itu2019s more like a lotion and Iu2019m living for it!  I would definitely buy it in every shade! Completely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is so beautiful to look at and the shade is beautiful.  This has a sheer finish but very much buildable. It has a thin consistency and doesnu2019t crease even after a few hours. I tried it alone just on the concealer and also paired it with other shadows, either way, it looked great. I have a dusky complexion and i find this particular shade to be glamorous for day time looks. I prefer this to be more of my date night glam looks. Overall, love the shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This Giorgio Armani shadow is a beauty, it surpasses other liquid shadows that I have tried, it is very pigmented but light, it is not thick or uncomfortable on the eyelid, the makeup look that this shadow leaves is so elegant, I have to buy more colors if you want a striking look,but elegant I  highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really love it! Lovely formula and gorgeous color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Armani Beauty Eye Tint Liquid Eye Shadow is light weight and has an impressive staying power. The shade is very subtle so it's more like brightening up your eye-lid with right amount of sparkle. It sets quick and I had a little difficulty using my finger to apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very pretty but it looks more like a glossy eyeshadow or glitter topper. The texture seems very thin and it did crease on me after just a few hours. But it did look pretty on its own. I wonder if the other shades have the same formula or are more opaque. I would suggest you swatch in person if you can.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Eyeshadows are definitely not all created equally and this one goes to the top of the list. This liquid Eyeshadow smoothly glides on skin delivering vibrant, beautiful color. It's definitely a must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The rose gold made my blue eyes pop!  So many people complimented my eyes!  My new favorite shadow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful satin glow, the sparkles are so tiny that it looks so delicate yet instantly lightens up your eyes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love liquid Eyeshadow as they don't make a mess and they look beautiful on. I just tried Armani Beauty Eye Tint Liquid Eye Shadow 12 - Gold Ashes and loved it. It went on smooth and looks beautiful on. I would highly recommend trying this Eyeshadow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is not my first Armani eyeshadow, and let me tell you , they never disappoint ! I love color gold ashes , it brightens up my blue eyes and looks expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A beatiful long lasting shade! It appears at first like it's not a hearty shade but I assure you that is not true.  This has easily become one of my favorite eye colors! I do wish the tip was a little smaller but overall,  a fabulous eyeshadow that I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The eyeshadow is wonderful, the color u201cGold Ashesu201d is light enough that can be worn daily with a subtle metallic sheen (hello Euphoria!) and it is also buildable. It pairs very well with the rest of my eye makeup if I want to go with an evening look and add it as a glittery topper.   There are so many looks I want to create with this, definitely see myself reaching for it to recreate bridal looks in particular.  The formula itself is smooth and durable, and doesnu2019t crease even with my hooded eyelids. The price point is is also a plus, because you get a good amount of product for a luxury item.   10/10 recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got the shade in rose gold. Beautiful glowy eyeshadow and easy to apply. With primer underneath the product, It didnu2019t crease and lasted all day. Overall love how easy it is to use for a quick on the go eyeshadow look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this Armani Beauty Eye Tint Liquid Eyeshadow 44 - Rose Gold complimentary in exchange for my honest review. This liquid shadow comes in a sleek translucent tube with a black cap and the iconic Armani Beauty logo. The doefoot applicator is the perfectly size and shape to swipe the shadow directly onto the eyelid. The shadow itself is silky and easipy blendable with a brush or finger. The rose gold shade is shimmery and gorgeous. I would even suggest that it could be used for a subtle hint of shimmer just about anywhere. The formula dries cleanly and does not feel tacky or sticky at all. This beautiful shadow is a new favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Armani Eye Tint eyeshadows are a liquid formula. These do not have the opacity of a cream shadow, but the deeper shades seem to be more pigmented while the lighter shades are more translucent. I received the shade Gold Ashes, which is more of a champagne than a gold. A single coat yields a sheer wash of color and sparkle, but it is somewhat buildable if you let it dry fully between coats. Layering when wet just causes the product to lift and move around.  I prefer applying with a brush rather than the applicator. This keeps bacteria to a minimum, and makes blending easier than using fingers (though fingers are fine for a one and done application.) Work quickly, they set fast! On the bright side, this helps prevent transfer on hooded eyelids. Overall, I love the Eye Tint formula and the looks I can achieve using these products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eye shadow is absolutely beautiful! It is so easy to apply and blend. The fine shimmer creates a timeless and elegant look while also perfect for everyday wear. I use a brush to blend but even a finger will work just fine. The eye shadow glides on to smoothly and effortlessly. The intensity is buildable. I have gotten several compliments on this eye shadow since I have started using it. I cannot rave about it enough. If you are on the fence, just go for it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised at the staying power of this liquid shadow because I have oily eyelids but it stays put! I wish I had gotten a darker shade! Overall I do recommend. It is an easy one and done eyes look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Highly recommend   very soft texture Perfect rose gold shade Long lasting effect  Easy apply Love it, love it, love it

reviews.review_title: Giorgio Armani should be Giorgio amazing
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually received the shade Sienna it's a beautiful coppery color everyone said it looked like I had shiny new pennies on my lids but that's a compliment. Now I wish I had also picked up this beautiful purple shade. These are soooo light weight and silky smooth

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so shocked at how pigmented this color is and didn't fade or flake at all and dried/set within a minute.  This color looks perfect with my light olive/yellow skin tone. Recieved for testing #bzzagent but it's my real thoughts...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so easy to use. The applicator makes applying it a breeze. It glides on leaving a sheer beautiful bit of shine and color. I like wearing this alone when Iu2019m in a rush. If Iu2019m not rushing Iu2019ll put it on the inner corner of the eyes layered over a lighter shade. Itu2019s so pretty Iu2019m contemplating seeing how if performs as a highlighter. If you let it dry down a bit there isnu2019t much creasing and it last all day.

reviews.review_title: great formula perfect for everyday soft glam looks
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty eyeshadow from Armani Beauty! This is a really pretty eyeshadow, itu2019s light weight feels like nothing on the eyelids, but there is definitely something gorgeous there. the shade I have is rose gold, this shade is soft and pretty. Itu2019s an everyday shade if you just want a  soft settle glam look. Iu2019m a soft glam kinda girl and I love a no makeup makeup look most of the time, and this is perfect for that. Itu2019s buildable last all day long and looks stunning on the eyes! There are a ton of liquid eyeshadows on the market. You can definitely find a cheaper alternative, However this is still a wonderful luxury formula that I would recommend and love.  if you have the money for Armani try it , there are a lot of shades to choose from .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a big fan of liquid eyeshadows, because generally they are very pigmented and long wearing after they have set or dried down. I have experience using liquid eyeshadows from various other brands, and the one thing that stands out about them is how shimmery they are. I was super excited for the Armani Beauty Eye Tint Liquid Eyeshadow because I expected a luxury makeup item to really deliver. I got the shade 12 - Gold Ashes because it is described as a beautiful gold/ champaign shade. When I first applied this, I noticed it was definitely a champaign shade and not really a gold shade, but thatu2019s really no problem because champaign is such a versatile shade that looks great on all skin tones. Next, when I started blending it out, I noticed the product moved around and I was unable to get the opaque finish I was expecting. I even let the layer dry down before reapplying, but the shadow kept moving around. For me, the finish is more on the sheer side, and the color payoff is not what I expected. As mentioned above, liquid eyeshadows are usually more pigmented and shimmery, and unfortunately I did not get that kind of look with this. For $30, I would expect this liquid eyeshadow to not only be buildable but also have a more intense shimmer payoff. Based on this experience, I would not purchase this in other shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the application and color of this product. It goes on so smooth and has a doe foot applicator. I pat it in for ultimate coverage. One layer gives a small amount of color but a large amount of sparkle. Two layers gives a more champagne like color and sparkle. Can be worn alone or over other shadow. I also love that itu2019s never chunky or patchy. Overall, I enjoy and recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the colors of these liquid shadows, I currently own Rose Gold and Gold Ashes.  They look so beautiful on the eyelid.  However, the staying power on me is not the best.  These shadows crease if you have very oily and hooded eyelids.  Just need to find a primer that works.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful long lasting liquid eyeshadow for that glossy wet look. Now I need it in more colors.

reviews.review_title: The Rose Gold color is STUNNING!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the Armani Beauty Eye Tint Liquid in Rose Gold, the color is so pretty.  I am able to blend it over my lid for a quick pop of color or above a shadow to add a rose gold accent.  It blends nicely over my lids and adds just the right amount of pigment for a pop of color. I would highly recommend people to try this shade, itu2019s very flattering! I am happy that I was able to try it complimentary as part of a review program!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I chose the shade Sienna 54 and it's a beautiful burnished/burnt orange color with a subtle chrome effect; something different from what I would normally choose and I fell in love. The applicator makes the eye tint so easy to apply and control, like a liquid lipstick. It makes doing cut creases a breeze. Easily lay on a sheer wash of color or do multiple layers until it's opaque with zero caking and it lasts all day without creasing. I like to put on a the first layer, pat it out and gently smudge it with my fingertips or a large, dense shader eyeshadow brush then I either use that as a base for another product (other products powder or cream/liquid layer fantastically as if this were a primer) or paint on another, more precise layer to get that beautiful, opaque color and chrome finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I originally thought that I would use this stunning shadow for special occasions only but I've actually reached for it more often than I thought I would. It adds such a beautiful sheen of color to the lid that isnt childish or obnoxious. It's also buildable if you prefer to intensify the color. Its so pretty and I  definitely recommend adding this to you stash!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Eye Tint Liquid Eyeshadow from Armani Beauty is the perfect liquid eyeshadow. This eyeshadow has a reservoir tip applicator that allows a very precise application of the product. With its pointed tip, the product can be applied as both eyeliner and eyeshadow. The liquid eyeshadow itself has a wonderful formula. It glides on incredibly smoothly and dries very quickly. Once dry, it does not budge. There are absolutely no smudging or transfer issues. The shade I received, Rose Gold, is a gorgeous golden pink with a beautiful shimmer to it. I would love to try this product is other shades and would definitely recommend this product - especially if you love liquid eyeshadow.

reviews.review_title: Great, but you can find the same for less money
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this liquid eyeshadow. The applicator is perfect for the eye area. Its easy to apply and you can use your fingers or a brush. Its easier to blend the shadow with your fingers actually. 2 layers of the shade does increase the intensity but not that much. Its very long wearing. Great product from Armani Beauty, but you can totally find liquid eyeshadows from other brands for way less money. Even drugstore brands sell really good liquid eyeshadows so if you love Armani Beauty then go for it, but if you arent partial to a certain brand then save some money and find a cheaper option.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin

I use one application for day and two to three for a dramatic night look. The color payoff is insane and you get great pigmentation. I received so many compliments when I work this shadow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

One of the best eye shadows I have tried. Would purchase and recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I only used one fingertip to apply. Once it's spread on the eyelid, it stays put. After 9 hours of makeup, I didn't have a crease where my double eyelid is folded on over 50 matured skin. The photo holding product is taken after 9 hours of makeup.  I have Rose Gold and want to try more shades.

reviews.review_title: Still trying to make this work
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color (I got Sienna) is beautiful and initial application is great! But the shadow gets in my creases like crazy and I'm still experimenting to try and make this work. I've attached a photo of a day of wear with no primer as the only eye shadow on and with a primer (that admittedly doesn't always work great) and a light eyeshadow base and I see creases at the end of the day that don't look great. I still haven't found a great eyeshadow primer but I was hoping this would look okay alone. If you only want to wear this a few hours it looks great, otherwise I have to report it just doesn't last well throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love a good liquid eyeshadow and this is no exception. The formula is the perfect consistency, not to thick and easy to spread. I wore the shade Rose Gold out on a date night with my husband (literally only added mascara) and it was beautiful. Rose gold can be a difficult color to pull off, but this looked great and lasted all night. I did have some very mild creasing, however, I have hooded eyes so it's not surprising. I will be purchasing more colors as this is an OUTSTANDING product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love Armani Beauty and was really looking forward to trying this. Unfortunately, it just didn't perform as I expected from a luxury brand. I understand the concept of sheer liquid, but sheer should be smooth and even. I found it very difficult to get an even coat of color. Once it dried, it creased terribly through the day. The color would be beautiful in a different formula. The package (bottle) is beautiful, as all Armani products are.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So far this is one of the best liquid eyeshadows I have ever tried. Not only is the color absolutely beautiful, it is truly a metallic shade that stays metallic without getting dingy, and it does not wear off or crease throughout the day. It applies nicely and spreads onto the lid easily without smudging. I was thrilled to find a shade that was so nice and actually worked as a liquid shadow, even without primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. This Armani Beauty liquid eyeshadow in the shade 44 rose gold is absolutely beautiful. It goes on easily, doesn't budge or crease, and adds a lovely metallic effect to your eye look. This shade also goes with many different eye looks. I want to buy another color. I would recommend this to a friend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color and stays for hours.. payoff its hood too. Easy and simple to use . Canu2019t wait to get more colors

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

I canu2019t say for sure if Iu2019d recommend this, only because itu2019s a bit expensive and I feel there are other options out there for your buck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Armany Beauty Eye tint Liquid eyeshadow 44 rose gold is a beautiful glow. I love it. The packaging is beautiful. The applicator has a perfect size and is easy to use. It is sticks perfectly without being cakey and staying all day. I absolutely love the rose gold color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Recently Liquid I shadow has been my go to because itu2019s quick and easy to apply while still looking like I put a lot of time and effort into my make up! This formula is absolutely amazing and the finished look is stunning! This does have a higher price tag but if youu2019re looking to treat yourself a 10 out of 10 recommend this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

The eyeshadow itself in Rose Gold is really pretty and great as a topper to add some shimmer to my eyeshadow base, or by itself for a subtle glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Armani Beauty Eye tint liquid eyeshadow 44 Rose Gold is a beautiful nude pink color. I love that the formula makes it easy to glide on the eyelids and you can build up color or make it subtle. The eyeshadow stays on for hours and does not crack throughout the day. The eyeshadow dries quickly and is a great color for everyday daytime use. It's a beautiful nude color that makes eyes pop with some shimmer and natural color. I like that the packaging looks luxurious and fits perfectly in my purse to take on the go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This shimmery liquid eyeshadow is so beautiful! Great for extra sparkly look! Itu2019s so pigmented, you can apply one layer for a simple light shimmer, or apply a second layer for an intense shimmer! Great for cutcreases! reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm pleasantly surprised by  how much I like this eye shadow. I feel like I always run into issues with liquid shadows creasing or cracking, or being too dry to use well.  Armani's liquid eye shadow doesn't have any of those problems thankfully. It's a very soft, velvety liquid that glides on smoothly, blends and diffuses beautifully, and stays put all day without creases or cracks.  I'm a neutral, natural glow kind of girl so I find Gold Ashes an awesome pop of light. For reference, I'm very (very) fair with cool tones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely beautiful color and texture. Staying power is also great. I love it for evening and everyday makeup as well. It looks more beautiful in real life than on photos.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: rose ashes adds a perfevt angelic veil om my lids. its neutral and my lids but better shade. it has pinks and champagne and it looks sooo soft and natural while adding a little sheen. its beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

It blends nicely but maybe it was just the color i had but it almost blended away. I still give it 4 stars because I think its just the color I had. I didn't like it like I thought I would. Another color might be better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s my first time trying liquid eye shadow and Armani delivered! The sheen and sparkles are very natural on skin. The liquid tint dried quickly and only a little shimmer transferred when I touched it. I chose Gold Ashes and I love it as itu2019s neutral color and can be everyday wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So I received this product in return for my honest review. I was excited to try this product as I love liquid eyeshadows. I love the applicator the shape let's you apply very perfectly. It's a smooth application glides on dries quickly and stays on all day very nice color. Would Def buy a another one. It's beautiful packaging. Try it I think you will love it too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Armani Beauty Eye Tint Eyeshadow is so lovely it truly is like jewelry for your eyes! I have the shade 44 Rose Gold and it is so stunning! It goes on super smooth and creamy but dries very quickly and sets and does not budge or crack throughout the entire day's (or night's) wear, which a lot of other liquid eyeshadows unfortunately tend to do. Also one layer will give you a beautiful Sheen of color, which you can build up to be more intense if you like. Not much product is needed because of how pigmented it is. I used both my finger and the applicator to apply and both gave me beautiful results. I even found other uses for this liquid eyeshadow! I used it as a highlighter for my cheekbones and brow bone; I used it in my center pout after lipstick to give my lips a fuller appearance! I will definitely purchase this in some of the other colors! When I wore this out even just one layer , I received so many compliments from my friends AND strangers! I have recommended this to pretty much any of my fellow makeup lovers who will listen!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This liquid eye tint is gorgeous! Everything about Armani Liquid Eye Tint is perfection.  From the packaging to the innovative applicator and the wear and formula. There is so much to love about this makeup! It doesn't slip,smudge or feel tacky. The formula is creamy,   soft and buildable. It's super comfortable to wear and stays put for hours. The pigment is vibrant and rich because it contains true pearl. I could go on for days about how stellar this eyecolor is which is what you can expect from Armani. There are many colors and finishes to choose from and now I seriously want every, single one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eye tint! It's pigmented and it blends easily. It's a foolproof formula. It's so easy to use! Love the shimmery effect it gives.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, itu2019s very versatile. Iu2019ve used it on my eyes and itu2019s buildable but Iu2019ve also put it in my inner corners, under my brow bone and above my cheekbone as a highlight due to its shade! When I put it on my eyes it reminds me of something youu2019d see on euphoria which always has some great makeup looks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve got the shade 44 Rose Gold and it is absolutely gorgeous. This was the first time that I used a liquid eyeshadow that I really liked because it doesnu2019t crease and looks beautiful on your eyelids.  The shade 44 Rose Gold is a beautiful addition to any makeup look. You can use it as one step natural makeup look or use it with other eyeshadow to create a more elaborated look. It is pigmented and long lasting.  The bottle is small but since it has good pigmentation you donu2019t need to use it a lot.   * I got a free product from Bzzagent to try and give my honest opinion about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m fair skinned with cool undertones and the Rose Gold shade was really flattering. I felt like it brought out the reddish tones of my hair and enhanced my green eyes. It was sparkly without being glittery or rough. It had a high end, metallic look that I really enjoyed. I thought it applied nicely if I used my finger to tap on a light layer and gently blended it. This gave me a more subtle look, perfect for a daily neutral makeup. The doe foot applicator was nice for applying more product for a fuller coverage, built up metallic sheen. I personally preferred my finger and/or a brush. It had decent wear time. I also liked it as a highlighter down the bridge of my nose and on my Cupidu2019s Bow. Iu2019d love to see this in an opalescent type shade, leaning towards blue and purple! The price is a bit high and youu2019re definitely paying extra for the name. I received this free in exchange for my honest review. My opinion is my own and based on my usage of the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tend to not use liquid eye shadows often because they donu2019t seem to last long or apply easily but this was different. This applies beautifully and is easy to work with to make a great look with lasting power. I didnu2019t experience any creasing or odd wear on the crease. It was so comfortable I almost forgot I had any eye makeup on (and that never happens). I will definitely be trying more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my 1st experience with this Armani beauty I can't long lasting liquid eye shadow in color 12 gold ashes-Gold champagne was at work. I do house keeping in a beautiful condo here in ormond beach Florida and it was the 1st day to hit 88 in a few weeks. I ended up  working up really good sweat and I was completely shocked when I looked in the mirror in the break room. I still had good pigment and almost an entire face left. I love the way it shimmers over your matte shades for a good gradient color. It also has a nice shimmer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I already had tried the new armani lip colors and this was no different. Blew my others out of the water, and became my everyday faves. I love the soft but buildable beautiful rose gold color, comes in clutch for use with many colors and eye looks that will have you standing out and other ladies asking what is that new color your rockin. Bc its that amazing. So soft you can barely tell its even there. It goes on great after you apply it with the doe foot applicator with just a few taps of your finger or for a softer look and to blend use a brush. Either way your looks are going to be the highlight with these new Armani Beauty liquid eyeshadows. (not to mention it's actually great as a highlighter too, a few dots and blend is all it takes) I need to get more colors bc these are life.... Thank you bzzagent and Armani Beauty for allowing me to try this new product. It didn't dissapoint. I'm obsessed and will be getting the taupe, Champaign, hot gold, and flannel next.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved the color of the product. It was a muted rose color. Application was so easy and blended well with no harsh line. The color was a little too light to show up with much intensity. The only flaw is that it did not last through the few hours I wore it. By the end of a couple hours the product was not longer visible. Maybe a different color will show and last longer. I would be willing to try a different color before I gave my full thoughts on it. The price is another reason I would be hesitant to purchase. Itu2019s a lot more than other products that last longer and have more vibrancy even for a soft color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am really loving this beautiful eyeshadow. It applies really nicely and lasts a long time on. It doesnu2019t crease. I love this beautiful shade, it looks so natural on.  I canu2019t wait to get more shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like this eyeshadow, but personally would use this as a base color rather than an eyeshadow. My skin tone is medium/tanned, and I feel as though the color doesnu2019t pop against my skin tone as much, as someone whou2019s lighter or darker then me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a beautiful color. I love the texture of this shadow. It feels so soft and just looks so good on. it's a little on the pricier side but I feel it is worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

It can be work alone or over a matte shade. It does not crease easily or have any fall out and has good wear time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color is absolutely stunning and looks fabulous on! The issue is the formula it applies well but it looks extremely patchy when you attempt to blend it out. IMHO it works slightly better when you apply it over a powder but it is still very patchy, and doesnu2019t have the best staying power.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the light pink shade and it has the perfect amount of sparkle! The doe applicator makes it easy to apply with an even coat of color. Super soft and creamy as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very creamy and long lasting.  I received free as a trial.  I like the way it went on and how it's long lasting.  The color was not what I picked and not what I would wear.  It was too orange but with the metalic, good for going out at night to the clubs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried Armani Beautyu2019s eye tint liquid eye shadow and have to say I am in love with this shadow! I have used other liquid shadows before but nothing has quite compared to this one. I tried shadow shade 12 gold ashes. Itu2019s a beautiful gold metallic color with a beautiful shimmer in it that shines when the light hits your face. The shadow application was effortless and even those who donu2019t have experience using liquid shadows can attain beautiful results. The best part about a liquid shadow is that it doesnu2019t fall all over your face when applying the product. The color is super pigmented and long lasting  and does not fade or smudge the longer you wear it. This metallic gold is perfect for a night out or wear for an extra pop around holiday time. I canu2019t wait to try new shades of this shadow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My makeup style is what I describe as a natural glam aesthetic. Like what you see in korean style makeup. I absolutely love this eye tint for this type of makeup look. It's best for the one-and-done, all over the eyelid, natural glossy eye look. The teardrop shape applicator makes it easy to not only apply it to the eyelids but also the aegosal (aka under eyelids) and also the tear ducts for highlighting effect. The best part is that it doesn't crease and stay put through the day. I can definitely see myself buying more colors asap. I enjoyed trying out this eye tint and felt like it fits with the Armani beauty line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So beautiful and buttery. And lasts all day, definitely a go to for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Always on the hunt for a liquid eyeshadow that LASTS and doesn't smudge. This is it! Love this super easy to use formula that looks so pretty on the eyes for a shimmery look! I get so many compliments whenever I use this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love liquid eyeshadows the require minimal effort! This Armani Beauty Eye Tint Liquid Eyeshadow 44  in Rose Gold is simply so beautiful on it own! I added a transition shade and this and I just loved the pop it gave my eyes. Itu2019s long lasting and I didnu2019t have to prime my eyes either.

reviews.review_title: In Love With The Armani Beauty Eye Tints
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Armani Beauty has released their beautiful 16 HR Smudge Proof, Crease Proof Liquid Eyeshadow in 24 Shades and 4 creamy finishes (Smoke, Silk, Acqua and Chrome).   The Long Wearing & Luxurious Water Based Liquid Eyeshadows are infused with pure color pigments and phosphorescent pearls that delivers intense  pigmentation and instantly adheres to the eyelid. The precise wand applicator allows you to create the perfect eyeshadow or eyeliner look without disbursing to much product!    I highly recommend the Armani Beauty Eye Tint Silk Satin Liquid Eyeshadows. I love the Gold Ashes (Champaign Gold) Liquid Eyeshadow so much so, that I want the whole Collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love these Armani Beauty Eye Tint Liquid Eye Shadows! While these shadows might not have a ton of color payoff, I don't mind, because I like that you can wear a subtle wash of color or easily build it up for a brighter look. These are so easy to apply and really perfect for anyone on the go or short on time! I wear this all the time without primer and it lasts all day and I have no issues with creasing or wearing off throughout the day. The awesome thing about this shade, Gold Ashes, is that it can also be the perfect shade for a inner corner highlight for your eyes or just under your browbones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This eye tint is absolutely stunning!  It's my first time trying an Armani Beauty product and I was not disappointed!  The packaging is stunning, but the product itself is even more so.  I received the shade Sienna, which is a stunning burnt copper shade.  I love the applicator and the fact that you can apply as much or as little as you need.  Perfect for a quick everyday makeup look, or great for layering on for date nights! The formula is easy to apply and feels as smooth as butter.  Definitely will be looking for more shades-- I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you like cream eyeshadows, you have to try this one. The color (gold champagne) is gorgeous! It glides on effortlessly and does not crease. I have mature skin and almost everything creases on me. This doesn't! It looks beautiful for a quick look and works well layering and blending powder shadows on top. It makes the powder shadow last so long. This eyeshadow alone looks as good at the end of the day as it did when I first applied. Very happy with this one and plan to purchase more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the color Sienna. Itu2019s like a metallic burnt orange color. I used this in the inner corner of my eyes with a small but fluffy blending brush. It added just a little pop of color and highlight. I used the same brush and added some to the center of the lid to add attention there. The rest of my eye makeup was matte so this added a nice contrast. I used it in conjunction with powder eyeshadows and I had no problem blending. It all came together nicely. reviews.review_title: Bit of a learning curve but gets the job done
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you're only used to powder eyeshadows, using liquid eyeshadows can be a bit of a learning curve. The product is marketed as being long-lasting, crease-proof, buildable, and lightweight, which I agree with; however, the particular shade I received for review was sheerer, so buildability was limited. As a topper shade, I think it works well. I didn't use any primer with it, and it stayed in place and lasted all day.  My fingers, the applicator, and a brush all worked well with this product, but you should probably use the applicator or brush if you want a uniform application. Additionally, I recommend waiting a few seconds before applying the product so that it dries down a bit, especially if you're using it as a topper shade.   Because of the time-consuming nature of using this product, I wouldn't repurchase it, but I think it's a decent product if you want to splurge and have a little extra time in the morning to use it. Even though you can use it as a one-swipe shadow, it is very glam.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised with this liquid shadow. I have hooded eyelids, and I normally experience a lot of creasing when using liquid/cream eyeshadows, but this didn't crease at all.  It lasted all day long, and the formula is really easy to work with, and it's quite versatile. The first way I wore it was as a quick wash using my fingertips to blend it, and it looked very natural. The second way I wore it was using the applicator with multiple layers.  The buildable color is very easy, and it dries quickly, allowing the shadow to actually layer properly. The color itself is very shimmery/glittery, but there is no fallout.  The only con I found was when I touched my eyelid after applying the multiple layers, my fingers had a ton of glitter on them.  I think I'll try the Nude Smoke 24 color next, since I think a matte color would be fantastic for every day or as a base.

reviews.review_title: Great product for a classy one-and-done eye look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: - The finish is metallic. The color is gorgeous with different types of lustre for a feel that is somewhere between satin and lustrous. This it the kind of thing you'd apply if you want to add some shine to the lid. Or, you could do what I did and wear it alone - the shine makes it so that the outer corners appear darker and the inner corners appear brighter simply because of how the light rays bounce off the shape of the eye. - Starts out sheer but is buildable. This is a good thing if you're using it to add some shine to your lid, as you'll still be able to see some of the baseline background color (if there is one). It blends quite sheer as well, but after a few strategically-placed coats, it should be pretty opaque. It's important to dab instead of swipe as much as you can.  - The doe foot applicator with its fine tip really helps with precision - The sparkle/lustre is understated, classy, and elegant, making it a great product both for every day and a nice dinner out. If you want the bling bling this isn't the product for you. Note that it looks somewhat less sparkly after drying. - The formula contracts a little after it dries, leading to a tiny bit of wrinkling/bumping that is not super noticeable. However, given that the skin has lines and grooves and pores, this is par for the course with a lustrous, metallic finish.  - This is a perfect option for my lazier days when I don't want to put on a ton of makeup but still want to look put together. Just swipe a bit of this on, maybe add a bit of mascara, and you have a really nice eye look.  - Love the smooth, creamy texture that is not crumbly, clumpy, or sticky. -Compared with other liquid shadows, this is among my favorites for a chic, understated, one-and-done look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love liquid eyeshadows. This one by far is my new fave! It applies so smoothly on the eyelids and last my whole 12 hour shift. The rose gold -44 is beautiful! If you love rose gold you will love this shade. I will definitely be picking up more shades by Armani.
