reviews.review_text: This is the best liquid eyeshadow on the market. You donu2019t need a primer and it doesnu2019t crease. Truly underrated.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful color and packaging, but creases.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary in exchange for honest review. This is a beautiful Metallic Rose gold eyeshadow, thin liquid formula with medium to full billable opacity. It dries down in 30 seconds, giving ample time for blending. An another layer can be added after drydown if needed. I used a matte mauve pink in the crease and this eyeshadow on the lid and it turned out beautiful. Unfortunately due to my eye anatomy I have severely hooded eyelids, therefore the eyeshadow creased on the portion of my eyelid that was touching. The part that wasn't touching stayed intact all day. If you don't have a droopy hooded eyelid then this eyeshadow is for you. Otherwise proceed with caution, it might crease on you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy liquid eyeshadows and have many in my collection.  I did not have any Armani Beauty Eye Tint Liquid Eyeshadow in my collection until now.  I have used this on bare skin, with several different types of primers (more wet/emollient and drier formulas) and I find it works best on bare skin or drier primers.  When I swiped the Rose Gold eyeshadow on my eyes, it gave such a pretty wash of color and almost made my eyelids look a bit wet (which I love that kind of subtle color).  I did check to see if you can layer this and you definitely can if you let it dry down to almost dry, applying another layer on top does work and did not pill on me.  I also found it did not crease on me until about the 8 hour mark and that's also when the color started to fade a bit.  I was able to work quickly with it to blend with a darker powder outer lid shadow.    I have worn this consistently for about a week now and I really love how pretty and natural it looks, as well as how well it plays with my powder eyeshadows in my collection.  I plan to purchase a few other colors and finishes (this one is metallic).  I have recommended this already to several friends and will continue to do so.   The reason I took off one star are the claims that it is crease proof and lasts 16 hours.  It did crease on me after 8 hours and it lasted maybe 10 hours total.  Otherwise, it is a beautiful liquid eyeshadow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the gold ashes color. It is a very light shimmery tint. I donu2019t even think it looks gold, it looks more silver on my eyelids. I did one coat, let sit for a few minutes and then applied a second coat. Itu2019s definitely a light color, but it gives a nice little pop of shine. I even added a little bit to my lips. Dries down quickly & I didnu2019t have issues with creasing. Iu2019d like to try some darker colors. When taking off it does leave a very fine glitter all over my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was so honored and excited and thrilled to receive this gorgeous eye tint. #pinkwednesday May never be the same again! It was very easy to apply. It is natural enough for every day but special enough for any date/night out. Itu2019s just such a gorgeous versatile perfect PINK!

reviews.review_title: Sienna is gorgeous on green eyes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Metallic is gorgeous! Iu2019m showing it as a pop of color on upper lid and lower lid. Brightens my green eyes beautifully with the orange undertone. Very easy to use. Dries a little fast so work in layers if covering the whole lid. Definitely can tell this is a luxe brand

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Most beautiful eye tint! It lasts all day and doesnu2019t crease on my lids (Iu2019m over 40). I love it on a bare eye or even dressed up with a wing liner! The shimmer isnu2019t over the top and wears well on mature skin in my opinion!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It looks so beautiful and blends easily. It's buildable and it's more like one and done look which is very convenient and looks absolutely gorgeous. Applicator is so nice and helps to apply precisely. It lasts all day without fading and doesn't need reapplication. Packagingg is so beautiful and classy. I will purchase More shades. It's absolutely luxurious and gorgeous. I recommend it to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this liquid shadow. The packaging is sleek and elegant. I love how expensive it looks. My eyes look so shimmery and simple. I love the look. The application is a breeze and the shade is perfect for my skin tone. I absolutely recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eye tint is a super easy one and done shadow.  The color Sienna is absolutely stunning. The packaging is classy. The application itself is super easy but just know it does dry quickly. So apply one eye at a time and blend out right away. Once you achieve your desired tint, it will last you all day, it will not budge. So pleased with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a gorgeous shadow !! It blends out beautifully with just a finger and gives the most amazing wet look to the eye ! The formula is stunning

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful shade. I would suggest looking up swatches or going in store to see these, as I find mine to be lighter and more of a pearly champagne shade than what the pictures here suggest. The formula has a bit of sheerness to it, which works nicely with this light, shimmery shade. I use this as an easy, subtle all-over lid shade or on the inner corner. The packaging is pretty and quite luxe. Overall, I'm very impressed with this shadow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful soft shade, love the packaging. Very lux, I love you can build the intensity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love liquid eyeshadow and was so very excited to try this one! Not only is it a stunning color but it creates such pretty eye looks that are very versatile. Whether you like soft and sultry or bold, I highly recommend this liquid shadow

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This comes in a heavy glass tube and the color is a shimmery metallic pink that is so beautiful. It is long lasting and very visible with even one coat. Very high shine but the shimmer can rub off. The color stays though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eye shadow, it is long lasting, and I love this shade, very.versatile.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this liquid shadow! It pairs perfectly with my eye color palette and goes on smooth, lasts all day and is really a classic color for anyone!

reviews.review_title: Rose Ash Hard to Work With
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Rose ashes - Bottom line: Hard to work with  - Pros: subtle shimmer and color, good staying power, concentrated. As long as it doesnu2019t dry out, one tube should last.  - Cons: dries down rapidly, making blending difficult,   very sheer. When I tried to add another thin  layer, the existing product became patchy and dried out, doesnu2019t work with other shadows, almost no color payoff. I wanted something subtle, but this looks like a patcher patchy cream highlighter.  - Tips for use: Wotk quickly! Donu2019t prime lids with a sticky or waxy primer. If you want to use something, try spraying a setting spray onto a damp sponge and pressing onto the lid. Next, swipe a line of it into the back of hand, pick up with a dense eyeshadow brush and quickly tap it onto the lid. Donu2019t add other makeup other than a pencil liner and mascara It can create a quite subtle natural look this way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: Itu2019s a pretty color, but very sheer. It works well for my  natural look with fair skin and green eyes, good staying.power. On fair skin, it just evens out skin tone on the lids while adding subtle shimmer. , no fall out.  - Cons: dries down quickly, and is tricky to use with other products  Bottom line: For a fast bit of polish, this shade is a good option. I hope Armani create s a few more neutral/natural shades without shimmer in both warm and cool undertones

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time using a liquid eyeshadow.  It was a learning experience for me.  I feel I do best using my finger tips to blend it.  I love how quickly I can apply it and go.  I will be trying it in other colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not a fan of this liquid eyeshadow. It dries immediately when you place it on your lid, making it almost impossible to blend well. It looks muddy and patchy, for that much money it is not worth it at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Highly recommend the Nude Smoke and it's a very natural subtle shade.  I also have other shades:  rose gold (fabulous subtle highlighter), halo (greyish sheer highlight), lava (cooper), and sunset (dark plum).  During the pandemic, I've been looking for make-up, especially eye make-up, that has staying power and has easy application.  This is a first-rate liquid eyeshadow.  The applicator is wide, like a felt paintbrush, the material has a good consistency and easily glides on.  The one minor downside is the price ($30).  But. This is Armani.  Top name and top price - good option though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best liquid eyeshadow ever! It stays in place with no primer needed and gives a nice layer of color. So easy to apply! Iu2019m ordering another color bc Iu2019m in love. Def worth the money!

reviews.review_title: Ice-Grey Shade too Sheer, Doesnu2019t Show
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review is only for the Ice-Grey shade. It is a very sheer shade that is too see-through. Barely visible at all on the lid and does not build up. Other colors in this line are highly pigmented, but this Ice-Grey shade is not. Very disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this liquid eyeshadow!! Such a beautiful gold shade! I just ordered another color!! Easy application due to the really handy doe foot applicator & it doesnu2019t creAse!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really like this shade. It doesnu2019t look like you have makeup on, just have a naturally beautiful eye area!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have several of these liquid eye shadows and they are far from being easy to work with. Hard to blend and almost impossible without smearing after the product dries which is very quick! The colors are gorgeous though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a hard time keeping eyeshadow on even with a primer. This blew me away! I always do a hand test out of curiosity and this stayed for 2 days only showing wear the 3rd. The nice thing is that it comes right off when you wash your face! Love the color too. Exactly as show.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the product, hate the container. This is my go-to everyday iridescent beige wash shade. It lasts all day with primer. Once you get to the bottom thereu2019s a ton of product trapped where the wand canu2019t reach. I tried pulling the stopper out but it pushed inside and I had to toss it. This used to be a longer tube and it worked, not sure why they changed it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute favourite product right now. I put a small amount on an angled liner brush and it creates a long-lasting liner, brown volcano is the perfect colour for natural-look days. I hope they come out with a few grey/black shades to play with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased 44 and 45 (rose gold and gold foil) - AMAZING! Goes on super quick, dries, and blends effortlessly, in a matter of seconds. Itu2019s my fastest go-to for everyday. Figure I need to add some other colors to my lineup for more definition/drama for date night, holiday parties, etc. LOVE Armani - this and their silk foundation / blush / concealers are BEYOND fabulous! Highly Recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the colour.  It has staying power and drys faster than most liquid eyeshadow. Long lasting and does not feel heavy. Better than powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't like it at all. They do not stay on the eyelids for a long time without a primer, you need to apply pointwise and then shade, it cools the eyes after application. The Nudestick eye shadow is better and more easy to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Buildable and not too shimmery. Looks very natural and doesnu2019t crease.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this expecting a taupe shade. I was so disappointed when the shade was actually a champagne. After I found the taupe of my dreams, I went back to this product and ended up falling in love with it. The formula is as good as everyone says it is, just don't expect a taupe shade YouTubers keep saying it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this shadow!!! So easy to control and see where it's going!! The colors are also awesome!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous gold colour. Love the applicator wand. Smooth finish. This is my second colour and want more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sweeps on easily and dries quickly. Locks in place and doesnu2019t move. Looks gorgeous on. Catches the light beautifully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this eyes shadow. I love the way it goes on and the way it looks. Easy application and the colour is perfectly described. It's rose gold! Washes of nicely and I didn't find it creased and I have large eye lids. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Rose Gold color was beautiful, slight shimmer.  Love that I can just use this in the AM for a pop of color.  Will buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing liquid eye shadow. Not only it is the most beautiful color but also it stays put entire day. The applicator is extremely easy to use with pointy end it can easily be applied in inner corner of the eye.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Goes on very smooth and sheer. Also has a beautiful shimmer - more sparkly than some other shimmers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this based on the glowing and frequent recommendation of a beauty youtuber. Very disappointing product. No pigmentation at all. It barely shows up and what is put down disappears after a few hours. I've had much better luck with drugstore shadows. I could have purchased a complete eyeshadow palette for roughly the same price as this one lackluster item.Save your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in white colour for inner eye and not only it is clear water with messy glitter , it made my eyes cry !!!! The tube seems to be empty too, I had to shake and scoop it out . What a waste . Shame on Armani !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the eye tints.  Rose Ashes is subtle but brightens my hazel eyes.  Easy to use when I want only one color durind the day.  Lasts quite a while too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Did not like this at all. Very little pigmentation and very, very patchy on the eyelid. I had high hopes but sadly ended up returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best eyeshadow! Goes on smoothly and lasts all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is glitter water. There is no color to it really at all. Honestly the worst liquid eyeshadow I have ever used. Nothing comes out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cold copper eye tint used to be my most loved eye product until Armani changed the formula. The packaging is also different and worse as nothing comes on the applicator.  Why change something that was so good into something so mediocre? This is extremely deceiving and I'm very disappointed. This is an honest review and the item was purchased with my own money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the color is beautiful.   I'm still learning about makeup so when it says tint it's really a hint of color, nothing bold.  goes on smoothly.  its definitely not worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! The fact that is it more of a tint makes it super easy to use. I can blend it out with my finger in one second and it looks perfect. It also works really well as a base for days when I want to wear eye shadow over it. I also think is lasts well considering i have oily eyelids. Because it is not super pigmented, if it does start to crease and wear off it doesnu2019t look too bad either. This product is perfect if youu2019re like me and you donu2019t love the look of a ton of color or shadow on your eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Feels like I am putting lip gloss on my eyes. I had to look and make sure they didn't send me the wrong thing. Don't waste your money. It is awful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I truly honestly believe that these tints are one of the best on the market! I have very oily eye lids and everything creases on me but not Armani Eye Tints. I tried Laura Mercier Caviar Sticks , By Terry Black Ombru00e9 sticks, and couple of Joue sticks and every single one failed on me. I also love the colors. My first choice was Rose Ashes, than I picked Senso, than Flannel, Nude Smoke, Camel Smoke, Fur Smoke, Gold Ashes, and finally Magnetic. And I canu2019t seem to stop buying them! They are just that good!!! They blend amazingly. They can be layered. The most importantly for me is after they set they stay in place!!! Highly recommend checking these out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. Stays on FOREVER, beautiful shimmer, and super easy to apply. I have green eyes and I absolutely love how this brings them out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Incredible product. Blends in so easily and beautifully. You can adjust the intensity of the color by layering, so itu2019s a versatile, practical product to use for both day and night occasions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What a great product. From the applicator to the vibrant color this is the best eyeshadow. I stays put too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Spectacular! I chose this as my beauty rewards in my last order and will definitely be purchasing the full size when it's empty. It doesnt require you to use a lot of product and blends beautifully.  It also lasted. Great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t know if Giorgio Armani has changed the formula of this eye tint when they make this mini size. Iu2019ve seen so many raves about this product (in the long tube packaging). But this one blends into nothing and becomes patchy when I add more layers. For $28 (3.9ml), it is just very difficult to make this eye tint work for me :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve owned this shadow in this same color for a long time and still have some left over from my older tube.  I think that in addition to changing to a smaller sized tube, they also changed the formulation as very little comes out of the new one and the product seems kind of dry. I tried two separate (new) tubes and it was the same problem for both so not just a flukey bad batch.  Too bad as Iu2019ve really loved this shadow and it was so easy to use.  Oh well...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a trial size with an order a while ago- Wow does it pack a punch of gold. I felt like the leprechauns were going to pop up and snatch my eyelids  Its honestly not my type of colour I like to wear daily- I like much softer colours.. however it's really beautiful!! I will still use it- but more party time or night out- not daily! For me anyway.. but if you love gold this is for yew  4/5  -1: Amount in the product tube is crazy for dollar value- Still would buy though.. smh. Lasted all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product does not deliver. Returned the first color in favor of a deeper one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it I use it every day with just some mascara and looks great

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many one-and-done cream/stick shadows for daily wear. I am 50 with age-hooded eyes - so my lids are far more delicate now and many things crease that never did when I was younger, even with good primers.  Aside from Stila (and even some of the new concoctions of theirs creased) this is the *only* cream shadow (and most stick) that does not crease on my eyes after 4-5 hours.  The stiff waterproof sticks tug at my loose delicate skin now so can no longer wear them. The creamier ones crease.  So, despite the price, for me, these are really worth it. The colours are beautiful, don't fade, and I get a lot in a glass bottle. Plus they do layer incredibly well - I bought 4.  They dry *very* quickly if you want to blend so work fast. Really, they are more of a one-and-done.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE! I have had this for about a month and I reach for it everyday. It is perfect for your 5 minute face. I just slap a little on each eye and use my finger to blend. I just ordered a second color. Worth the price.

reviews.review_title: Increased the price and decreased the amount
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product so much.   I bought it multiple times.   Just went in now to repurchase it and found out that the have increased the price and decreased the amount you receive :(.  So disappointing.   I am sure I will find an eye shadow that will do better.

reviews.review_title: So simple and easy to apply!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m absolutely loving this eyeshadow. The application is so simple and easy. No need to worry about powder falling on cheeks. I tend to wear a very natural look of eyeshadow. Not sure how these will work for someone who is wanting a dramatic effect. These definitely work for a fast and simple application with no mess. The formula hasnu2019t caused any sort of irritation or dryness either. I use the applicator to apply a small amount and then quickly blend out with a small brush. I would highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_title: Bring back the old formula packaging!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bring back the old formula and the packaging! I am a fan of these eyeshadows, they do apply seamlessly and stay on all day! That was with the old formula. Now with the new packaging, I cant get the eyeshadow out of the bottle as the sponge does not allow this. I had to dip the wand in the bottle 7-8 times to get the application I want!! Bring the old stuff back!

reviews.review_title: Not up to usual Armani quality
reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I may have been given a dud, but the product was about half full. The aplicator isn't great at getting the product out or at applying it, and this particular colour was too nothing on my fair skin tone. It might look nicer on someone darker though, but you might want to use a qtip to get the product out! I ended up returning and going for a Laura Mercier caviar stick instead, which is much more pigmented and actually looks on me more how I had expected this to look. A shame, Armani is usually a pretty safe bet quality wise.

reviews.review_title: Go to all over color, lightweight and long lasting
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color is a perfect bronze/soft brown all over shade for me.  The texture is very light and applies easily.  Itu2019s also buildable if you want to intensify the color.  LOVE IT!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried two different shades and both stung enough to really hurt. Just bizarre. Never had an eyeshadow sting my skin before. And I buy lots of them!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This looked absolutely lovely. Unfortunately, the applicator didnu2019t pick up much product and the color itself almost vanished into my skin providing no shimmer effect at all. I returned it and got another color. The effect is a little better but itu2019s still disappointing. Iu2019ll keep it but wonu2019t be buying any more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful neutral eyeshasdow that provides a sheer sheen to the lif. Great for mature eyes. Lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like it but it creates within an hour. Any use aloe have to use with powder shadow to set

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to love these eye tints, but with the package change theyre no longer my favorite shadow.  The color payoff is not there, hardly any product comes out on the applicator, and my tube of shadow didnt look completely full.  Im very disappointed in the packaging and formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s pricey but such a timesaver - this is my one and done for work makeup. Doesnu2019t crease, sheers out to be a nice wash of colour without being over the top sparkly. Definite repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this liquid eye shadow. One dot has incredible effects. You can build it or bled it with other liquid shadows. It is long lasting and you can wear all day without reapplication. I got it as a sample from other SephorA purchases and will buy more when I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love liquid shimmer shadows and I'm very impressed by this formula!  It's a refined shimmer, not glittery, applies and blends out easily and can be sheered out or built up to look more foiled.  Once dried, it doesn't budge and I didn't have any fallout.  I do recommend applying it over a primer or glitter glue, especially those with hooded eyes, to avoid creasing if applying more than a slight wash of shimmer.  Although Magnetic is described as brown, it's actually more of a mid toned silvery taupe that easily pairs with many different looks.  I highly recommend these shadows and will definitely be picking up more colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wear it alone for a light, sheer iridescent look or on top of other shadow for a little extra glow. Goes on super smooth and dries quickly.  Stays all day.  My new fave and more than worth the money.  This is a new-to-me beauty item I'll never let myself be out of until the end of time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite, great formula! I picked the grey metallic shade and want to get a few more. A bit pricey , wish there was more product for that price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this! Itu2019s great for an easy quick look on its own or layered over other shadows. It blends out easily and dries down with no creasing throughout the day. I will definitely be getting this in some other shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This used to be my favorite eye shadow until the recent package change and apparent formula change. Even though a little pricey I way willing to pay the price for the ease of application and beautiful pop of color but that's all gone now. When the bottle arrived it didn't even look full. The applicator is now much smaller and flexible so you can't get a good application with just one or two swipes. And the color seems non-existent even with several layers. I'm very disappointed and have been forced to find a new daily shadow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not a big makeup person so I love things that are quick and easy while still looking like I put in some effort. This gives the perfect wash of color to add some interest and depth to my eyes. It can also be built up to be more impactful. The formula is so lightweight and easy to blend. It lasts for quite some time on my skin as well. I love this and will be repurchasing when I run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not what I expected, color to orange on my fair skin.

reviews.review_title: Wanted to love, color very muddy-ash
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not what I expected.  My 7 year old even asked me if I intended to paint my eyes like that.  Hubby was not impressed  either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Never thought I would buy a eye shadow tint but I am so glad I did!!! I purchased the champagne color and absolutely love it I get many complements on it!! I canu2019t wait to purchase more shades because I love it that much!!! Itu2019s easy to use too which is a big plus!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this and a more metallic color and neither had any color payoff whatsoever. I used my normal eye primer and they were so completely sheer that it appeared that I didn't apply eyeshadow at all. For that price, I expect to see results. I returned both.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing color and stays beautiful the whole day. Can use alone as everyday eye shadow. Sets very quickly, so you have to do one eye at a time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this. So easy to use. Stays on. The color I chose is so beautiful with my blue eyes. The problem is that it looks like they don't make #19 anymore. Bring it back!! Please!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think the price, product and color is totally *5*, but for the advertising showing a somewhat wet or metallic look for some shades (like the arm swatches in the promo pics), I would give it *4*. I love cream and stick shadows, this is my first liquid, but I find only a few brands actually perform wellu2014this is one of them and way easier than a stick. I will say you do kind of really need to dig into the bottle to get product out, and still the bottle grabs at the applicator, like a mascara wand exiting the bottle, and pulls a lot of product off. The color Flannel is magnificent, perhaps the base is a nude pink but the iridescence (itu2019s probably really fine shimmer particles but itu2019s doesnu2019t look glittery at all) is pink, maybe-purple, it definitely has a cool-toned mauve look to it. I apply it over shadow or a primer right into the lid with the applicator and get good application all day, only some fading in the deepest part of my crease. This formula dries pretty quickly so you donu2019t have to worry about it creasing, like with a more creamy/ oily formula (Charlotte Tilbury creams). I will definitely purchase more

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this eyeshadow but Camel Smoke is red. UGH. All camel colors I have ever seen are a dark tan? Why all the red eyeshadows these days?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous color and foolproof application. I did not want to love this as much as I did for the price, but the quality of the pigment and formula are undeniable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Gorgeous color and foolproof application. I did not want to love this as much as I did for the price, but the quality of the pigment and formula are undeniable!

reviews.review_text: Saw a youtuber I love with this and bought it on the spot. I LOVE it. It goes on so easily and is such a nice, shadowy brown shade. It looks very natural, blends out super easily, and stays on really well. Highly recommend and will most likely be buying more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought I was gonna returned it after my first application bcs of the liquidity consistency; I wasn't sure how to blend it out. It also wasn't as taupe as i thought it would be. But after applying it with my ring finger at the corner of my eyes and added other eye shadow on my crease, it actually turned into a beautiful highlighter. It is true that the color wasn't what I intended to buy, but i love this for other purpose now and i have been wearing it every day since!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Goes on easily enough, but does crease eventually even with a primer. Also the color fades from metallic to matte, which is just weird.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Sunset is gorgeous! Love the formula and new packaging. Stays put all day.

reviews.review_title: Good staying power, not easy to blend.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased one of the light colors initially and loved it as a lower lid color. The staying power is fantastic. This brown Volcano didnu2019t work for me. It was very difficult to blend with the wand, my finger, or a brush. It doesnu2019t move much once on, so I gave up and returned. I will recommend this product as I do enjoy the light color, but be very skilled if trying a dark shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don't usually write reviews, but felt I neded to regarding this amazing product! I have had problems with shimmery eyeshadows getting all over my face but not so with this- it really stays in place. I now have 5 colors- the matte ones are pretty sheer but great for every day, and I particularly love the shimmery ones. Highly recommemnd this product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for an everyday no make up look. I do wish it lasted a bit longer but for someone with oily eyelids this holds up nicer than most cream products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This swatched beautifully in store, but the formula is a little hard to work with. If you try to blend too much, it sort of fades into nothing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this new formula and while  Love the new formula. My favorite for when I need to do a quick look that appears like it more effort.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love these shadows.  This is a champagne shade, and it adds a bright shimmer while feeling like you are wearing no makeup at all.  It has great lasting power also.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My friend has 4 of these and she thinks they are amazing. They do look wonderful on her so I thought I would treat myself. For the colour 5 stars but the formula was not for my eyelids. They looked like reptile skin,  not the look I want. I did return it. But because the colours is so beautiful they are worth a go. I have tried other liquid eyeshadows since and I know now they are not for my lids.

reviews.review_title: Armani eye shadow, i freaking love you!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I fell in love with this stuff. Yeah it's wicked expensive but a little goes a long way. As mentioned, it can be tricky to apply with precision so i normally use my finger or a Q tip. I get complements all the time! It is very long lasting, and it's probably best to use a primer to prevent creasing. I dont use this every day because i tend to do a shimmery cheek and Im approaching 30 so i dont want my face too sparkly! One shimmery feature is appropriate for day time- more than that is overkill! I will be buying this in the future, i might stuick to the same color because you can layer darker shadows into a night time look. Copper works amazing with my brunette complexion. I asked the beauty consultant in the store if there was a compribale product and she told me nothing that looks THAT good!. Armani eye shadow, i freaking love you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing how much this costs for a sheer, mushroom brown shadow. I found the formula to be crapey and aging. Made my eyes look like I had wrinkles. Eerily reminds me of YSL Touche Eclat which has the same aging effect on my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this liquid shadow. I have shades rose ashes and flannel and they are stunning beautiful to wear alone or sometimes I like to put something shimmery or glittery in the center of the lid. They dry quick and do not crease at all. Looking into getting some more shades because I love them so much.

reviews.review_title: First time and now forever user!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OMG....this is an amazing product!!! I don't do reviews often, but I had to do this one. So, I've been on the search for a good liquid eyeshadow. My eyelids are dry and starting to show their age. I was always scared to use liquid eyeshadow b/c I thought the application would be difficult. But I tried GAB's Eye Tint Liquid Eyeshadow and I am never going back to power again! The pigment is rich and it has long-lasting impact. I don't have to refresh during the day. I will admit it can be a bit finicky and you have to work fast when distributing it on your eyelid. But you get the hang of it. I use my fingertip and it works best for me. The only thing I wish is that it came in more colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this based on a YouTube recommendation and it was totally worth the price . Cold Copper is a beautiful shade for everyday and the formula is divine- no creasing at all and stays vibrant all day.  I always take a close look at my eyes before cleansing at night and this looks as good after 12 hours as it did when applied.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The matte formulas are hard to blend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The matte formulas are hard to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the cold copper color. Not a color I would normally choose, but took a chance and it was beautiful with just the perfect amount of subtle shimmer. Price is too expensive for what you get, thus only 4 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: #10 Senso looks great in the tube but on my eyes it is just a purple color. It is easy to use but the color on your eyes is nothing like what is in the tube. For $39, I expect it at least to be true to color.

reviews.review_title: Possibly the best shadow I've ever purchased
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This shadow color and formula is phenomenal!  It's now my favorite and go to product and always want to have it in my stash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best liquid eyeshadow that I bought! Absolutely beautiful the colour fits every skin tone

reviews.review_title: drier texture that cakes on the lids
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have the Shimmer Eye Tint Liquid Eyeshadows which I love but this Matt Eye Tint has a different texture that cakes on my eyelids. This was my first Sephora return item.

reviews.review_title: Great Pigment and stayed all day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome color selection, stayed all day. I use this as a base eyeshadow, and it makes my eyeshadow last all day long. The liquid with the brush makes it easy to apply and Iu2019ve had a few colors of this eye tint. Highly recommend this to everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great quality gel eyeshadow. Last the whole day, does not crease. A bit expensive, but worth it as it takes a minute to do make up with it in the morning.  I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Disappointed because this does crease before the end of the day. For the price, it should be a better product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: BEST THING EVER - wear it alone in the day or as a base for darker shadow in the evening. Stays on ALL day even in the summer. My fav and now all my friends fav too.

reviews.review_title: To die for! I need them all!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These. Are. To. Die. For. I LOVE these. I have never been a liquid eyeshadow type girl... until these. They are so quick and easy to use and stay in place all day. You can even mix them ro create your own shade easily. I want them all. I know they're pricier... but they're totally worth it. Love them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: S'applique tru00e8s bien et reste bien appliquer durant tru00e8s longtemps...belle couleur

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not sure why this color is called Nude Smoke. It's a greyish pink in the most unflattering way. Maybe it's not a good color choice for someone with warm undertones. It looks oddly unnatural on my eyelids, like I have mistakenly tainted them with some sort of paint. The color looks ashy and patchy, not blending very well. This is very drying for my lids and it emphasizes all the textures.   There is something about the formula that you must get it right with the first application. When I wanted to blend more color in with the second application, it be comes a mess. This one is very disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wasn't happy at first with color pay off. A second light layer gave a glowy base for applying darker shades for contour and outer V. It would work nicely for a natural one shadow look if that's your goal. I decided to keep. No creasing whatsoever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love these shadows! They told me to use my finger and not the brush applicator. I tap on my color and its buildable. I love how these colors last all day. Iu2019m a contact lens wearer and an eye toucher so I give my shadows a workout! They come right off with my makeup remover but look fabulous as long as I need them!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used to love shadow when I was young. Unfortunately, now that I am well into middle age, I find eye shadow just makes me look older. Armani Eye Tints have completely changed that. I have a bunch of them, both matte and shimmery and I cannot get over how fabulous they are. They are so easy to apply with either a finger or a brush. There is plenty of time to apply and sheer out if desired and once they set they do not budge. Pretty incredible since removal is a snap. What makes them so perfect for older people is the fact that they do not crease... ever! They are pricey but it takes forever to finish a tube. Bonus... they double as totally unsmudgable eyeliners.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered Nude Smoke and am very disappointed.  I've tried almost all the higher end liquid eyeshadows out there, and this one I found to be the worst.  It's runny, applies unevenly, is extremely sheer, and a waste of money. Maybe I got one from a bad batch,  but I'm not even interested in trying again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful color with lots of pigment that starts out sheer but easy to build to a dramatic look.  However, there is a serious amount of fallout within an hour.  Since this is a glittery formula I understand that this will happen throughout the day, but I expect better from Armani.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish it was a little more obvious but overall it is a pretty shimmer but definitely use primer before applying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i LOVE this product. it is so beautiful and the perfect amount of glittery greatness. so worth it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love it, but it just did not show up on my eyelids.  I bought 2 different colors and they did not work for me.

reviews.review_title: BEST eye tints ever - worth the $$$$
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I keep coming back to this liquid eye shadow - especially for summer! This is my 3rd purchase and has a lilac tint which i wasns't sure of but now i LOVE....buildable color, gorgeous sheen even on mature lids...you can't mess it up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Cold Copper is life changing for blue eyes!  This is literally the only u201cluxaryu201d make up item that I owe so that says a ton that I would pop the $$$ tag. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Once you use one, you will want them all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried a sample I received from Sephora.  Had to have it.  Great coverage, creamy. Stays all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: From the color and the name I thought it would be pinky,it was grey.   Not a fan.   I returned it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Did not like it.  The color was way off.   For the $$ it should have been a love it.   I returned it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: All over depth in color w/out being to bling-y. Easy application and buildable color No streaking or creasing detected

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought Flannel on the recommendation that it was a dupe for the Limited Edition Eyes to Kill in 30 Rose Popillia (my HG one-and-done shade!). I have hit serious pan on my Rose Popillia, but worried about running out.   I bought this during the Rouge sale and the two colors are similar, but I feel Flannel has more of a purple base. It still has about the same dimension on the lid. The product blends and sets beautifully. I did not experience any flaking or creasing throughout the day, and it played well with powder eyeshadows.   I gave it 4 stars because the wand is a little big for eyeshadow, and I know eventually it will dry out or it will become hard to use up all the product. With that, the full price - and even the sale price - is a little steep for what you get. But I am happy to have a distant cousin to my beloved Eyes to Kill shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased this after I saw it used in a YouTube tutorial.  Iu2019ve worn it a few times and think itu2019s a great product.  The color is a bit sheer at first but very buildable and blends well.  I didnu2019t have any problems with creasing.  I will say it dries down quickly so you have to work quickly after you apply it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This shadow is a little more shiny than I anticipated. Itu2019s ok for a one time purchase but not worth the cost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite shadow hands down.  I have 3 colors, gold ashes, rose ashes and flannel and love them all.  Color lasts all day and I donu2019t see creasing. I can make the color more noticeable by just layering on more.  It a great alternative to those that get irritated eyes with powder shadows.  Iu2019m mid 40s and it looks great on older lids u263aufe0f.  I love this stuff!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this in 9 Cold Copper, and I loved it so much I went back and got 10 Senso as well.  I always use an eyeshadow primer for my oily lids, and put this on top, and it stays all day with no creases.  I've worn one of my two colors everyday since I bought them- I had no idea I would love them so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Finally, a non-powder shadow that doesnu2019t make my lids crepey and isnu2019t sparkly! Love for traveling - just apply and smooth/blend with fingertips. Purchased with spice and leather smoke shades for an eye that works from morning to night. Moisturize/prime, dab wand, smooth quickly and it stays put with little fading and minimal settling. Because it dries so quickly, itu2019s best to apply one lid/one color at a time and the pigment is so saturated that youu2019ll only need a dot or two. When blended, nude smoke is a slightly darker beige tone on my very pale complection - fairly natural, but not light enough to u2018highlightu2019 browline.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best eye shawdows  (eye tints) I have ever used. I have oily eye lids and this product is amazing. It stays on all day or all night.  It is a must try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These are my favorite, everyday eye shadow. They're easy to use, last all day and don't crease on me. I usually put a darker shadow in the crease and put this on the lid for some shimmer. I have colors 11 and 12. 11 is my favorite but 12 is nice when I want a cooler tone look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Senso pairs really well with cold copper. I use both when I'm doing a more dramatic eye. Highly pigmented and has great staying power yet blends well. One of my favorite purchases of 2017.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this as an everyday shadow alone. It goes on really beautifully and blends out well. Shimmery but not cheap and glittery.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a product that I was a bit underwhelmed with (I know I am in the minority here). My disappointment is not with the product formula, I think I just picked the wrong color. I have tried it on its own a few times and to be honest itu2019s not anything special. I have continued to play with it as a base to other powder shadows

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nope.  It stung my eyes and made me weep (literally).  If I had to guess, I'd say it might be the alcohol in the product.  The stinging stopped after a few minutes of wear...But all four times I tried this, my eyes watered for at least the first 30 minutes.  Personally, it's not worth it for me.  I don't understand why this product is raved about by bloggers.  This is a very sheer to light application.  You can't really build it up to opaque without it looking cakey.  It also creases after about 3-4 hours, even when I set it with powder or with an eyeshadow that usually does not crease.  If you need a sheer wash of eye color that only needs to last over dinner and you don't care if your eyes sting for a while, this will do.  I mean, it did look nice for the two minutes before my eyes started to water--I tapped it on my lid and into my crease and quickly blended the edges lightly with a synthetic brush.  It sets quickly.  But, again, hurting my eyes is not worth it so back it went.  On that note, I did discover that this is pretty waterproof against tears...so there's that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Terrible! Within couple of hours started to roll off and went from brown to orange. Not long lasting at all amd definitely not for all day wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I saw these when they first came out and they seemed kind of meh to me. I tested them again when I was scoping out things to buy for the Rouge sale. I fell in love with Flannel and ended up buying Shadow, Rose Ashes, and Gold Ashes as well. These apply wet and dry down completely. They dont feel like powder when it dries. It just feels like your eyelid is bare. If you apply the colors and blend with a brush quickly after, they will blend very easily. These also hold up very well on oily lids!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fabulous product! Such a quick and easy way to apply color to your lid. And it lasts! No creasing even at the end of the day. The colors are beautiful and Iufe0f want them all :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Shimmer = Glitter, glitter everywhere! I would've rated this lower but gave it 3 stars because the formulation is a nice creamy application - if you don't get the shimmer I'm sure it's great. Also some of you might really love glitter if you go clubbing or something - or have children who want glitter all over. In those cases, this is definitely for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice highlighting color. Goes on easy and looks beautiful on! Makes your eyes just so pretty! What Armani does with clothes is reflected in his make up...he makes you look beautiful in a understated way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice bold color but can be blended. Dries quickly and very portable...good for travel. Stays in all day without creasing or fading! Great product!

I love this formula and it is so easy to use. I got a few shades but I use the nude smoke as a base. It blends with a finger or brush effortlessly and lasts all day. I have mature hooded eyes and it does not cause any textural issues. It doesn't transfer or flake. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't think I'd love this as much as I would. I'm your classic minimal no makeup kinda girl. This tint does exactly that nice clean wash of color on your lids that you can layer without looking cakey. I love it and want to go back and get more colors. Pricey but worth every penny
These are absolutely gorgeous! SUBTLE and very flattering. just glides on very smoothly.

reviews.review_title: Luxury eye tints that last all day!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Absolutely wonderful eye tint!    The formula itself is very creamy and easy to apply. For me, a lot of creamier eye tints/makeup never last long. They fade and end up stuck in my creases. This however, has been amazing.   It's long lasting without the smudge. Plus, its very easy to blend!  As far as color goes, I have a 2 mattes (taupe + nude smoke) & 1 shimmer finish (gold ashes). I absolutely LOVE to use the shimmer finish on the inside of my eyes & as a brow bone highlighter.   The matte colors I have are really great as a base or main eye makeup. Both are SUUUUUPER pigmented, which I really love because if a product is going to be crease resistant, it better stay on all day.   Overall I would say these are certainly an investment but well worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love this product!! everyday use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am surprised by all the good reviews this product has! Well, to be fair, this is a review for the color Flannel. Flannel looks beautiful in the tube--I can only describe it as a gunmetal lavender with pink and gold shift. It is also beautiful when swatched on the hand. On the lids, though, it's a different story. It didn't show up at all on my light complexion. I tried adding more, but it still didn't show up, and it started to crease up.  I tested it in different lighting, and it unfortunately didn't work to my liking. I think someone who loves very subtle shimmers would be into this eye shadow color, but I can't justify paying $40 on such subtlety. And that is saying something considering that I love Korean style makeup. I'm sure there are other colors that are worth it, though. They do blend out beautifully and have the most complex color shift to them. Really pretty and expensive looking on the eye.
Best everyday eyeshadow I've purchased.  Application and coverage are everything!  I only wished they carried this in the store.

I was looking for something like this and decided to splurge on my birthday. It is beautiful it gives you a beautiful pigmentation and is not patchy or clumpy like other products that I have used. It does not crease and nothing moves, it stays on your eyes beautifully. Also to clarify I went out on a 90 degree weather and this did not budge I Love it I will definitely will purchase more is torally worth it.

I've ordered six of these and I'm completely in love with the shades and formula! I have Jade, Gold Ashes, Shadow, Rose Ashes, Onyx & Emeraude. Jade has to be my absolute favorite, it makes my green eyes really pop. These are build-able as well. Very long lasting with and/or without primer for me. I really love these, the only downside is that they're rather pricey. Yet I still want to buy more shades. Thanks Sephora, for carrying this awesome brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I really do enjoy this eye tint. Its no fuss, hydrating and has beautiful color options.   I have the Gold Ashes (12) and Zenith (13), the latter being my favorite and not carried by Sephoras, unfortunately.  I find that these last longer if i apply them on top of another eyeshadow. My favorite combination is the Charlotte Tilbury cream eyeshadow in Jean with the Zenith on top. TO DIE.
I have oily eyelids and this stuff stays on all day. I bought some cheaper ones thinking it would be the same but this blends beautifully, unlike the cheaper brands.
Incredible staying power! The shimmery color I got is a lovely topper, not so much a color by itself. But super versatile with all my other shadows combined. Will be getting more colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I'm disappointed in the color. I have olive tone skin and this color really doesn't do much for me. I won't return it because I threw away the packaging. I'll just have to use this as a base color.
LOVE-LOVE-LOVE this product!! It lasts all day, doesn't crease & Flannel is the perfect everyday color!! It's a bit pricey, but I literally use a dab on each eye!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have Cold Copper, Spice Smoke, and Camel Smoke.  All three blend beautifully.  I have very oily eyelids, so I have to use an eye primer.  These stay all day for 11+ hours as long as I prime.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: absolutely beautiful and perfect! this dries down quickly but it also able to be blended and spread without issue. gold ashes is a perfect universal sparkle shade great for inner corner, brown bone, on top of other colors to lighten them or wear alone, no primer needed.
I love love love this stuff, Gold Ashes is so pretty! So easy to use and I'm complimented every time I use it! Hurry and get it back in stock!

reviews.review_title: Love love it and ordered more!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I didn't want to love this (high price point) but they are amazing.  I ordered rose ashes  and it seemed a bit opalescent which I am not crazy about but tried it anyway on my mobile lid and absolutely love it.  It is just subtle shimmer not sparkly. So easy to use and lasts all day.  I just ordered more colours!

I bought this a couple of days ago while I was on vacation in California. I almost didn't get it but I'm glad I did. Giorgio Armani products aren't in my local Sephora's so I was happy to see them in person. I bought shade 12 Gold Ashes and it is beautiful. I have light skin and blue eyes. It brightens up my face and gives me a beautiful glow. I would definitely recommend it. 5 stars.
These are the BEST things on the planet! You can use them quickly for a swipe on and blend with your finger. You can also use them and make a great smokey eye!
these shadows blend like no one's business! perfect for making the perfect smokey eye!!!

Couldn't believe how cool and smooth it went on my eye lids. It glides on and stays on all day. I got the 9 cold cooper and it's beautiful. So far my favorite eye shadow for the shiny color and texture. Just the way it feels. Love it!

I was skeptical about this product and didn't think I'd like it at all. I love cream eyeshadow, but the concept of this seemed like it was going to be a big mess. I finally decided to give it a go after hearing so many people talk about it. I have to say, I was pleasantly surprised. It's so easy to work with, gives great color payoff and isn't patchy at all. I do have to use a primer with it or else it'll crease on me, but in all fairness I've only come across 2 eyeshadow formulas I don't need a primer with (Burberry and Tom Ford) and EVERYTHING else creases on me without primer. I can't wait to try more colors. I took a star away because of the price tag and creasing, but I'd say they're still worth it in my book.

I picked up #8 Flannel one day after returning a Clinique palette that I was allergic to. I'm allergic to virtually everything in a powder form. I seem to be able to tolerate cream or stick shadows though. Anyway, this product is great, and the colour is very pretty! A pink iridescent shimmery colour. I have gotten compliments on it too. I've just crossed over into my 40s, so I'm more careful what I wear on my eyes, but this a winner!I may try a matte shade next.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love shimmery, neutral eyeshadows. My go-to is Urban Decay's Sin, but I was looking for a similar color with more of a metallic sheen. Gold Ashes (#12) was the perfect fit! It's a little lighter than Sin, but they look great layered. The Armani Eye Tint is very buildable and can be as opaque as you want it to be. I love the metallic, shimmery finish. And it lasts forever with a primer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I just bought this to replace stila kitten eyeshadow.  Can i say WOW?!!!!!!  It is gorgeous and so long wearing.  The color is so rich and opaque.  A little is all you need.  I don't see how I can ever go without this gem.  Would highly recommend it.  I do wear a primer because my eyelids are so oily but i don't really know if you need it.  This stuff one it dries it's set.  It will not budge.  So in love and i think it's completely worth the money.

It's a lovely color, very very glittery-- honestly found it a little hard to use, had to do a lot of smearing around and was a bit difficult to get my eyes even... and I've been doing makeup for a long time.  It also creases, which is frustrating for something so expensive.  Long story short- pretty, but don't spend your money unless you have nothing else you'd like to buy.

I was hesitant to try these because I have crepey skin on my eyelids. I saw a video where Brianna Stankos raved about them and she was right. I love these. I have five of them and will order more. They blend nicely, last for hours. They don't settle into my textured, mature skin. Great for travel and very versatile. Wish Sephora would label the mat vs the shimmer in the product description. A wonderful product.
Amazing colors, easy to blend and stays all day! I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought these in No. 8 and No. 12 and I am so in love. These eye tints are gorgeous, full coverage and last all day. I was a little hesitant given the price, but as with all the Armani products I have tried, this was definitely worth it. I am planning to buy the other 3-4 colors I swatched in store and loved over the next few weeks. Do yourself a favor and buy this if you are considering it!

I purchased Flannel. I couldn't be happier with my purchase! The color was even prettier in person than the pictures of swatches I saw online. Creamy, blend-able, stays put! I want every color! It's worth the $40.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: It's a light formula.  If you want a stronger punch of color, go w a powder.  But you can layer this and get almost a glass-y effect.
I got the sample of eye tint, and try it. So beautiful!

I bought the number 12 Gold Ashes since it can be used under my regular eyeshadow look if I want to kick it up a notch for evening. This gives a more subtle shimmer look without being too over the top.  Have been considering #10 next and was hoping to read some reviews for this shade. Guess I will have to swatch it the next time I'm at a store that carries Armani line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: These are the best products ever! They go on easily and blend easily and look fantastic. You can build them up or sheer them down, layer them...pretty much anything you want. A staple in my makeup collection.
This creamy eye makeup is so much better than using messy shadow. It goes on like a dream and is shiny and metallic. Stays on all day. Wish it came in more colors! Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: If you like Mac's Vex, then this is a must! It's the long wearing/more pigmented counterpart. It dries and locks into place, so there is no additional blending once it's dry. I top it off with Vex, but it's not necessary.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Picked this up on a whim in Flannel shade and absolutely love it! Lots of depth, almost opal like. I use alone or over powder shadow to add a little gleam. Need to move fast to blend cuz it dries quickly, but easy to smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for about 1 yr and love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I'm so glad I took the plunge to try these! After watching a YouTube beauty guru use them and show how they were to applied...I couldn't resist! They are a little more sheer when blended out but they blend out beautifully! I'm now looking to buy 2 more. They are so easy and effortless to use.
I wanted to love this so bad, but it never dries, and it creases.   The product itself is beautiful, but I just couldn't get it to work.

I first received this as a sample and was sold!! Due to the price I was only able to purchase two so far, #12 Gold Ashes and #5 Onyx. They are so stunning and so easy to work with but like the other reviews say, they do tend to dry quick. I do plan to purchase more in the future. These are also the first liquid eye shadows I have ever used. The first couple times I wore an eye primer, but you absolutely do not need to. Once you have your look set, they are good to go and stay put all day long!!

reviews.review_title: You have to try it at least once!!!
reviews.review_text: I was super hesitant to try these Giorgio Armani eye tints because I'm not usually a fan of liquid product for eye shadow, but these have completely changed my mind! They were easy to blend in evenly and surprising pigmented. It's wasn't streaky or clumpy like I expected it to be. i received eye tints 12, 21, 24 and I think they make the perfect trio. I have really fallen in love with the Giorgio Armani products so so much!!!

I thought liquid eyeshadows would be hard use but the Armani Eye Tints are amazing. There a lot like a cream shadow excerpt they're more lightweight and don't require as much effort to blend. I love using Fur Smoke all over for an everyday smoky eye or as a base for my powder eyeshadows. ArmanI really did a great job with the Eye Tints. They're easy to use and last all day. I highly recommend!
This product has staying power, but for the price it could definitely stand to be more pigmented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: It's easy to apply, but I prefer brush. I really like the color and how longer stay on my eyes. Everybody gives me compliments after use. And you can layer it on for a smokey eye or put it on as a light glow for a no makeup makeup look. <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: These eye tints exceeded my expectations. I love how smooth they apply and blend together. They're perfect for a quick glam when you're in a rush and loved that the formula doesn't crease and dries quickly.

Absolutely loved this product! The application is super easy, and the product goes on velvety smooth. I love how it lasts all day long without creasing. The colors are absolutely gorgeous and luxurious. I revieved this as a free sample!!

reviews.review_title: Fool proof and easy to use!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love these eye tints! I like to dot it on my eyelid and blend with my fingertip. You can layer it on for a smoky eye or put it on as a light glow for a no-makeup makeup look. Did not irritate my super sensitive eyes which is a bonus!

reviews.review_title: The best liquid eyeshadows on the market
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: WOW. Totally blown away by how intense these are. Most liquid eyeshadows I've tried tend to sheer out very quickly or dry so fast that I can't blend them. But these are SO pigmented (one tube would last you lifetime) and SO easy to blend!! Literally fool proof. I can create a full eye using just these shadows alone. Best liquid eyeshadows I've ever tried!

I absolutely love this creamy based eyeshadow tint ! It's super pigmented and I just love the consistency and it works great as a base as well to make other shadows more intense. I would definitely recommend this product u2764ufe0f

I loved how easy to use these are. I put a dab on the back of my hand and applied with both finger or brush (I liked using a brush better because there was more control) and both applied smoothly. They come in gorgeous colors and make a great basecoat to apply other eyeshadow onto.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Pretty but very subtle, lasts most of the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This was a first for me. I'm not used to using creme based eyeshadows. To my surprise, they were much easier to use than I thought! Would definitely use again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow is one of the coolest things I have tried. I had never heard of a liquid to power eyeshadow until I received this product free to try through Influenster. The colors are so beautiful and very pigmented. They are more pigmented than most eyeshadows I have tried. It is a little hard at first to get used to and they can take a while to blend out since they are liquid at first so that is why I cannot give it 5 stars.
