Other than that they are absolutely amazing and the shimmer shade is my favorite by far.

I loved how long this eyeshadow lasted! I got samples of it from Influenster and found that the taupe/beige color was a great base for my eyelids, -'d the chocolate color was awesome for blue-eyed smiley eyes. The glittery one was good but I felt like it was maybe too glittery. I would've liked something more highlighter less glitter, personally. I kind of felt like the product was clumping a little bit on the eyeshadow dispenser itself, not in my eyes or anything. But felt like this could be fixed.  ALL in all, great product, would definitely buy after finishing. #ArmaniBeauty & #contest.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have never tried an eye tint before until I got this to try for free. And I am loving how long it lasts on my eyes and it doesnt feel like I have anything on.
Love this product! Makes it extremely quick and easy to put on eyeshadow. Looks great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I got Nude Smoke, Gold Ashes and Fur Smoke from Influenster for testing purpose. These are super easy to use and perfectly blendable for a great natural finish. The Nude Smoke is a perfect base eyeshadow. Just add a layer of Gold Ashes over it and you are ready to walk out of the door. If you are looking to add more depth, add a very small amount of Fur Smoke at the creases and blend in. Loving them!

This is my first time trying a liquid eyeshadow and I am PLEASANTLY surprised. These products had good wear time and were so easy to work with. I applied them with a blending brush to really be able to smoke out my eyes- so easy I could shout it from the mountain tops! I received this product to try from Influenster, & I'm so happy I did because I had no idea what I was missing. It has a high price tag, but if you like to look sultry and sexy without looking overdone- these are the products for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: i loved using this product because it went on as a cream. it was so easy to apply and looks so pretty! it then dries into a powder. i would recommend this for people like me that aren't great at eyeshadow. it looks professionally done!

reviews.review_title: Date Night Eye Tint -Easy coverage for day x night
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I used the eye tint for an evening date it. The products were easy to apply after work for a quick day to evening change up. I liked the shimmery tint the best. I would probably only repurchase this one in the eye tint collection.

This product is like a liquid eye shadow. I first used the shade Nude Smoke as a transition shade. I blended that into my crease and it dried just like a regular eye shadow but it had a little more definition to it. Then I used the shade Fur Smoke to further deepen up my crease. I didn't use too much to avoid it going all over the place since it was my first time trying this product. So, when I wanted to add more depth I just added a little more little by little to intensify my look. The product was very easy to blend and such a smooth, creamy texture. It doesn't crease up and it literally does dry like a normal eye shadow, which I think is pretty cool. Then to top the whole look off, I went in which the shade Gold Ashes which is the lightest shade from the trio I received for free from Influenster to review. I put this color on my lid and the color was very rich and still creamy like the other shades. Overall, this product is pretty unique because I never really thought of having a liquid eye shadow.

I used the smoky brown shade and the gold glitter shade to create a smoky liner and shimmer eye look. I like how creamy these are and they definitely don't crease, but just to make sure, I did use a primer with it. When using it as to blend into a liner, you have to blend straight away as it will tend to dry making it harder to blend. I can't wait to use the gold shimmer on my bridal clients! Thank you to Influenster for sending me these products to try for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the best eye shadow for anyone who wants something easy and brush-free. Does not crease, stays on all day, super easy to blend. I hate eye make-up because it looks heavy on my eyes but this stuff is magical.

I love these eye tints so much! Normally these products crease on my eye even after i set them but this one doesnt! I dont even have to set it for it to stay on. These are esp cially perfect for when i'm in a hurry and I want to do a quick smokey eye. They blend easiyl and flawlessly! I recieved these for free to try and review and i'll definitely be buying more! They are worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was so excited for the chance to try these eye tints! This was my first time trying the Armani beauty line and I was impressed. At first I was not sure how I would like these eye tints, but once placed on the eye its so easy to spread and create the look you want. I used the smoky eye trio and I was so in love! The tints are very pigmented and blend so easy. my biggest fear about tints are crease lines however this product was so amazingly crease resistant. the color lasts all day and no touch ups required! A little pricy but I definitely recommend! Its one of the best luxury eye tints!

I received this for free and thought it was great. It was easy to use and blend with my finger. I liked the lighter colors best. This was a pretty shimmery shade that was great for a natural daytime look.

I received this product as part of a VovBox with Influenster for testing purposes.  I absolutely love this cream eye shadow. It is much higher quality than the ones by Clinique. They are really pigmented and vibrant. I used the dark brown color all over my lid and blended into the crease for an easy smokey eye. Make sure to blend the shadow before it dries because it is difficult to do afterwards. Overall great product!

I was so amazed by the formula of this product. When you initially apply it, it feels wet and almost like a lip gloss and after it dries it has a powder feel to the touch. I definitely recommend to blend this while it's wet once it dries the color is harder to blend. Thank you influenster for allowing me to test this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I fell in love with the eye tints this year (after buying the gift set from holiday!) and I was super excited to try the matte versions that I got from influenster. While the shades I received weren't ones I would've necessarily picked for myself, I think that they are great shades. Like the original formula, these are seriously budgeproof and SO pigmented. I accidentally wore an eye tint look to sleep once and it still hadn't creased when I woke up!
I am really liking these eye tints! Great color selection and the formula is nice and consistent. Easy to blend. I did receive some for testing purposes from influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am so impressed with these eye tints! I wasn't sure how they were going to wear throughout the day, since they go on liquid, and dry matte. I was worried that they might crack and get dry, or possible crease by the end of the day. I was so pleasantly surprised after my first day trying the eye tints, because they wore so well that it looked like I had just applied them, even after 12 hours of wear. I have been wearing the eye tints almost every day since I received them, and have received a lot of compliments of the shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I'm really loving the new Giorgio Armani Eye Tints. This was my first time using eye tints and it wasn't bad at all. It goes on smooth and saves time I feel. I've tried 4 colors so far and really like them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received three of the Giorgio Armani Eye Tints in from Influenster for reviewing purposes. I was never a big fan of cream shadows because they are usually not very bendable and dry out quickly. Although I was at first skeptical this product blended well and the color payoff was very nice. I feel that the packaging and overall product design is well thought out and easy to use. I suggest using your fingers to pat in and then blend with a brush for ultimate use. I will be purchasing this product again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Loved the ease of application of this and how easily it transformed to powder. I even forgot ALL my makeup brushes when I was traveling one weekend but luckily I had this stuff and it look so nice on the eyes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: These new eye tints are amazing. It is so easy to create a smokey eye with it. I use a blending brush, and the product goes on smoothly. They are very pigmented and lasted all day on my eyes. I hope they make a holiday set with these products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I recieved this shade, along with two others, from Influenster to try out and review. I have to say, I think I might be in the minority, but I do not care for these Eye Tints! They personally don't dry down all the way on me, and I find they can transfer easily. I do have this problem with other cream products though, so take that with a grain of salt. The colors that I received are a bit unremarkable. Some of the other shades seem to have much more character to them, but the ones I tried were easily replicated with eyeshadow shades I'm sure all of us have. TL;DR- skip these and use that money to buy a palette!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This was actually my first time applying liquid eye tints so I didnu2019t know what to expect. I recieved the eye tints in colors 12 golden ashes, 21 fur smoke, and 24 nude smoke. This color palette of liquid eyeshadows is absolutely beautiful! Neutrals with a hint of shimmer. The wand is similar to a lip gloss applicator so itu2019s gently on your delicate eyelids. When you paint on your eyelids, you have to be sure to blend all the colors together to create the finished look. Then it will dry and feel like a powder matte eyeshadow. Smokey eye has never been easier and luxurious! BONUS: you can use the lighter shade as highlight as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: These eye tints are so smooth and natural. I use one alone or mix several to create a dimensional and beautiful look. I love the Taupey color alone for a natural look to work. I use 3 colors to spice up a weekend look! The texture is smooth AND DOES NOT CREASE! My eye shadows always crease but these don't budge- I need them all!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received 3 Armani Eye Tints in the shades from Influenster for reviewing purposes. I was never a fan of cream shadows because they dried out pretty quickly. I like the packaging because it is easy to work with the applicator, the shade is beautiful. I will be purchasing this product again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed these eye-tints! They are super easy and work great when I need to be out the door within 15 minutes. The colors are super rich and once they are on the lid, they turn to a powder finish which is also great for a long lasting eye look! I also used it for my lips to contour a little and I loved the way it turned a pinky mauve shade into a deeper shade to match my skin tone and over all look! I loved it so much and recommend that anyone try it!

reviews.review_title: Was scared of cream eyeshadows but not anymore!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I usually don't like cream eyeshadows because I find that they are hard to apply and blend, they tend to crease and fade after an hour, but I was pleasantly surprised how easy it was to use these because they dry matte. The trick is to apply a bit of product on your hand then using your finger or a makeup brush to apply it. I did a soft smoky natural look and it came our amazing!

So I am definitely not a fan of eye tints. I feel like they make me look horrible but this thing is so nice and gentle that it actually looked good! I was definitely pleasantly surprised. It glides on super smoothly and stays on practically all night long. I had to touch it up maybe once or twice. Great product.

reviews.review_title: Totally lives up to its claims!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I tried out the eye tints on a very hot day and it absolutely was long lasting and I appreciated that it didn't crease at all. I also love using the brown shade to effortlessly smudge out my lower lash line!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I used 3 shades - Nude Smoke, Leather Smoke and Gold Ashes. They were not only beautiful and easy to use, but they last for hours and hours. As a super busy working mom, I think these eye tints are genius and am a big fan. Thumbs up!

So I received 3 Armani Eye Tints in the shades 12, 21 and 24 from Influenster for reviewing purposes a couple of weeks ago and I think it's time to leave my review.  I was never a fan of cream shadows because they came in a pan and somehow ended up ruined really fast, also the colors offered weren't exactly very wearable.  This is a cool concept and Armani Beauty is executing it pretty well, I like the packaging because it is easy to work with the applicator, the shade range is very beautiful going from neutral everyday to glam shades, I can totally see me getting some more of these beauties.  Now to the shades I received.  Number 12 is very pretty, sparkly and beautiful, it can even be used as a highlighter.   Number 21 is hard to work with, I find it dries faster than the other two shades so you either blend fast or you end up with a mess. The shade is nice tho. Number 24 is beautiful and my favorite out of the three, you can even wear it on its own, add some liner and you're ready to go.  These last on a fairly good amount of time, they are easy to remove and not that hard to work with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I feel like this are almost too natural looking and not enough pigment. I would say they have about as much color as a tinted eyeshadow primer, I just wish it was thicker and with more color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. It is so pigmented and goes on to the skin perfectly. I used it for my inner eye corner and also doubled it as a highlighter on my cheek bones. Definitely worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received the Eye Tint free from Influenster in exchange for my feedback on the product.  Quite frankly, had they not provided me with this product, I may have missed out.  I have combination skin, and my eyelids are on the oily side.  As a result, I tend to avoid more cream based eye shadows.   the applicator is super easy to use, but like others have noted, it is quite strong.  You have to make sure and apply just a small amount and blend appropriately.  That being said, the colors are fantastic, and I did not feel the stickiness that I get with other cream shadows.  I literally can wear it all day long without any fading.  LOVE!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Cream eye shadows as a group have been limited to frosty, shiny, chromey metallic finishes which I can mostly do without.  Recently, however, a few good brands have offered matte finish cream shadows, and Armani is starting with beautiful basics.  Full-on matte nudes!  I just bought Spice, amazingly pigmented with cinnamon-burgundy undertones.  Not a bit of shimmer, buildable medium coverage OMG!  Recommend you pick up some long-wearing makeup remover and a few cream shadow brushes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: These Giorgio Armani Eye Tints are insanely pigmented and very long wearing.  I will say that they do require a little bit of skill when it comes to blending, but as long as you work with them quickly and don't wait too long, you'll be ok.  The colors are gorgeous and the wear time is incredible!  I have very oily eyelids and always have to use a primer, but not with these!  They last and do not crease on me at all! I like the doe foot applicator that it comes with as it's easy to apply, especially with the curved tip.  Great products and the tube will last forever!

I'm not the biggest fan of cream shadows simply because of my oily skin. However, this eye tint is wonderful. I tried it with and without primer and both way it did not crease or smudge. Very impressed. I liked the wand simply because I'm a makeup artist and I like that I can transfer some of the tint to a palette without contaminating the bottle. I'd say it takes a little skill if you are new to makeup, but not too difficult. I especially love the shimmering tints.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed with the eye tint but my absolute favorite one is #12. It is a shimmer and it applies BEAUTIFULLY. I use it as an intense highlight sometimes too. The formula surprisingly does not crease at all. It blends really well. I use a brush to blend the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I got this eye tint in the shades gold ashes, fur smoke and nude smoke. I absolutely love how versatile and easy to blend these are! However, I did notice that the darker the shade it the harder it is to blend.

At first I was a little weary of a liquid eyeshadow, but now I love it!!! The nude shades are a great way to transition for a day and night look and it is great because of no creasing!! I settle it with some translucent powder:

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love these eye tints!!! They are so easy to work with and perfect for those who travel and always on the go!!!! Great for the holiday season to gift for a special someone! They are super pigmented, blend beautifully, and last all day! Never crease! I'm an Esthetician and am always on the go! I work lots of hours, so when I wear these this is what lasts the longest on me!!! Love that about them!!!!!
The shine I subtle enough for daily wear. It's easy to apply quickly and stays mot of the day! Great purchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Thanks to Influenster, I was able to test out my very first eyeshadow in a liquid form. These eye tints are extremely pigmented and have a really good color payoff. However, with that being said, the product can go on a little harsh. The eyeshadow dries pretty quickly so it was hard for me to blend. Instead of blending the eyeshadow, I have to use other products to help me blend. Other than that, the product is good at enhancing certain areas of the eye.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. I tried 3 shades and fur smoke was my favorite. It's a beautiful brown color that blends out kind of orange and creates an effortlessly bold smokey eye. The formula is buildable and lasts all day with minimal fading and doesn't crease over time. However it dries pretty fast so it takes some practice and some getting used to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have the annoying moments where the eye shadows I wear, smudges easily. I do not have hooded eyes but I do have Asian eyes. This eyeshadow does wonders and more! It's so comfortable and blendable! It's staying power is amazing and the best part is...it's so pigmented! Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received this product to test from influenster and have never used eyeshadow much in my life, I must say this is amazing. This specific eye tint is great for brightening the eyes and highlighting them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love the pigment on this eye tint! The color is super bright and very easy to blend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: So, I love the idea of this and the fact that the shadows don't crease. What's a little bit more difficult is the blending. It's fabulous with the lighter shades, but the darker shades can start looking muddy.   I tried three different shades: Gold Ashes, Nude Smoke and Camel Smoke. Gold Ashes was AMAZING. I got compliments on it when I wore it alone. Nude smoke basically disappeared on my skin since it's the same as my skin tone, so it made for a wonderful base. Camel Smoke was pretty difficult to apply. Layering the three wasn't very easy since they get sticky as they dry, so it takes a lot of practice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This eye tint is great! I love how nicely it glides on and it has a pretty shimmer too. Perfect for every day wear.
I was sent these items to review through influenster.  I absolutely love these eye tints.  The neutral tones are beautiful, it has wonderful pigment and they're really easy to use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received a couple of these for free via Influenster. I absolutely love the matte colors and was surprised at how well they blended on my lids. I'm not much of a cream shadow girl, but I love these. I didn't care for the glittery shadow, though it did go on and blend just as well.

A little definitely goes a long way with these eye tints. I received 3 different shades from Influenster, one light shimmer, one neutral matte, and one dark brown matte which all have amazing pigmentation. Super blendable with a synthetic brush and can also be easily applied with fingers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received three Giorgio Armani EYE TINT colors to test and I love them!  i do a complete look  with these long-lasting, tinted formula , i don't even need to use shadows,  you can create a perfect look .

I received 3 eye tints to try free from Influenster and was surprisingly satisfied on how easily they blended. Thry blended easily with either my finger or brush. They stayed on all day. I only gave them 4 stars only because the color Gold Ashes left glitter all over my cheeks after a couple hours. It still looked pretty but i didnt enjoy glitter on my face. Definitely want to try more of the matte shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received 3 eye tints to try and review. I usually don't really use cream products for my eyes since I'm afraid of creasing due to my oily lids. To my surprise, these were longwearing and did not crease at all. The liquid to powder formula was really innovative and highly pigmented. I applied the base color with my fingers and found using a brush was easiest to blend the outer V color. I would definitely want to try some other shades. This was an easy to apply neutral smokey eye. The one shade I didn't care for was the shimmer shade in gold ashes. It was a bit too glittery for my taste.

I received three colors to test and I love them! I usually use only one as a base color on my lids and they're super easy to apply. I don't find they settle into the crease like other cream shadows, these truly turn to powder but still blend beautifully!

I received 3 Eye Tint and Mask Giorgi Armani to test. I confess that at first I was not too excited to test because I think shadow cream are not easy to blend, but to my surprise, it was so easy and was so beautiful! colors give discreet but really beautiful and one of them has a lovely glow. the mask left my very voluminous lashes! first time I did not feel the need to put false eyelashes so perfect! for those who need a quick and super beautiful makeup, they are products that I really recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I truly love this formula. I have oily skin, so eye shadows normally gather in the crease of my eye if I don't use a primer. This one does not, and the colors are all so beautiful. LOVE. Full disclosure: Influenster sent me this product for free to test and review.

If you are going to get any of these, go with the Rose Ashes 11 color. Biggest thing to remember is to blend quickly! Once it dries it does not budge, which can make it a struggle to blend once its dried. Can't say I'm the biggest fan of these for that reason alone. However, the Rose Ashes color makes for an amazing highlight base! It is so beautiful and is a total must have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: When it comes to cream shadows I've never tried them before. But the moment I applied these and simply blended them with my fingers I knew it was on haha These are so easy to work with they blend easily and give you enough time to blend and work with them without setting too quickly.  I used 3 shades 12 golden ashes, 21 fur smoke, 24 nude smoke and these three shades complement each other so well. I have worked with them with my fingers only with brushes and both times they looked amazing.  They last all day and don't budge nor do they crease. Which I'm so happy about!  The formula is really lightweight and they build easily as well!  I have attached my yt video so you can see the, in action as well. I am loving them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I'm not a big fan of smoky eye, mainly because I can never successfully recreate it on myself like most women do. I was skeptical when I first received these items, because I was almost positive they wouldn't work for me. HOWEVER, I was so happy that I proved myself wrong! The eye tints definitely work, stay on long, and are easy to apply unlike natural powder. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I normally find liquid eyeshadow hard to work with. But not these. They blend so easily and set for a long wear finish. The formula is light weight and buildable but delivers awesome color pay off. Dries down to a powder and lasts all day long. Exactly the kind of beautiful, sophisticated look and feel you expect from a high end brand. Get it. It's worth it.

reviews.review_title: Throw in your bag and go!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: These eye tints look like a gloss and are super easy to carry around in your purse. Can definitely use day to night. I'm wearing: Browbone - #12 Lid - #24 Outer corners/lower lid - #21 You have to blend pretty quickly at the first application but the color builds really well and is easy to smudge together with other tints.
I'm in love with these eye tints! I received them for free testing purposes from Influenster and I used them to create a smoky eye. I love dark eyes! They worked great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: All I can say is OMG! I received these products to try and review and I was so impressed. The eye tints were long lasting and so smooth when applied. I was apprehensive at first when seeing they are a liquid, but they product wound up applying just like a traditional eye shadow. I also love the soft shimmer !

reviews.review_title: Soft color that you can layer for more depth
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've never used a liquidy eyeshadow before and I wasn't sure how I would like it.  A little surprised that I like them, because there was a little bit of a learning curve in learning how to use them.  So the secret is to use a small brush (I like a stiff concealer brush) to blend it all in.  The colors blend beautifully and are surprisingly soft and natural looking.  To make the colors bolder and to add drama, simply layer the colors.  The more you layer, the more of a smoky eye you can create.  Once you get the hang of it, usually by the first application or two (thankfully it's a short learning curve) then you'll appreciate how moisturizing it makes your eyes feel  The colors are true (but softer than you'd think) and they last for quite sometime.  And they tend to stay put which is especially great if you have fine lines.

This is a unique way to apply shadow. Personally, it may take a bit of practice, because you have to be ready to blend quickly since it dries fast. But the colors are pretty and pigmented, and there are a lot of beautiful options for fall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This eye tint is so pigmented and glittery (in a good way!) It's perfect for an inner corner hightlight as well as an all-over lid color if you're feeling like a party! It's super blendable and will last forever!

reviews.review_title: Crazy Pigmentation and Easy to Use!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I really love these eye tints! It's my first time trying Armani beauty and I'm glad that the product stands up to the name. I used these without brushes and found that they were super easy to make even an create a quick smokey eye. The shimmer that i have (12) is the absolute perfect consistency to draw attention to the corner of your eye or to make your eye pop with a dab in the center of your eyelid. It's very shimmery which makes it so eye popping! The mattes are also amazing. They truly are matte and blend like a dream. I was afraid I might have trouble but they were pretty easy, the darker shades might require more care but they are able to be used with ease! You really only need to use a dab of product because of how pigmented these are. I have come to love the applicator since it allows you to add as much product as you need unlike squeeze tubes of similar brands. Definitely recommend!! These will last quite a while due to the amount you need per use!

I'm not usually a fan of cream eye shadows but I loved these! They blend out really well while still being pigmented. I used the lighter sparkly one in the inner corners and the brown color all over my lid. I was pleasantly surprised with how long they lasted on my eyes without creasing. I would definitely recommend these, especially because they're so easy to use. I received these products complimentary for testing purposes.
Yesss! I love how long lasting and great this formula is! Blends so well! Also the pigmentation is so good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I'm not a huge fan of creamy eyeshadows but these are seriously amazing, I love how they blend well and I can use three different shades at the same time without them looking like a ugly mess.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I loved this product! The colors are so vibrant and last all day. I was surprised at how fast this product dried. I thought it would feel sticky, but it dried so fast and did not crease. I definitely recommend! I used this product to create a nude, smokey eye.  *Sponsored, but all opinions are my own*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m actually not a fan of cream shadows as they tend to crease towards the middle/end of the day. I was interested to try this product, and after receiving it as a sample Iu2019m sold. Not only is this the smoothest, creamiest formula ever, it stayed on ALL DAY, even in the heat of Texas! Would buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received three colors of this eye tint along wit the Eccentrico mascara complimentary to try. I love these eye tints and was surprised at how nicely they smooth onto your lid. They are much easier to use if you use your fingers, when I used a brush I didn't get the same smooth effect.I gave this a 4 because although it can be a positive that they dry so fast, sometimes I was too slow and it dried on my eyes too quickly.  What I do like is that they are all beautiful shades and stayed on all day. Even the dark brown one looked beautiful on my olive skin - it's not nearly as dark on as it is in the bottle.

reviews.review_title: Takes A Few Tries To Get The Hang Of
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: When I first put this product on I had no idea what to expect. The applicator and formula consistency looks like a lip gloss. I swiped across my lid and crease best I could and I'll admit it is a little difficult to get the product across the entire lid with the applicator. So I took my finger to blend, but it was too late. You have to blend within SECONDS of applying or else the product dries. So I had a pretty distinct line between the two colors I put on. Since that first experience, I stuck with the product and now know the best way to apply. Apply, blend, apply, blend, before it dries. The color is beautiful and seriously doesn't budge which is great for all day wear. The gold ashes color is my favorite for highlighting under the brow bone. Overall really like this product, just have to know what you are doing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I knew going into this review that they were going to be held up to a very high standard due to the price, and I have to let you know that they really live up to the hype. These are unlike any other cream eyeshadow that I've used because they're easy to blend out and apply, and they truly last all day. I was the most surprised with the way these go from cream and set to a powder formula. The formula allows the shades to blend in seamlessly onto one another and it allows the product to adhere so much better on the eyelids. You also get much more playtime to blend out the eyeshadows than with other cream eyeshadows, so you won't get any harsh lines. Plus if you end up getting a dark shade like 21, then you have a ridiculously simple smokey eye with absolutely no blending brushes needed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: long lasting creamy smokey eye in just minutes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I really love the shade #12 because it's sparkly, but not too glitter/disco ball. It gets the sparkle just right. I love it all over the lid and in the center of the lid. But, I especially love using it as an inner corner highlight because it really makes your eyes pop.   These do dry down quickly so you have to move fast. I recommend working on one eye at a time because once they dry down you will NOT be able to blend them. I didn't find them to crease on my eyes with and without primer because they're that budge proof!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was a bit unsure of this eye tint when I first got it...after all, it looks a LOT like lipgloss. However, I am a huge fan and now want more colors. I really enjoy that you can build this color up as much as you would like, and it so blendable! I received this product complimentary through influenster, but my opinions are my own! This is a great product to add to your beauty arsenal!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Loving my eye tints!  Perfect to wear neutrals and nudes in the day to creating a smokey eye for more drama. Easy to apply, long lasting, not dry and crumbly.  LOVE it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was very excited to play with these eye tints when they arrived in the mail. The three tints I've been using are (fur smoke, gold ashes and nude smoke) All three are very good pigments for makeup beginners/ people who are looking for quick and finger friendly eye products, They are easy to blend, I really enjoy mixing them with powder eyeshadows just to give them that extra blend on the crease, They last all day and wont budge which is great for any person who is a fan of long lasting makeup. I still prime my eyes before applying these I haven;t attempted to use them without a primer as of yet. On the go these tints work amazingly well and can be a basic staple to any makeup look. They are creamy and highly pigmented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Totally amazed because I have never used liquid eye tints before. Very creamy and dries nicely. I have 3 neutral shades and they blend well!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have never used a cream eye tint like this before but so far I'm loving it! They dry quickly and I only noticed minor creasing after a whole day of wear. I really like how easily they blend. I was worried 'Fur Smoke' would be too dark for me but after blending it works well for a brown smokey eye.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love the new neutral shades. They're perfect for every day use and so easy and quick to apply. I use the shade in Fur Smoke to create the quickest smoky brown look, just apply all over the lid and blend with a brush and you're good to go.

I love the Armani eye tints! Gold ashes is such a beautiful shadow topper or even used as a base for glitter! I even used it over my lipstick and it looked bomb! The darker shades are great for smudging out your bottom lash line or just as an all over eye color! They all work well as a shadow base to intensify your shadow or pigment! Recommend highly!

I absolutely love these Giorgio Armani eye tints, they dry within seconds, and the appliance is so easy. It is just like an eyeshow but way better. Formula is amazing and it blends just perfectly. I received this product as testing purposes.

I was hesitant at first to try these eye tints because of the liquid formula, thinking they probably wouldn't work well on my oily lids, but I was pleasantly wrong. Not only did these tints not crease or smudge, they were incredibly easy to work with and were very long wearing! I love that they're easily blend-able and build-able --- you can use your fingers or brushes to blend them out and they don't require much effort to get a beautiful finish. I'm obsessed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've never used a cream eyeshadow because they're quite intimidating. I received this product for free, so it was a perfect incentive to try. I was surprised by how easy it is to blend out the formula on my lids, and to partner with other shades across my eye. I used all natural shades and could create a full look with the 3 nude colors. It really lasts all night -- the few times that I've worn this -- and I'm glad to have this as a refresh in my makeup routine. Something we all need at some point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product is so diverse! It's perfect for when you want a simple eye look or even a dramatic smokey look. I love the formula because it's so creamy and easy to blend out!

I really love these products!! I am not good at makeup... Sadly. These tints made it easy for me to create a simple neutral smokey eye. I used the matte nude shade first, then the darker matte color and it looked great! I used a regular brush to blend. I personally don't like a shimmery/ glitter look so i won't be using those, but some people would love them!!  I would highly recommend these! Thanks influencer for letting me try these!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love these eye tints. I usually apply this like a base for a smokey eye. It creates a wonderful effect and my eyeshadow lasts longer. When I'm in a hurry, I simply apply this all over my lid, apply mascara and I'm good to go. Geat buy!

I obscurely love this product! It's so pigmented and long lasting . It applies like a cream but dries dry so you don't have to worry about it comming off. It lasted all day for me. It also can be used to a highlighter too! Ita worth the money a little goes a long way and can be used multiple ways .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: These are beautiful on the eyes. They are lightweight, they don't crease and they last. The neutral shades are gorgeous and easy to use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have tried three of Armani's eye tints (taupe smoke, nude smoke & gold ashes). I have had issues before using other brands eye tints, with creasing, but I was thrilled when after wearing all three tints on my eyes all day, they NEVER creased! They glide on really well & I use my makeup brush to smooth it over my eyes. It also blends beautifully too & I can add several layers for a more dramatic effect. I will definitely recommend these to all my friends!

I don't even normally wear eye shadow AT ALL, but this product made doing my eye makeup so much easier! The applications was flawless and very lightweight! The pigment wasn't overpowering which was a major plus!
This stuff is so longwearing and easy to use! You do have to blend quicky because once it dries, it does not move. I even use the gold one as a highlighter and it looks absolutely stunning!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely obsessed with these eye tints! They go on so smooth and have serious lasting power. No creasing and no smudging either. Loving the color options as well. It is so easy to create a chic smoky eye with these tints. I will definitely be buying more colors soon.
I received this product for review from influenster. I love this product! Easy to apply. Goes on creamy. The sparkle is gorgeous!!!!
Great colors and it's perfect for a base. The colors could be more vibrant but it works well for smokey eye looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample to test and I could not be more pleased with this product! It is so easy to apply and blend and honestly STAYS PUT throughout the day. I do a quick swipe of the Gold Ashes in the morning for my day look and it provides a perfect base to add shadow in the evening for a night look. I much prefer the metallic finishes versus the matte--however, I could see how the metallic could settle in creases of mature skin and not have the same clean look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: These eye tints are extremely pigmented and last all day. They are crease resistant which I love! They blend easily but you need to work fast because it dries quickly. I love the shimmer one as it adds a perfect highlight to any eye makeup look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Can I say that I absolutely am in love with these eye tints?! I honestly do not apply much eye makeup other than eyeliner and mascara because I have never been very good at blending regular eye shadow but ever since I tried these, they have been my go-to. They are very easy to use, very pigmented, and blends well but you must begin immediately blending before it dries up. I get absolutely no creases at the end of the day and it stays on well! I would definitely recommend this product.  I received this product in exchange for my honest review and opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: m completely in love with this color. I have been wearing it for 5 days in a row getting so many compliments about my eyeshadow. It blends well and you can apply several coats to get the desired effect. It last all day, it even hurts to take off my makeup at the end of the day because it looks so good. Another thing I love is that they turn into creme on your eye and blend with the other shadows perfectly. It literally takes me 5 minutes or less to create a beautiful eye look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This actually blended really well and lasted the entire day. I love how the eye tint was true to color (and sparkle).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love the color of this eye tint and how it has a nice little shimmer to it! It applies on so easily and is nice and creamy and stays for hours. It's a good little alternative from the traditional eyeshadows.

reviews.review_title: Great for everyday - can also be glammed up
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received Gold Ashes, Nude Smoke, and Fur Smoke as samples to try. I'm no makeup artist by any means, so at first I wasn't quite sure how a liquid eye tint would work out, but I was so pleasantly surprised! I dabbed Nude Smoke onto my eyelids and blended it out with my ring finger. The color blended seamlessly and was the perfect matte base color for my eyelid. I dabbed Fur Smoke onto the outer edges of my lids and the color blended really well into the Nude Smoke base. These two colors together are perfect for an everyday look. To glam up the eyes for evening, I used Gold Ashes in the inner corners and on the center of the lid for a pop of shimmer. The colors buildable and easy to layer. I love how low-maintenance and fast it is to use these Eye Tints!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: omg products armani are spectacular, I tried the tint eyes and mask Eccentric eyelashes and could create a very elegant look in a matter of minutes, it is very easy to use, this format shadows eyebrow is spectacularly beautiful , it is very easy to blur , there is no blotches in the eye and link them can , I think an excellent choice to have a smoky eyes and to do so quickly , OMG everything we always wanted , the shadows do not need any kind of first , they are well pigmented , if you want to complete your look so fabulous , the mask Eccentric tabs is definitely what you need , leave the lashes with a lot of volume dramatically, not need false never lashes, separates and thickens , is not that wonderful? I loved!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Easy to use. No need brush. Only the fingers. It has long lasting and does not accumulate in the eyelid and does not transfer. Perfect. Best I've ever used!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: It was my first time using liquid eyeshadows so I was pretty nervous using them. I got Gold Ashes, Nude Smoke, and Fur Smoke--and used them together to create a simple eye makeup for date night with my hubby. To my surprise, the products were pretty simple to use. They're easy to blend so I was able to correct mistakes I made. I also love that they can last for a long time. Applied the products at around 1pm and they were still there when I came home at 10pm. My only comment is Gold Ashes has too much glitter. But other than that, I totally loved the Eye Tints!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: These eye tints are awesome because they stay on without a primer. The color selection is great because there are neutrals and darker shades as well.

So I'm not a huge fan of cream or liquid shadows unless I'm using them as a base for powder eye shadows. But after trying the Armani Eye Tint changed my mind big time. These shadows are creamy but turn to a powder so it makes blending out the shadows super easy without looking patchy. The colors lasted me all day and did not budge till I removed it with a makeup wipe. Im very much impressed with this product.

I loved these eye tints! I received 3 eye tints complimentary for testing purposes, and I actually really loved them. I have never used a liquid eye shadow before, but it was actually so easy to use. Love #12 the best out of all of them!

I received three colors from influenster to test for free and am so glad I was introduced! The shade Nude Smoke is the perfect base color - it's nearly the same shade as my eyelids. Gold Ashes is a glittery shade but can be impactful and subtle on the inner third corner layered over Nude Smoke. My eyes just light up! The shimmer has a wet look that stays put throughout the day. I used Fur Smoke in the outer third and as a liner - makes blue eyes intensely pop! They layer so well together and you can also layer powder formulas without any pilling. Highly recommend the matte shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: We received these to review and upon opening them we were super excited to try them. We LOVE the Jordana liquid shadows and those are only $5 so we thought these would be even better. The shimmer one isn't shimmery at all, it's pure glitter. We tried to use it in the center of the lid to add dimension and glitter just ended up getting everywhere. BUT the matte shades are actually really great! They are nice neutral shades that are buildable. We wouldn't say these are worth the price tag though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love these shadows, especially the matte colors! The shimmers are somewhat glittery which would make them great for special occasions. The colors are easy to blend and layer, and you could create a variety of looks with them. Overall I would highly recommend them!

I have three shades, two mattes and one shimmer, and the mattes are my favorite! I love using Nude Smoke all over my lid with Fur Smoke blended in the crease for an easy everyday work look. I also have Gold Ashes, but it is a bit too glittery for my taste. I like shimmer, but this color definitely has sparkle. I may break it out over the holidays, though! I would say that these colors have sheer color payoff which I like because it makes them easy to layer and blend. I use them with brushes and love how they look. All in all, lovely colors and easy to use!

LOVE. I received these as testing purposes from influenster and I have to say I was a little skeptical at first. I don't usually use liquid eyeshadow so I wasn't sure how I was gonna like them. After receiving gold ashes, nude smoke, and fur smoke, I am completely in love! They are a little on the pricier side but completely worth it in my opinion. They apply so easily the wand is super easy to use and I usually pat the lid color with my finger to blend it a little. For the crease color I usually use fur smoke and I just use the wand and then take a fluffy blending brush and blend it all out. These eye tints blend together seamlessly and dry completely matte without feeling heavy at all on the lids. Gold ashes is my new favorite product hands down. It has the most beautiful shimmer and glow to it. I've used it on my lid, as a tear duct highlight, on my brow bone, or as highlight on my Cupid's bow. It's AMAZING. overall, completely satisfied and will be purchasing more colors when I get the chance! 10/10. Thanks Armani and influenster!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised about how easy to use these Armani Eye Tints are and how they last all day. You can easily blend with your fingers and even use the darker shade to subtly line your eyes. Once you blend, it does not budge. I also liked that it did not crease.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I purchased rose ashes and senso. Rose ashes barely shows up on my eyelids and Senso is not much better. I was hoping for some stronger pigments since the colors are so beautiful, but I need something fast and easy and this will take way too much time.

Giorgio Armani Eye Tint Fluid Eye Color Film are so amazing. They come in a lip gloss like container. They are easy to apply and easy to blend (with either finger or brush). I used them with out any primer and they didn't crease or rub off. I absolutely loved them.

reviews.review_title: Shocked by how good these are
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been using these eye tints without primer and they work like a dream. So simple to use and they blend together flawlessly. I love using the applicator to create a sumdgy lower lash line in a flash. I can't wait to try more colors.  I received these products for free from Influenster.com and Giorgio Armani.

reviews.review_title: Fur Smoke/ Gold Ashes / Nude Smoke
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received these eye tints for testing purposes but I absolutely fell in love with them. I will definitely go back and purchase other colors. The wand is perfect for application and the color stays very well. I do suggest blending out the colors as they are highly pigmented.They are the perfect shade of browns to keep the look very natural. I recommend this product to EVERYONE. I really did find my new favorite eye products !!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've always had a hard time with eyeshadows because they don't always blend nicely. However, I am OBSESSED with the way the EYE TINTS go on. They are super pigmented, and easy to blend--the wand allows easy, comfortable application and then I normally take a fluffy eyeshadow brush and blend the darker eye tint in the crease after wand-ing it on. I use the lighter color up right under the brow, blend with my finger and the natural base all over the lid. I finish the look off with the ECCENTRICO mascara which makes my lashes look like they're HUGEEEEE! Looks like these are a little pricey but SOOOO WORTH IT if you want a beautiful eye look. I would definitely invest in a whole bunch more and get rid of the powder eye shadows. If you had to get just one, get NUDE SMOKE because its the PERFECT BASE to brighten your eye. I have olive skin tone, brown eyes and dark brown hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've enjoyed using these eye tints.  I found that using my fingers to blend out is the best way for me to use it.  It's super long lasting, love the color selection, perfect for everyday use! A must try!

So I got these bad boys as a testing sample from influencer and before, had never heard of them or such a thing. My first time trying them out and it amazes me the long wear that they have. They say up to 16 hours but I don't really wear my makeup that long but for 8 hour work days they stayed in place! Didn't crease and didn't smudge! Theu are pigmented but not super pigmented and they apply like butter they are so creamy. They are perfect for girls who are always on the go and want one product to just apply and smoke out for a quick eye look! Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: These eye tints are great for everyday looks or when you want to apply some shadow quickly with your finger. I found that my eye shadow brush didn't blend it out too well, maybe I waited too long and it dried a little on my lid, but with my finger it blended out real nice. The glitter shades are great for layering on top of the mattes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received three of these colors as a sample and in short, I am obsessed. I got the colors Taupe Smoke, Nude Smoke, and Gold Ashes. All three were beautiful and I used all three in my eye look with only my bronzer to help blend. The color Taupe Smoke made a beautiful transition color. The only downside (which is why I gave four stars) is how fast it dries. It dries quickly so it is hard to blend more than one color and layer them without getting a little patchy. But it is completely doable and these things LAST all day and night so it is completely worth it. The color Gold Ashes is perfection and I am obsessed with using it as my inner corner highlight because it does not budge or as a topper for a metallic lid color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love how smooth the product glides on. It blends easy and it lasts all day without the use of a primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I really liked the concept of these eyeshadows. Although the payoff was very nice, I did seem to have trouble blending these as nicely as regular powder eyeshadows. The packaging is great, but they do look just like lip glosses! Overall, I would recommend these as great liquid eye tints, but I think I will stick to my regular palettes for now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received three of these from Influenster for review purpose. I received Fur Smoke, Nude Smoke and Gold Ashes (swatches below). I am impressed with the quality of the eye tints, the packaging and longevity. They are like a liquid lipstick but for your eyes! They are mousse liquids that transform into a solid and stay put. The only reason I'm not giving these products 5 stars is because it seems like the only way to apply these are with your fingers, and I'm used to using my Morphe Brushes for eyeshadow application. Blending with your finger is not that easy.

I received 2 of these eye tints & I gotta say they're really great, they build up pretty easy. Oh and this was my first time tryin eye tints. I absolutely love the color gold ashes, it's just the perfect shimmer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love these eye tints for a very soft a subtle smokey eye. I have three of them, and love how creamy and blendable these are. for me the deepest brown shade I received blends out a little too much but after playing more I realized that they build up easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this because I love using light and shimmering eye tints as an under brow highlighter. This however is VERY shimmery/sparkly. Just a tad too much. But its an awesome formula going from liquid to solid-ish to blend.

I have never been a fan of liquid eyeshadow or blush or anything of that nature but these are great! I received three of these in the light brown, dark brown and sparkly color. I don't wear much eyeshadow or makeup period and this is great for having a natural easy look. I blended to with my fingers and it went on very east and stayed on most of the day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received a few of the new Giorgio Eye Tints from Influenster not too long ago and I already love them! The shimmery eye tint is my absolute FAV. It's great for your eye crease and brow bone! It's the perfect shimmer for Fall! I'd highly recommend blending with your finger or a really good eyeshadow brush as soon as you apply because they do dry up pretty quickly! The other two shades I received (fur smoke and nude smoke) have a matte finish rather than a shimmer finish. The nude smoke is great for a base eyeshadow and oh my gosh the fur smoke is just GORGE. You can create a natural look with these shades or a smokey eye! I love all 3!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product is absolutely amazing! I have Gold Ashes and 2 other eye tints but Gold Ashes is by far my favorite! I did a cut crease with these eye tints and put Gold Ashes on my lower eyelid - My favorite makeup look so far! It's so pigmented, so a little goes a long way. Love, love, love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am not one to usually wear eyeshadow, much less wear eye shadow during the regular week day, however, Giorgio Armani Eye Tint is perfect for a quick daytime pick-me-up. I am obsessed with the tan and highlighter colors, they go on light and aren't overpowering. They look so simple, as if you are hardly wearing anything on the eye, which is perfect for me. The colors are extremely complimentary together and go on so easy and smooth. I would highly recommend for an easy daytime look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This eye shadow has very good pigmentation and is very long lasting. I used this product for the first time today and was very impressed at how great the color look and how long it stayed on. I tried one eye lid with eye primer and one eye lid without lid primer and found that the lid with primer made the color of the eyeshadow pop even more and make it last even longer. Would defiantly recommend this product.

I have never used a product like this before. Eyeshadows for me have always been in a palette. Influenster sent me 3 of these tints and I have fallen in love with them. This is my first time using this brand and I am so impressed. The tints are so pigmented and perfect for fall. So recommend these!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I'm in love with these eye tint!!! They are very pigmented and easy to blend! I love it when you apply it and once it dries down, it transforms into a powder product. It remains blendable once it dries down for about a min. I use my finger to apply. I will be buying more shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am in love with these Armani eye tints. I bought one a few months ago in Rose Ashes, and it gives you a beautiful, natural rosy sheen with some shimmer. It's not over the top at all, it's very tasteful, classy, and feminine. The formula is so nice, too, the liquid feels nice and soft going on the lids, the doe foot applicator makes getting it on mess-free a breeze. I recently received 3 more shades through influenster, and I couldn't be more thrilled. I received Nude Smoke, Fur Smoke & Gold Ashes. The formula of these is consistent with the first one I bought -AMAZING. Nude smoke is very light, and I feel would work well as an eyeshadow base/primer, but on its own gives a natural, bright look to the eyes and cancels out any veins. Fur Smoke is great to blend in the outer corners to add some depth on top of Nude Smoke. Gold Ashes adds a beautiful shimmer/glitter to the lid, but nothing over the top. I'm obsessed. That's all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I didn't think I would like the stick idea of eye shadow, but it went on super smooth and was easily blotted and blended into just the right layer of color in the crease to the point of my eye. Would love to try more colors!

I must say I am in love with this eye tint from Giorgio Armani. I received 3 eyetiints and a mascara for review purposes from influencer.  The shades i received was 12 gold ashes, 21 fur smoke and 24 nude smoke and i must say I AM INLOVE. .  I use these colors for more ways than one not only did I use it for a shadow base but I also used the nude smoke as a eyeliner and a pop of highlight on my lips. Once applied the product does not move or fade away. It doesn't feel sticky on the lids and last for a good amount of time. They are a little pricey but they are worth the money because a little goes a long way. Remember when applying this use a light hand and just add more if needed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love the Giorgio Armani Eye Tints for easy, one step eye looks. I especially love using the darker shades to layer on top the lighter shades and create a simple, one-step smokey eye look. These last all day and don't crease - every girl needs these in her makeup bag!

reviews.review_title: Fur Smoke is a life saver
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Fur Smoke is my new fave makeup product. Eye shadow can be suck a hassle when you're trying to make a complete look with a palate, especially with blending and using primer blah blah blah but THIS product is really one and done if you want to be. I started out by patting it on with my finger but then used a brush to darken the crease AND wing it out and I had a complete look with one color! Once it's on it's on, I mean it basically waterproof. I didn't use a primer and it has yet to crease after 12 hours. Bonus: looks great smoked under your waterline! Another day I used this and then put a deep plum dry eye shadow over and it helped that stay in place. If you have the money to splurge I really think this is worth it. The packaging and quality is truly high end and durable and it will probably last at least an entire year. Also like I said I would try applying with a brush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this product. It's so shimmery, yet it still looks natural on my lids. I wear it alone on the lid and blend it up into my crease. It's extremely pigmented and glimmers in the light. It doesn't feel heavy on my lids either. Application is easy with the application stick. I would highly recommend this product if you're going for a glowy natural look but want a little pop. Also, if you need color on your lids but don't have time to add various amounts of color, I would use this. This color turns heads.

reviews.review_title: Stays all day! Easy to blend
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Blends beautifully for even color. You will have to blend for longer then usual or until the product is dry. Color has lasted all day! Doesn't dry out eyelids. It is expensive but it will also last a very long time because very little is needed.

I received the Fur smoke, nude smoke and gold ashes complimentary for testing purposes. All opinions are my own. I love love love this set. They're very but blend able but you have to blend it ASAP before it dries. The gold ashes looks awesome on the corners of my eyes and brow bone. This product is long lasting. I applied a primer before using and then blended it in with my pinky finger.

reviews.review_title: I AM IN LOVE WITH THESE
reviews.review_text: I received three shades from the Giorgio Armani eye tint collection as free samples to try by the generosity of Influencer! And I must say it has to be the best gift I have ever received. The colors are so beautifully pigmented, and they blend so incredibly well. They are perfect for creating such dynamic looks, by adding depth and glam to your eyes. I'm speechless, these have to be my favorite liquid eye shadows. If you are on the fence, go for it! You won't regret it!!

I received Fur Smoke, Nude Smoke, and Golden Ashes as part of an Influenster VoxBox. I really like how versatile these products are! You can blend them out for a smokey tint with a fluffy brush or you can concentrate them for a deeper wash of color. The matte shades can probably be used for lining and can be smoked out with a brush. These dry quickly and are hard to blend out once they set. This being said, they are super long-lasting! I have oily eyelids and these were still in tact the morning after a night out. Golden Ashes is a much more sheer color that goes on beautifully both on top of the darker matte colors or as a highlight.

The eye tints are really unlike any liquid type eye product. Most liquid shadows tend to be a mess, transfer onto lid or eyelashes. These dry down nice, but not too quick so you actually have time to work with them. Even the shimmery shades are nice and feel just as smooth as the matte shades. A good product, easy application, a lot in the tube.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Nude Smoke & Fur Smoke are both matte finishes, while Gold Ashes is a beautiful, cool-gold shimmer shade. The 2 mattes seem to set quite quickly, so work fast with spreading out & blending them in. I applied trying with a brush & my fingers, either or work really well (but if you want a more polished look, I'd recommend using a brush).  Same goes for Gold Ashes, though this one doesn't really seem to set, and if it does not nearly as quickly as the mattes do. The great thing about this shimmer shade though is that it stays put, in terms of you won't be seeing glitter all over your eye or the rest of the face by days end!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received 3 of these (2 mattes, 1 shimmer) for review purposes. While they are all pretty, I don't think the shimmer shades are worth the hefty price tag. They are so sheer. I prefer the matte shades as used for a long wearing base to powder shadows.

I received this in my influenster voxbox and I cannot even begin to tell you how BEAUTIFUL these shades are. The color pay off is strong and the consistency is so buttery and soft. I LOVE to apply it all over the lid and use the darker shade in the crease. Really creates the perfect natural look. Obsessed with this product!!!!

I recieved these products complimentary of influenster for reviewing purposes. These tints were everything I expected and more. Shade 24 was a nice nude color for a great base. Shade 21 was a great crease color. And shade 12 was perfect for a brow bone or inner corner highlight. You could probably even use it for a cheek bone highlight. These products are so pigmented and they do not budge on the eye. I have a lot of problems with eyeliner sliding into my crease as they are a little oily but these stay almost all day and don't crease or smudge! They blend very well. Not much effort at all to it. They literally feel like a liquid lipstick for your eyes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I revived this in shades 12, 21, & 24 And am totally shocked and in love! They blend so much better than cream shadows I've used in the past and they last forever! They don't crease or move once the dry and the pigment is insane. The only shade I was a little disappointed in was gold ashes. It was more of a glitter topper than anything but still very pretty. All in all I love them and they're super easy to travel with!

I really liked the concept of these eyeshadows. Although the payoff was very nice, I did seem to have trouble blending these as nicely as regular powder eyeshadows. The packaging is great, but they do look just like lip glosses! Overall, I would recommend these as great liquid eye tints, but I think I will stick to my regular palettes for now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received shades 12, 21, 24, and eccentrico as samples, and they were beyond anything I expected. The shade 24 is the exact natural color of my eyelid, which I love. Even makeup artists, like Charlotte Tilbury, say that you should keep your natural eyelid color and not cover it up with foundation or concealer. This smokey color perfectly puts that shade back in, and it feels like permanent lipstick but for your eyes. The color 21 is an excellent compliment to use in the crease as a daytime smokey eye. The shimmery 12, makes a super pretty highlighter on the browbone and can even by blended down a bit to the outer eye/cheekbone. The formula dries to feel invisible, but the color stayed on all morning and afternoon. I added a little more smoke for a nighttime look, but didn't need any extra shade 12, as it stayed on brilliantly. I highly recommend this for anyone looking for an everyday quick makeup look.

I got these eye tints in colours gold ashes, nude and fur smoke as a free product sample from Influenster, and I really love them. To be completely honest, I didn't think I was going to like these at all... The idea of a wet to dry eyeshadow just wasn't my cup of tea. I was definitely wrong. Now you do have to work fast with blending as soon as you put it on your lid or it'll dry and you'll have a mess - but other than that, ugh. The colours are gorgeous, smokey, glides on and blends like a cream. And that gold ashes though, holy moley. So pigmented and shimmery, it looks AMAZING on your inner corners and highlighted on your brow bone.

reviews.review_title: Glad I was able to try
reviews.review_text: Received my Influenster Vox Box and was so excited to get to try out the Armani Eye Tints.  Received the shades Nude Smoke (a beige matte) Fur Smoke (a dark brown matte) and Gold Ashes (a beige shimmer w/ reflects).  With it being one of my first times working with this type of formula (creamy and a bit moussey) it took a while to figure out the methods that worked best for me.  I found that the shimmer and beige matte worked best applying with doe foot applicator then spreading with your finger.  The beige would not budge when trying to blend with a brush.  Once on, gave a very nice coverage and worked great as an all over shade.  The brown went on smoothly and blended effortlessly.  My favorite shade out of all three.   I'm glad I was able to try these out.  Don't see myself using the beige, but the shimmer I will continue to use as a shadow topper and the brown as an outer corner/crease color.  Definitely more of a luxury item, but if you have the spare money ($39.00 each) and want to try something new check them out

I received shades 12, 21, and 24 as samples and was instantly in love!! Color is so rich, formula is velvety and it goes on smooth and so easy!  I love with the ease that it allows me to create my looks. I'm not a pro at doing my eye makeup but these eye tints sure make me feel and look like one! I definitely recommend them!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received shades 12, 21, and 24 as samples, and I didn't expect to like these as much as I do. Upon opening the product, the formula feels thin, and there isn't much resistance to remove excess product. I attempted to use the doe foot applicator but it felt messy and like I couldn't control the application. I used my own brushes to transfer and apply product. As I began applying, I fell in love with this eye tint! Color is rich, formula is velvety, yet lightweight and comfortable on the eye. I have hooded/oily lids and this stuff is GOOD. Totally crease proof and oil resistant.I will probably go ahead and order a darker shade for my lash line - that's how much I adore this product! What an unexpected surprise!

I absolutely love these products they are very easy to blend and I love how you can go for a soft day look or intensify them for a night look I would recommend these to everyone who is a little more experienced with blending quickly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Very nice color and goes on easily. You need to wear an eye lid primer or else it's off in a couple of hours though.

I got a sample of this in #12 and wore it today. Immediately, I bought the full size. I patted it over my entire lid and did a small swipe under my lower mash line. Because the color is neutral, it goes on sheer and shimmery, but I found that it wears all day (I wore mine to an NFL preseason game in the Midwestern humidity and it didn't budge). It almost gives a wet look that I absolutely love and gives an amplified touch to a mostly natural look. I am probably going to get more of the colors as well. Love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I just got this in the rebel eye's duo and LOVE! It is the tiniest little sample ever (fyi if your thinking of trying it) but really a little goes a long way. So despite being small it will definitely last long enough to get a feel for it. Also, the formula does not come out with the applicator wand. I too, had to remove the plug and use the doe foot as a sort of scoop and then use a brush to apply. But OOOOH GIRL once it is on- IT. IS. ON! Talk about a colour pop on your lid- yeeeesss!! I did have to knock it one star because I think the price is a bit out of range for a product does not come in a functional applicator. They should have put this into a squeeze tube and then I'd say 5 stars :-)
Aly Raisman uses this...enough said.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I got a very tiny sample of this in the rebel duo special, I don't know if this sample was sitting around or if this is truly the texture of this shadow, but nothing came out on the doe foot applicator, so I took out the stopper in the tube and got some out which was pasty, dry and unpleasant to apply. All it looks like is a pile of sparkles. Not good on my mature lids. Maybe the matte full size tubes are better. I may try one of the matte ones, if they too are pasty and dry, I will return. So far not looking promising. I am so surprised at Armani for the lack of quality.

I first got the rose ashes shade as a gift and fell in love with it.  The price is steep but in my opinion totally worth it. It is a beautiful rose gold with a hint of iridescence.  You can apply it alone in one layer for a very natural light makeup look.  Or layer on a few coats and/ or combine with other shadow.  I usually apply some to the back of my hand and then use a brush to apply.  You can also apply it under the bottom lash line and use a brush and smoke it out.  I have applied it to friends who in turn go out and buy their own. This will always be a part of my make up bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have this in the color Shadow and it's simply one of the best eye shadows I own. The formula is amazing-my lids always crease without a primer, but this doesn't need one and it dries quickly while still easy to blend. The shimmer shades just give your eyes a twinkle, it's hard to explain but I find myself using this so often. Only thing is they're crazy expensive, but it's hard to other eye colors like them.

Love this! Bought one to try and  right away had to get more. It goes on beautifully and doesn't crease on my lids. I have sensitive eyes and it works well for me. It also mixes well with powder shadows.
