I bought one and then immediately ordered 2 more.  I want to get them all.  They are amazing.  Very pigmented. They go on smooth and stay all day until you take it off. Beautiful colors.  They are pricey.  For not much more you can buy a whole palette of shadows.  They are so beautiful though. Gives a very glamorous look.  I really can't say enough about them.

I typically go for cream eye shadows in the summer months, powdered shadows tend to create a crease or I sweat them off. When I test shadows in store, I let it dry for a bit and see how easy it is to rub off. When I tested on the back of my hand in store, it seemed to stay put. I've worn this to a few weddings and to work, and noticed that when wearing all day, particularly when sweating, this does not stay put. If it hasn't rubbed off, there's a crease. It might be fine in the colder months, but it is not standing up to Chicago summers. I just expected more from it given the price.

reviews.review_title: great quality but a little hard to apply
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: high quality but hard to apply directly.  Put on hand then use sponge for best results.

I have almost all of the  colors- just bought the new taupe smoke as I have been looking for a true taupe eye shadow to brighten my grey eyes. this is a beautiful shade- much lighter in pigmentation then I expected- soft and light. very little shimmer- if any. I will try layering for more intensity. would recommend if you want a lighter soft summer eye.

I purchased this product in 6 & 7...the colours are absolutely stunning on their own, but they also look incredible when combined. They blend very well, sit nicely on the lid, and have the perfect amount of shimmer/pigment. They feel effortless on my lid throughout the day, and have perfect staying power. They blend well with powder eye shadows as well.

I use Gold Ashes as a base/primer for the rest of my daily eye look, and I love it! Stays all day and helps hold other powders in place. The shimmer looks intense in the tube, but sheers out to be a beautiful soft gleam... So pretty!!

reviews.review_title: No crease for my asian eyelids!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am Asian and yes every eye shadow I've tried eventually crease and disappears.  This is the first product I've used (without a primer) and stays on all. day.  The color is intense as well.   I got the lightest shade so I also use it as a highlighter (intense highlighting here).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this as a base eye product to offer color and shimmer. I wear it with the sephar 5 color palette (in gold) layered on top of it. They are NOT kidding about the amount of shimmer this eye tint has! You will likely need to clean up around your eyes with a q-tip and some face cream to catch any stray sparkle. However, the eye tint + eyeshadow power comb is unbeatable in terms of blending and crease resistance. The eye tint does decently on its own for crease resistance but becomes a 16+ hour workhorse with the powder on top. (Neither the powder nor eye tint did as well solo and I have very crease-prone eyes when it comes to eye makeup.) I usually layer the light golden tint with the dark brown. They don't blend into each other very well, so apply carefully!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love love love.  I own this in two colors 6 and 11 and ti's the best eye shadow cream I have used.  Easy to apply, color remains pure throughout the day.

reviews.review_title: lovely but not for oily skin
reviews.review_text: As beautiful as this looks once applied, and as easy as it is to use for a gentle wash of colour, it does not last at all on my oily eyelids. Trying it alone within a few hours I end up with shimmery particles under my eyes, and no colour left on my lids. An eyeshadow primer alone doesn't really improve the situation either. Using both an eyeshadow primer and a paint pot layered underneath it I can get it to last, but sadly it looks cakey and loses all its appeal. It's too beautiful to return, so I only use it when it's only for an hour or two.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought the color gold copper after hearing Tiffany from makeupbytiffanyd talk about this.  You really can wear this and nothing else and it looks natural and polished.  Really great for traveling.

I like the product, it is what I expected it to be, however I have sensitive skin and after few days of wearing it I noticed red bump on my eyelid, however I am not sure if it is coming from wearing the eyeshadow

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: These Armani eye tints are beautiful! They go on pretty dark and then you can blend them out. They are super smooth going on to. I got the brown shade and it is a dark milk chocolate color and it stays put all day! Great for day or night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I purchased this eye tint in minuet and it is one of the best makeup purchases I've ever tried. I like it so much that I even purchased a 2nd one (in case the color is ever discontinued!) what I love is that it is a beautiful Smokey eye that is prettier than boring grays or browns. The applicator is clumsy so I apply a dab of color on my eye lid and then quickly(before it dries) blend with a eye makeup brush. Try this product, your eyes will never look prettier!

I just got this in the 9 Copper and I love it! I use the wand and do a quick swipe over my lid then blend it a bit with my finger. It's so pretty on its own and so so quick to do. It will be perfect for summer and looks pretty & effortless. It lasts all day, but be sure to let it dry completely before touching it or adding other eye shadows.

Love this item since it stay all day without smudge. But you have to let the product dry before touching it and it will stay all day. I did not even use any eye primer. And the colors are lovely and no glitter .
I've heard so many times how amazing this product is. I totally agree with it. The gorgeous and fancy color with very smooth wearing. I definitely love it. Will buy more colors.

I purchased the Flannel shade and it has a very retro opal/iridescent tint to it, which I don't find it very flattering on my skin (medium light Caucasian). You seem to need to apply a lot to get any affect, and the applicator wand isn't very useful. I wouldn't recommend it at all for this price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: These shadows give an understated glamour to the eyes. I bought the shade Rose Ashes which is a peachy pink with fine gold shimmer, perfect for a my lids but better wash of color. However one can layer the color for more shimmer, intensity and coverage. I gather that the sparkle factor varies depending on the shade. I am not a fan of disco flash looks but have no complaints about this selection. Works well for us women of a certain age who still love makeup.

reviews.review_title: Good product but I need time with it:)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Read about the product, decided to purchase it. It is creamy but not really. It feels like it will cake but it doesnt. Stayed on the whole day without a problem. For me personally, this is an evening type eye shadow.

I was on the fence about trying these because of the price. But oh wow what beautiful colour, formula and application. I have flannel, which is a complex beige, pink and slight grey subtle iridescent shade. It is beautiful, flattering and not overly sparkly. It's like a soft matte-ish metallic, if you can imagine that. Swipe this on in 2 seconds flat, add some liner and mascara, poof you're done. Sophisticated. Looks expensive if you know what I mean. Now I need to collect all of them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love the color that this product produces, Rich and also a great base for others,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought Senso a year ago at the last sale and I still love it. Senso is a neutral color for me with a pinkish tint. I wear it when I'm in a rush but want a polished look. Use a primer, blend it and you're good.

I am all about cream shadows but not this one. I enjoy the simplicity of a ring-finger application. This guy went on smooth and blended well however 3 hours later I noticed creasing in my lids, and my under eye area was lightly dusted with sparkles from this shadow. I could have used a primer but I'm not a fan of the extra step; I already have a 4-step skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this because I love this type of eyeliner/shadow. I bought Minuit. When I tried it on, the wand was a little long and angled oddly in my hand so applying it was awkward. The color was great and I was able to layer for the intensity I wanted, no problem there. But what really bugs me about this is the color transfered to my upper eyelid crease area even after it sets and dries -from when I blink or open my eyes. I am so sad that I'm going to have to return this! Definitely not worth the price.

I returned this. It was strangely difficult to get an even coat so I can't comment on how it lasts. I wanted a chocolatey brown for fall. Perhaps if i chose a different color i would've liked it. I don't know. I ended up buying a cream eyeshadow by a different brand in a pot & I like that very much.

I had never had any products from GA. I purchased the rose ashes 11. I absolutely love this shade and it last all day until I remove all my makeup for the day. I liked it so much I have purchased the 8 flannel, 12 gold a he's and have ordered the copper one while the vib sale is going on. If you are on the fence about these you should try it. I know you won't regret it. I sure havent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Finally after years of searching for a long lasting eye color I have found one! I work outside in the heat and humidity and also have to be camera ready for my job. I picked this product up in Austin TX last week and it actually stayed on! I did not have to reapply after a long day nor did I have to touch up before the camera came on. The color stayed true all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: It's fabulous. Great pop of color. I get compliments every time I wear it. I bought Gold Ashes. Best of all, it's long lasting, at least 8 hours. Will buy again.

I bought this in the color flannel and the formula last at least eight hours a day. I wear it for work and it gives a beautiful subtle pop of color to enhance my eyes. I can't wait to try other colors in this collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I find this product somewhat difficult to use. When I have tried to make the color (6) more sheer, it gets streaky and blotchy so I can't make it even on both eyes. It goes on evenly if you want heavy saturation of the color. I can't seem to blend it. It is disappointing as a product and even more disappointing at this price. I won't buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: While I like the color and the wear I think the price tag is a bit too night for an eye color. I would not buy again due to that as there are plenty of other brands which offer the same benefits at a lower price.

reviews.review_title: The color is great, formula is not.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I got the Emaraude color and it is a beautiful green, but could probably be found in another line. I will be returning this because it creases within 30 minutes even with a primer underneath.

reviews.review_title: A poor product and waste of money
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow was not waterproof. It rubbed off within a few minutes. It was a waste of money and I decided to return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: The only negative about the product is the price. It goes on easy, and lasts. No creasing, and it can last all day. Great product.
I got the champagne color, looks really nice on, but was more sparkly than I anticipated. Blends nicely with other colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This totally creases. If they gave you a primer with it then they could claim for it to be creaseless. This product only looks good on for a few hours w/o a primer. Not worth the price IMO.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This was my first high end product purchase. I took a risk and bought the green shade, Emeraude. I had never used a color that bright before, and I am in love with the product. These shadows are highly pigmented, and I was pleasantly surprised by the doe food applicator. It really let me control the amount of color I could apply. I find a small crease brush is the best for application.

The eye tint color is lovely. I really like the transparency of color. You definitely need to wear primer for this to last. The only drawback is that I find the eye tint quite to glittery for my taste.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: i'm a big fan of armani's makeup line in general, but this might actually take the cake for my favorite product. it lasts so long and has a really beautiful shine (that also isn't overpowering/brash). perfect for use on its own or for layering. it's as much of a staple as chapstick or mascara at this point. would recommend without hesitation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have now purchased 2 different colors and I'm happy with both. The champagne-y color gives me a light shimmer and I have received compliments. The brown color comes out lighter on my skin compared to its appearance in the bottle, but I was hoping for that. It's somewhat buildable color. Needed an eye shadow I could swipe on and not have to worry about stretching the delicate skin around my eyelid due to blending.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Amazing cool jade color. Never seen a jade color can be compared to this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical about this product, as I have oily eyes and NO eyeshadow last on my lids. This product rarely creases and dries quick. The colors are super pigmented, but blend easily. Phenomenal for a quick look, and easy to dress up with additional colors. I tend to use one color, but have found that if you add more than one- it adds an additional level of dimension.

reviews.review_title: Pretty color, but not worth the cost
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have onxy and the color is beautiful and it goes on smoothly. However, it has no lasting power and without a primer it looks terrible by the afternoon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product is great! The pigmentation is fantastic. Dries quickly. Love it!

I bought Jade and Emeraude, I know $38.00 is a ridiculous amount to spend on eye shadow, the reason why I bought it was because of the reviews that I saw that said once this dried it didn't budge,which is pretty much true (except for me I have to wear an eye shadow base first, Nars eye shadow base to be exact) I love the colors and with the eye shadow base it does last a long time (so far 9 hours, which for me is pretty good I will test if for longer this weekend) without the eye shadow base it creased on me after about 2-3 hours. The only thing I don't like is that it is difficult to apply this precisely, I may use a fine brush the next time I apply it as I have been doting on the shadow with the brush it comes with and then spreading it out with my finger, also it does take about half a minute or almost a minute to really dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Oh golly gosh are these colours pretty. The pictures don't do it justice at all; I bought Rose Ashes, which is not exactly a rose gold that most people would expect. It comes off as more of a golden eyeshadow with a pretty pink duochrome shift. The effect is very subtle and absolutely gorgeous on the lids.  I see people complaining about the pigmentation on these eyeshadows, but I have no problems with it. The product advertises itself as an eye TINT, and it works exactly like that. They can be built up a little bit when you layer them, but are perfectly day/work appropriate with just one layer.  These eye tints are also quite cooling on the eye, which is nice for me in the mornings. The longevity of them on bare lids is better than most powder eyeshadows, but those with oily or hooded eyes would benefit from using a primer. They last longer with two layers than one, though be sure you are applying the layers thinly and letting them dry in between.  The price of them is definitely on the higher end, but I feel this would make for a great gift or as a treat to yourself if it's within your budget. Definitely check them out in stores if you can, though, swatches online do not even come close to how pretty they are in person :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Not this! Didn't apply nicely, color wasn't good either. I'll pass!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I feel that you can get the same effect from many cheaper cream shadows. Takes a long time to dry also.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this is number 9 - (after seeing a you tube review from Vivianna does makeup) - the colour gives a similar effect to Sidecar in the Naked palette. maybe a tad darker - but I love that it has no fall out - really easy to apply - I get up super early in the mornings so this is a great alternative to shadow. will purchase in more colours

reviews.review_title: Onyx - perfect for a night out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought the shade Onyx after reading rave reviews on Temptalia's blog. It's more sparkle-y than I typically would go for, but I really like it! I tend to stick to more basic, neutral colors on an everyday basis, but this is nice for a really dramatic eye for a night out. The formula is incredible - it dries down at just the right time, is easily blendable/buildable, and is very long-lasting. I want to try one of the lighter colors too - they all swatch beautifully!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: the eye shadow really is long lasting and does not crease. I like that I can control how deep the color goes on since it looks dark in he tube. My favorite colors are Shadow and Flannel

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: was just so so and i had high expectations...i ordered three of them and each were just blah... nothing special about it for that money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I purchased one of the lighter shades, and frankly, it was not worth the $40 price tag. It is quite beautiful, but it doesn't pack enough of a punch and isn't unique enough to justify the price. Also the packaging is literally nothing special, plastic and generic. Would pass on this. You can get an entire palette that is better for the price.

reviews.review_title: Nice product but could use improvement
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I tried this shadow in Flannel and it's a lovely color but very light. If you're going to try it, I recommend purchasing one of the darker colors, even if you have fair skin as I do. It is somewhat shimmery, which works well for me, and really stays put once applied. I also recommend smoothing the line where the shadow ends on the outside of the eyelid before it dries. If not, it can appear like a very stark and drastic line, which is not attractive. I would purchase again but would choose a darker color with more pigmentation.
The texture is smooth and easy to be blended. The colors are metallic but not pigmented as I expect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was so excited about this. I love the product but not the color. However, I could see someone with darker skin loving it. I am going to order a darker shade.
Thought I was too old for this shadow, but it glides on my 60+ eyelids and doesn't crease. Love the Onyx color for my brown eyes. Expensive, but worth it.

reviews.review_title: Green Iron is beautiful, but too glittery for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought Green Iron primarily to use as a liner, and also tried it as an eyeshadow. I wasn't expecting that the green is completely infused with gold glitter, which isn't flattering on 62-YO lids, so I had to return it. Otherwise, the cream formula is easy to work with and stays put after it dries. The color saturation was good, too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have never used this brand before but I thought I would try it out....love the color and the pigmentation is awesome...I'm looking forward to buying more colors

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This goes on smoothly--I used my finger after I swiped it on--and does not crease during a day of use. A really nice formula ... I might just need to buy it in another color because I like it that much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love everything about this product. I have it in Flannel. It's easy to apply--I dab some of the color on my lids with the doe foot applicator, then blend it out with my finger. When blending, it dries fairly quickly to a silky, powdery finish.  What really blew me away was how long this stayed on my eyes; I have very oily eyelids, and always have creasing by the end of a long day. I wore this for 12 hours while out at the bar and on the town, and experienced no creasing whatsoever. I absolutely always use eye products with a primer beneath them, so I have yet to test this product's longevity without primer, but suffice it to say that I am impressed. I will be purchasing more of this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have very fair skin and blue eyes and have been searching for a good light highlighter to use when I want a fresh, bright easy eye look. Finally I've found it! I ordered #12 and it is absolutely perfect. The color has just a little shimmer (tasteful) and is off-white so it doesn't give you the alien look like some other white/cream liners do. It brightens my eyes and compliments my complexion, easy to apply thinly or thickly and has great staying power. Absolutely worth the price. Will definitely be purchasing in other shades.

I was excited to purchase my first luxury brand product and decided on this eye tint in the shade Flannel. Dont get me wrong, the color is gorgeous, especially in the tube. On the eyelid, with or without primer, no matter what I use to apply it with, it tends to look a bit cheap and slightly streaky/patchy because of the shimmer. The applicator is excellent but the packaging overall leaves a lot to be desired for such an expensive item.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have tried many eye shadows in my 60 years and was at the point of giving up on finding the right color, coverage, etc. This is it! The best ever! Love it! Blends easily, smoothly, great coverage, beautiful colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the best eye shadow. It's creamy and doesn't crease. The colors are like nothing else you can buy. Just beautiful. You must check it out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: received this last night in Senso, which is basically brown --2nd day I'm using it--you have to use your fingers to apply properly --it's a little awkward for me to use--don't like the cold feel of the gel when it goes on--don't think this is worth the money--it seems to keep it's color over time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I purchased color Flannel and its very very pretty albeit a little too light for me as I am brunette. It also made my lids look crepey and they are not. So I tried over a darker purple shadow and I liked it better but now my lids are itchy. Oh well. have to return this one.

I wore this all day, felt like I had nothing on. The color is a warm peach/gold on me. I've seen it swatched cooler on different skin tones. The applicator is a flat paddle which makes it extremely easy to go completely around the eye. And the flattest part is great for applying all over the lid. I don't feel this color is over sparkly for daytime, I looked at it in direct sunlight and it's shimmery and gorgeous and pretty. It's worn beautifully all day. My next purchase will be a darker color. I don't really feel like anyone can mess these up. Extremely user friendly. And I wear contacts and have sensitive eyes and was able to wear this all day, with the color around my whole eye. Love!

reviews.review_title: No Primer, No creasing! Fast eye look!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I purchased green iron ...its beautiful and complements my green eyes perfectly. I cant wait to try more.

I bought this in 4 emeraude,beautiful color goes on smooth a dries to great finish and stays on needless to say i love it so much i just ordered 2 more onyx and shadow.go out and get these you want be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I just bought two different shades and they are absolutely beautiful and easy to put on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: ive never seen such a smooth application for such a wonderful quality of eyeshadow. It's easy to apply and dries perfectly. If someone like me can make eyeshadow work, anyone can use this. I also use the tarte primer stick and that helps the color stay put.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This new fluid eye tint from Armani is absolutely fantastic. It is a hybrid cream-to-power formula that truly stays put all day. At first glance and upon swatching all 12 shades, I picked up #8 Flannel and #11 Rose Ashes. After a few days of experimenting with them, I came to love the formula and colours. These were gorgeous yet subtle everyday shades Then I went back for some of the more colourful shades, in #4 Emeraude, #5 Onyx, and #7 Shadow. I intend to go back to get more of these lovely irresistible shades!  There is a lovely shimmer to these eye tints once applied, and the packaging makes them beyond easy to use. You can either apply straight from the tube/brush onto the eyelid and blend with your fingers or choose to blend out with a brush. You can even mix two different shades together to create a new shade.  The packaging also makes these very travel-friendly to toss into your bag on-the-go. Application only takes mere minutes to achieve a gorgeous eye look without having to choose from endless eyeshadow shades. The 12 shades of the Armani eye tints are all beautiful, and includes everything from natural and subtle (#9-12) to bold and colourful (#2-7). I definitely recommend checking these out in person to swatch and experience the highly pigmented formula. Absolutely my favourite new product of 2015!
not copper it is the color of a mauve frosted lip gloss. item wiped off In 3 rubs!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this in Flannel (8) just this week... I honestly wanted to buy them all but the price is a bit steep, so I thought I'd try one to start. It goes on easily, it's pigmented, glittery without being too much, and it's easy to apply with the wand! I was able to use the wand to line the bottom lid. While my eyeliner started to fade as did the other shadow I used in the crease, this was still going strong 12 hours later! After about 13 hrs I noticed it start to fade (I do have oily eyelids - but I had applied UD primer as well). Even then there was no creasing at all. So maybe not 16 hours but still pretty impressive! After trying out this one I'll definitely purchase another - maybe one of the more vibrant colors. You should definitely give it a try - I'm really impressed and am curious to try other Armani products!
